title: Savings Tracker
description:
Manage money and track your cash savings with Savings Tracker, a FREE simple financial planner & goal tracker app to help you manage finance better. Aside from recording your savings or the money in your piggy bank, the app also sends you Reminders to remind you to save money daily, weekly, or monthly toward your goal. We have a lot of awesome features that will be useful for you no matter where you live or what currency you use.  
  
Do you know how to save money effectively? Many people are looking for ways to manage money and manage finance better. There are a lot of financial planner apps to help you reach financial goals. Savings Tracker will bring you back to basics: setting goal, reminders, and info of your progress. Our app is effective even when you are simply using a piggy bank as your coin bank. Even a small amount of savings count! Of course, once you‚Äôre serious about budgeting & reaching long term financial goal, you should be saving.

Savings Tracker is suitable for ALL AGES! Whether you already have savings accounts and manage your own finances, or you are still young and still save money in a coin bank or piggy bank, our app can help! 

SIMPLE is better! Sometimes you don‚Äôt need complicated bank finances apps as your financial planner. Just use this simple app that has all the functions you need. 

SAFETY is important for us! Savings Tracker has a Pattern Lock so other people can‚Äôt easily access your sensitive financial data. 

OTHER FEATURES OF SAVINGS TRACKER:
‚òÖ	Know how much you have saved.
‚òÖ	Learn how much more you need to save to reach a financial goal.
‚òÖ	Use your local currency (please contact savingstracker6@gmail.com if your currency is not in the list).
‚òÖ	Daily, Weekly, Monthly reminder.
‚òÖ	Offline usage. A network connection is not required.
‚òÖ	Data synchronization. For those who want their data to be synced across devices.
‚òÖ	Personalize your app with custom themes & colors (some features require premium).

Tips to Save Money:
-	Calculate your income & your budget. 
-	Don‚Äôt forget settings goals, start small first when setting goals. 
-	Use a financial planner or money-saving apps that you like.
-	Get a real piggy bank or coin bank for coin saving ‚Äì it will add up quickly!
-	Motivate yourself with a picture of your goal (vacation destination, etc)

There are a lot of websites with articles on how to save money and tips to save money. You might find those articles useful if you are really looking for in-depth tips to save money. Meanwhile, we hope that our mini financial planner & money saving app can help you manage your finance better! 

Our money saving app tracker supports the following languages:
‚úì English
‚úì German
‚úì French
‚úì Spanish
‚úì Russian
‚úì Chinese
‚úì Tagalog
‚úì Indonesian
‚úì Vietnamese

Note: translations are not perfect, so if you see any mistakes, please contact us at savingstracker6@gmail.com. Also, do you enjoy using the app? Please help us translate English to your language so you can use the app in your language. This way, you can help others learn and practice how to save money too. Thank you!

We also appreciate it if you can help our app by leaving a rating & review!

summary: Manage money & track your savings with this money saving app!
recentChanges:
v2.0.8:
* Add Portuguese (European) translation.

v2.0.7:
* Add Dutch translation.
comments: No advertisements! I haven't seen any at all. Great layout and theme customization. I like how the notes section is in the same window as the rest of the info list. The suggested minimum deposit is perfect. No social media and connection to actual bank, so that's good üëçüèº, I like to keep them separate from other apps and not integrated.

This is the best money app I've found. It's super simple and easy to use. The layout isn't overly complicated and you can add widgets to your home screen. There's transaction history. The most important feature I've found is it tells you how much you need to put in daily/weekly/monthly to achieve your goal! 10/10 best savings tracker I've ever used.

Brilliant App...This app has helped me greatly with my savings goals. The only thing that is not included is the currency of my country. I will be very pleased if you could include PAPUA NEW GUINEA currency in your next update...Thank you so much and well done developer...üëç
This deserves more than 5 stars! This is simply the best. Simple UI, Easy to set up, themes, and most importantly no ADS or IAPs.

Loving it so far. If you need an app that is non invasive and literally just shows you how far your savings progress is, this app is for you. I love how this app is soo simple & dosen't require you to log your income. You literally just tell the app how much you need to save , your deadline & how much you've saved so far. I don't need to worry about my data privacy because I don't have to tell the app much in the first place. I hope everything I'm currently getting stays free for life.

title: Savings Goal
description:
Ever dream of having a nice trip to Paris with your love, new flagship smartphone, new car, travel around the world or maybe your retirement plan? Let's make it happen with our Savings Goal tracker app.


With 'SavingsGoal' it's super easy to plan and manage your savings, just create your goal and track every time you save money with this simple but powerful app.

Add your goal image to motivate you and set your target date and lets this app calculate the minimum amount you need to save every month, week or daily to make sure you reach your goals on time.


Features:
- Create Unlimited goals.
- Add image for every goals
- Set goal target date
- See the daily, weekly, monthly savings needed
- Track your savings and goal.
descriptionHTML:
Ever dream of having a nice trip to Paris with your love, new flagship smartphone, new car, travel around the world or maybe your retirement plan? Let's make it happen with our Savings Goal tracker app.

Features:

- Add image for every goals
- Set goal target date
- See the daily, weekly, monthly savings needed

summary: Plan and Manage Your Savings Goals Easily & Establish The Habit Of Saving Money
developerAddress:
LOT 44 JALAN SUNGAI JAI,
43700 BERANANG, SELANGOR,
MALAYSIA.
recentChanges:
- Now you can remove target date
- Stability improvements and bug fixes
comments: Simple app, good design - does what I want it to do without fuss. Great. - the latest update displays incorrect weekly and biweekly savings amounts. So I have dropped my rating a star until fixed.

I have the premium version just to support the developer. I like the cleanliness and simplicity of the app. The information on the dashboard is everything I need (but I would prefer "goal" on the left and "remaining" on the right). Records are perfect. Developer, I was pleasantly surprised to find that you are from Malaysia. I too am from KL but have lived in the U.S. for 40 years. Thanks for a nice app.

It's great for visualizing saving schedule. I do have some suggestions but I wish they'd put in a feedback option. Eg. There's a bug that affects the "weekly" suggestion... Makes it the same as "monthly"

I'm new to using this app but so far I love it. I think it's what I've always needed to help me use a single savings account but earmark individual goal amounts for different items with different target dates.

Haven't been using this app very long, but so far it's everything that I'm wanting in a savings app except for letting me set my own intervals, but it does give me the option to add as I please so that's away around it.

title: Digit: Save Money With Your Debt & Savings Manager
description:
Save Money Automatically.
Want to save money and build your savings stress-free? Manage finances, create customized savings goals, and pay off credit cards or student loans with Digit, your personal savings and debt manager. 

Your savings manager helps you to automatically save a little bit of money each day, based only on what you can afford. Make keeping a budget and rounding up your spare change things of the past. Plus, you can manage finances easily so that you‚Äôre saving money without even thinking about it.

Pay Off Debt Without Breaking a Sweat.
Save cash and pay off debt, like student loans or credit card bills. Your finance manager knows the right amount of money to add to your Digit savings account, making it easier to pay off bills in time. So you avoid any late fees. By saving in small increments, you can pay bills and manage your financial goals in no time. 

Manage Your Finances Intelligently.
Digit learns your spending and income patterns, putting aside the right amount. Don‚Äôt round up spare change, instead, your Digit money-saving strategy means a little bit goes straight into your Digit Savings Account so you can pay off debt and manage your financial goals intelligently.

Reach Savings Goals Quickly.
Saving money is easy with our smart money management approach. You‚Äôre automatically saving the right amount for you, and only what you can afford. You can save money and pay off debt like student loans and credit card bills, even on a budget. We‚Äôre your money management guide, helping you to reach your financial goals quickly.

Boost Your Financial Health.
Need to pay off student loans, credit card bills, or budget your savings for a much-needed vacation? Manage finances intelligently with text alerts on your spending and automatic savings added to your Digit Savings Account. So you know where you stand against your financial goals at all times.

Join the financial revolution that's saved members over 2.5 billion dollars! Featured in Business Insider, Elle, Bustle, Money Peach, US News, and much more! Digit is an intelligent money management solution that helps you boost your financial health.

MONEY SAVING FEATURES.
‚Üí Save money easily with your personal savings manager. And manage finances every day based on your income and spending.
‚Üí Digit‚Äôs automatic money management app intelligently analyzes your finances so you know how much money you can save.
‚Üí Use your spare change for emergency funds or other customized savings goals.
‚Üí Save cash and budget for an unlimited number of financial goals, with recommended timelines for achieving them.
‚Üí Avoid overdraft fees. Turn on overdraft prevention and automatically transfer money from your savings to checking when your balance gets too low.
‚Üí Withdraw your money as often as you like. No fees for standard ACH withdrawals and no minimums.
‚Üí Your savings manager helps you earn 1% annually on your Digit savings. That's 11X more than an average savings account!¬π
‚Üí Digit uses the same security standards as many banks so you know that your funds and personal information are secure.
‚Üí FDIC-insured banks maintain your Digit savings, insured up to a balance of $250,000.

--------------------------------------------------------

Digit is completely free to try for 30 days. After your trial period, a monthly subscription costs $5 and can be canceled anytime. Whether you want to pay off student loans or credit card bills, build up your savings account or put away some spare change, at Digit, we‚Äôve got your back.

1. FDIC National Savings Rates, as of 12-23-19 https://www.fdic.gov/regulations/resources/rates/historical/2019-12-23.html

summary: Your personal finance manager helps you save money & pay off debt intelligently
comments: The balance updates are a day behind. That delay doesnt lend itself to the balance threshold feature. By the time digit realizes that my balance fell, j have already addressed it. For goals, it would be helpful to set a time frame to reach the goal. For example, if I am saving for a trip. I want to be able to tell digit that I want to save X amount in the next 6 months. Then digit can save more aggressively according to the goal and time frame set.

You privacy policy is all over the place. It is so crazy how you use our data. No wonder you have your app all over the web as ads. Why would you need our computer crash reports? I feel like this app doesn't have our best interests at heart. üíî People, make sure you look at the turns of service and privacy policy before joining any app. Not even my bank has so many clauses about taking your data and using in the way it says. (Update: Check out you BBB then! It's quite damning.)

The best app for "sneaky saving"! I'm trying to pay off debt and any extra money I can put towards it helps so much. I love that I don't really have to stress over finding extra money because this app does it for me. I really love how you can establish a savings priority making it possible to save for a rainy day and make an extra payment to your credit card.

I have only joined Digit for about 4 days now. I assumed it saves money from your direct deposits on payday. I get paid weekly and Digit has already pulled from my account twice. Why?? I tried to explore the app for how it actually works, but it's not much help. I do appreciate the convienence of it saving automatically, just not back to back. Is there a schedule I can set or is this how it works? If not I might have to delete this app.

Do not use. They over drafted my account twice and have yet to pay me back for the money plus the over draft fees. They actually want me to reconnect my bank account so they can deposit money back into my account üòÇüòÇ after providing them with my address to send the check to they refused and said I had to attach my account. Currently calling my bank to deal with it. Save yourself the "hurdles" (this is the word the rep used in the email to discrible the situation and steps I had to take)...üò°

title: 52 Weeks Money Challenge - Free
descriptionHTML:
This app was created based on the popular 52-week Challenge for saving money. The challenge's idea is very simple and perfect for those who have difficulties in planning and, mainly, in saving money.

If you are like that, this is a great way to start saving money and gather a good amount after 1 year.

The challenge is basically about saving a certain amount every week. In order to follow the original idea, you should save $ 1.00 in the first week, $ 2.00 in the second week, $ 3.00 in the third week... up to $ 52.00 in the 52nd week.

By doing that and completing the challenge, you'll have at least $ 1,378.00 after the 52 weeks (1 year) to help you with Christmas shopping, a vacation trip or even to establish an emergency fund. You may use it as you wish.

For those who are able to and want to save even more, there is also the possibility to start the challenge with $ 2, $ 3, $ 4, $ 5, or up to $ 10 (highest suggested amount to start the challenge) and save up to $ 13,780.00 in only one year!

It's also important to highlight that by depositing money into your Savings Account or investing in Treasury Direct, you'll end up with extra earnings.

Get to know some advantages of the 52-week challenge:
- You get used to saving so that it becomes a habit;
- By defining the amount and period for saving, you'll get convinced to rise to the challenge;
- It's easy to start it and, as it gets more challenging, you'll be used to that;
- In order to complete the challenge during all weeks, you'll probably have to control your expenses and avoid unnecessary expenses;
- You learn how to say ‚ÄúNo‚Äù to waste and impulse buying.

The app's features include:

- Add a challenge, with an amount and a starting time, which gives the app the responsibility to manage all the dates and amounts after that;
- Follow the challenge created over the weeks and control the deposits;
- Weekly reminder notifications for the deposits.
summary: The challenge encourages weekly savings of a certain amount for a year
comments: Love it. It was easy to set up and I love the fact that it tells you what your balance is right from the app. I also like that you can have more than one goal with this app. It's making it so much easier to save for Christmas next year. I'm sure it'll get more challenging as I get closer to the 52 weeks and the deposit amounts are higher, but I am determined to see this through.

I'm disappointed that the premium (paid) app forces a popup that asks for your rating, but only allows the user to click [Not now] or [Give-star rating]. Additionally, the premium version of the app recently spammed my phone simultaneously with more than 19 notifications. Granted, the notifications were providing me with helpful projected savings information, but 19+ at the same time?
I started using this app about 1yr now. This is still a great tool or method to encourage discipline to save. Since I have nothing to loose, & alot more to gain, it's still a "no brainer!"

There is no option of fixed amount saving monthly or weekly. Only incremental every week option. Also would be nice to have entering final goal amount and app should help in figuring out how much needs to be saved weekly

Everything one this app is great and I highly recommend it, but I would've loved to have been able to go back into a plan and edit the amount without editing the start date so it doesnt reset the whole thing

title: My Piggy Bank Savings Tracker
description:
My Piggy Bank Tracker helps you to keep track of the money in your piggy bank, and see how much more you have to save to reach your desired financial goal.You can set a goal and track your financial progress. First you have to specify your goal, it`s cost and the amount you are starting with. Then, each time you save money in you piggy bank, or you take money out from it, record it using this app, where you can visualize your progress and 
challenge yourself to meet all the deadlines you set.

Features:
 - Data Synchronization across devices
 - Tracking of multiple goals with images
 - Lots of currencies and counting
 - Custom date format
 - Local backup of data
 - Due dates for goals

summary: Define your savings goals and track the money in your Piggy Bank savings tracker
recentChanges: New feature: Stats about your savings habits and expected completion date are displayed bellow each goal.
comments: I really enjoy this app. Its very simple to use and allows me to easily make a savings plan for multiple things (ie. House deposit, holiday) and keep track of what portion of my savings is going where. I prefer it to other apps of a similar nature because for me it is easier to keep track of, doesn't require my bank details and means I can keep all my savings in one bank account yet still have an idea of how much I have saved for each thing.

Really great app to track your savings. It gives you estimates on when you'll reach your goal based on your saving activity. Great stats which are really detailed even for a non premium account. You also get reminder as push notifications if you spend a lot of time without adding any money to your piggy bank. Last but not least, the ads are not intrusive, unlike any other apps on the market. A tab is made with the option to view an ad if you want. Really LOVE this app and fully recommend.

Love this simple app! It's exactly what I was looking for-just input the numbers & watch the bar grow! I had one before that only allowed 4 different goals & then wanted to charge me to have more than that - ridiculous! As far as I know, you can have as many different goals as you need in this one. Complete with reminders for deadlines & graphs to watch your savings over time! Thank you guys!
VERY easy to use! Helps you set saving goals and celebrates when you reach them. Only problem is you can't record money without a goal (so there's no way to keep track of spending money).
Very good app. Me and my boyfriend were saving for a trip and we get tracked who wasnt able to save for that day. And we got our goaaaaal. Savings goal!

title: Qapital: Spending Tracker & Payday Savings Manager
description:
Save effortlessly, spend guilt-free, and invest confidently with Qapital, your new mobile banking and investing solution. Discover a smart personal finance manager with intuitive tools that make it easy to take control of your money. We‚Äôre committed to making money management accessible, and with more than 8,000 five-star reviews, we‚Äôre pretty sure we‚Äôre on the right track. Last year, our spending tracker and savings manager tools helped our members save an average of $1,500*, making Qapital the ideal app for emergency savings.

5 reasons to download Qapital:

- Automated savings: with personalized Goals and automated savings Rules, our savings manager allows you to save money without thinking about it. Start saving money right on payday!
- Checking account without traditional bank fees: forget about low balance, overdraft or foreign transaction fees. Instead, get a brand new Qapital Visa¬Æ Debit Card** with your checking account to help you save while you spend.
- Invest confidently: start to invest, and get personalized recommendations based on your risk profile. We‚Äôll monitor your investment account, reinvest dividends and rebalance your portfolio for you.
- Budget easily: a pillar of personal finance is "pay yourself first". Set up automatic transfers from your checking account to your savings Goals on payday and allow yourself to forget about it entirely.
- Spending tracker: check out our Spending Sweet Spot feature - a smart money manager that helps you decrypt your spending habits. Discover how you spend, and you'll learn where to save.

Qapital is a new banking experience, which offers tools anchored in behavioral economic principles. Find money happiness by using Qapital to help you save more and reach your goals faster. Join our community, and find yourself among people dedicated to becoming their best financial selves.

Our spending tracker will help you discover your habits when it comes to personal finance. The savings manager allows you to set your Goals and Rules, save money without thinking about it, and watch your savings grow in real-time. You could save money automatically every time you spend! Choose from any number of free in-app savings Rules, take advantage of our Apple Health integration, or customize your own Rules with our IFTTT integration. Before you know it, your Facebook fixation and Uber usage could be saving you money!

Investing in the stock market can be intimidating, but it's a great tool to have in your personal finance arsenal. We'll start investing for you with Qapital Invest. You can earn more toward your long-term goals with personalized portfolio recommendations based on your risk profile. We monitor your account, keep investing dividends, and rebalance your portfolio based on changing market conditions so that you don‚Äôt have to.

Transfer funds between accounts in an instant, and enjoy these in-app features:

- Direct deposit
- Interest on your checking account, savings accounts, and all others
- Weekly Insights
- Pay bills
- Send checks
- Purchase notifications
- In-app temporary card lock
- Google Pay
- More to come!


QAPITAL, the QAPITAL and Q logos, and SAVE SMALL. LIVE LARGE. are all registered trademarks of Qapital, Inc. Copyright ¬© 2018 Qapital, Inc. All Rights Reserved.
* Average amount saved by Qapital users during 2017
** Qapital Visa¬Æ Debit Card issued by Lincoln Savings Bank, Member FDIC

Choose from any number of free in-app savings Rules, take advantage of our Apple Health integration, or customize your own Rules with our IFTTT integration. Before you know it, your Facebook fixation and Uber usage could be saving you money!

Investing in the stock market can be intimidating, but it's a great tool to have in your personal finance arsenal. We'll start investing for you with Qapital Invest. You can earn more toward your long-term goals with personalized portfolio recommendations based on your risk profile. We monitor your account, keep investing dividends, and rebalance your portfolio based on changing market conditions so that you don‚Äôt have to.

Transfer funds between accounts in an instant, and enjoy these in-app features:

- Direct deposit
- Interest on your checking account, savings accounts, and all others
- Weekly Insights
- Pay bills
- Send checks
- Purchase notifications
- In-app temporary card lock
- Google Pay
- More to come!


QAPITAL, the QAPITAL and Q logos, and SAVE SMALL. LIVE LARGE. are all registered trademarks of Qapital, Inc. Copyright ¬© 2018 Qapital, Inc. All Rights Reserved.

summary: Your finance manager helps you track spending, invest & save money every payday
recentChanges: We aim to keep you saving, so we‚Äôll now let you know when one of your Rules has become inactive or requires attention. If you open a Goal and see that there‚Äôs an issue with one of your Rules, you can tap it and follow the relevant steps to repair it. We‚Äôve also fixed a few bugs and performed some general app maintenance.
comments: Great app! Quapital helps me save unconsciously by letting me set the terms on when to save and how much when I am paid. Without having it done in a way that I don't notice it, I wouldn't typically save very much or anything at all. The support team is also very helpful and quick to respond and resolve any issue or questions. Highly recommend!

Great way to save, I've used for like 7 months and i love how it help in saving money. Then I decided to take break and later on I downloaded the app again I tried to link my bank account again and it kept telling me error. I was so disappointed.

They say they won't charge after you've reached under $100 in your bank account. But they've continuously did it to me. And refuse to take responsibility for it. Maybe they need to upgrade whatever system they're using to check balance before transferring money because of the rules you have in place.
This app has made saving possible for me! I don't even notice the money coming out and it stops if my funds are low. I greatly recommend this!

NO human customer support, STUCK with NO money! - $5648 I CAN'T GET to becuase I'm getting a "error contact customer support." - Send you to an AI messaging support app that is garbage at understanding what you need. - Can't add a different bank because I'm getting a connection error. -Any app dealing with your money should have 24/7 call support. - Charge you a fee for nothing at all. No free option any longer. Thanks for the extremely stressful 4 days, Qapital!

title: Piggy Goals: Money Saving
description:

comments: So far this app is exactly what it said it would do. Pretty straight forward. Something this app doesn't have which could be helpful is to tell you how much money you need to complete your goal. Like $50 left of $100. Sometimes it's nice to have it all laid out in front of you. What you want/what you've earned/what's left

It would be better if you could toggle the sounds and vibrations on the app and if you could choose different clothes for your piggy to differentiate between accounts. Also, it would be good to have a way to edit your history in case you mistype something. But even as it is it's a really cute and fun app

Rating temporary as I have yet to use this app for an extended period of time. So far the app is wonderfully simple, easy to understand, and functioning. The little pig mascot actually has a surprisingly large effect of giving the app life, which helps convince myself to use this app.

I didnt go on for like a few weeks and all my goals dissappeared? Not everyone saves daily or even weekly. I liked the format but I'm not gonna go on every few days to say I saved +$0, because you cant do that. And you cant have a $0 balance, or a negative balance either

Works great, but I have a few questions: how to delete or change an amount saved after I saved. For example, if I saved $20 and wanted to change it to $25, how do I do that? Can I back date my start date and savings dates.. for example if i want to save wkly and wanted to start Sept 1 ans depoait wkly after that. Hoping someone might know how.

title: Money Box: Savings Goals
description:
With this free money saving app, you can easily save and achieve goals even if you don‚Äôt know how to save money. So, download it and start saving for that retirement, vacation, new car, kids college fees, or a new iPhone!

No matter your paycheck‚Äôs size, this piggy bank helps you to set aside a portion of it. Use this smart piggy bank to bring your financial goals to life!

This app is completely FREE to use, so why not install it now and start saving money?

Here is why as a money saver, you will love our Money Box app:

*MOTIVATIONAL: You can add a photo of your dream house, holiday destination or any other purchase goal and see the progress in a visual way.

*EASY: Our intuitive user interface makes using this money manager easy. That‚Äôs why everyone can use it including the kids!
* REWARDING: It‚Äôs easy to set goals even for 52 weeks, but many people find it difficult to follow through. Money Box guides you from desire to success so you can enjoy the fruits of your money.
* SMART: Money Box takes away the frustration of saving money for a specific goal. It gives you the power and confidence to succeed every time, and that‚Äôs just plain smart!
* EFFECTIVE: By providing you a simple interface and valuable features to organize and manage your saving targets, you‚Äôll love how effective this savings tracker is at helping you save money.
Install this money saving app to start enjoying all these benefits.
=== HOW Money Box WORKS ===
Easily manage your goals from the dashboard:
1. Title
2. Amount and currency
3. Target date
4. Icon/picture
5. Savings account name
6. Planned savings frequency ‚Äì weekly, monthly etc.
7. Reminders
8. Make contributions toward your goals.
REPEAT!
That‚Äôs how to save money with our free Money Box app.
Install it now to enhance your personal finance health. 

==> The World‚Äôs Most Effective Purchasing Goal App <==

Money Box has quickly become a favorite money saving app among ambitious and determined savers eager to take control of their spending goals. It is generating a major buzz on social media and its diverse fans are spreading across the globe. You could even introduce your kids to it and start teaching them how to save money. If you like to challenge yourself with a 52 weeks savings plan, go ahead and install the Money Box app and start saving.

** Money Box IS THE BEST Savings Tracker** 
Maybe you want to buy a boat or pay off bills, take a vacation or just get that pair of sunglasses that you‚Äôve had your eye on ‚Äì Money Box is secure and flexible enough to accommodate your savings goals big and small! This ease-of-use and focused flexibility is a huge difference between Money Box and other apps for saving money.
===FEATURES ===
‚Ä¢	Intuitive, sleek interface
‚Ä¢	Feature-rich & Easy to use.
‚Ä¢	Secure encrypted data.
‚Ä¢	This savings tracker has multiple currency options.
‚Ä¢	Progress & Goal notifications and reminders. 
‚Ä¢	Share your success on Twitter and Facebook.
‚Ä¢	Ad free version upgrade.
‚Ä¢	Optimization for all the latest mobile devices.
‚Ä¢	Updates to ensure flawless use and new bonus features.

Also check out Money Box Pro for more than 2 active goals management and more features. 

Feel free to drop us a line! We‚Äôre always listening to your suggestions to improve Money Box. If you have any issues with this piggy bank, just contact us and we will help you!

** Are you loving our app? We‚Äôd love to hear about it! Please take a moment to leave us a nice review. It really helps! **
Also, like us on Facebook so you learn more on how to save money. 
We appreciate your support greatly! You inspire us to make more great apps like Money Box.

summary:
Save money monthly or 52 weeks with this free saving app. Set and
achieve goals.
comments: Excellent app. Since I have always struggled with savings, I found their feature very helpful where it lets you add a picture of your savings goal. Having the visual part made it so much easier for me to save compared with many other methods I have tried that don't offer this feature.

Quite good. Better than other apps. I like that I can add my own pictures to the goals helps keep me motivated. Would be nice if I could see overall statistics for all my goals like the total amount I need to save up for all my goals combined, weekly and monthly would be nice. But it's a good-ish app. Can be better though.

I was trying to decide between this and a similar app. I get that this is a free, try-before-you-buy version but I was hit with two full video ads within three screens. That's overkill and doesn't really make want to sit through however many more just to feel the app out.

If you implement the possibility to group or order by saving account I'll give you five stars, that's all I'm missing (even as a Pro only feature is fine, I already bought it). Everything else is great. EDIT: I noticed the sort order doesn't get saved and I have to sort every time. Slightly frustrating.

Everythings pretty good except you cannot reorganise your goals except for alphabetically or due date. I would rate this 5 stars if you can reorganise goals by "drag and move" and not be limited to the two above options. Thanks

title: Thriv - Savings Goal Tracker
description:
Ever dream of having a flagship smartphone, fancy ride, travel around the world, or luxury goods? Let's make it happen with Thriv ‚Äì Savings Goal Tracker!

Thriv is personal Piggy Bank now in your hands!

Motivate yourself to turn your dreams into reality with this piggy bank app. Visualize your savings goal, make it meaningful, and manage your budget and expense. Use this powerful piggy bank app to set your savings goal, build habits in saving money, and track your progress. Make your piggy bank thrive with this savings tracker app!

All in one savings app

Shortly, this savings app is a Piggy Bank tracker, Savings Planner, Budget Planner, Money Tracker, and Expense Manager. It simply helps you to motivate yourself to save up money and keep on track for the things you want to achieve!

Start your saving journey!

Worried that you might forget about saving money for your goal? Don‚Äôt worry! This savings app could give you reminders to save up money so you can keep progressing towards your goal. What‚Äôs even more exciting is that you can add links to online stores or other sources, add custom images, title, description, and custom target for your goal. As a savings tracker app, it provides you with a clear list of records and calendar view for your savings progress. You can also analyze your progress from a comprehensive chart easily by using this simple yet powerful savings app.

How to use Thriv ‚Äì Savings Goal Tracker

‚Ä¢ Download and launch the savings app
‚Ä¢ Create your goal, make it bold with pictures, description, and links
‚Ä¢ Set target for your goal and start saving money
‚Ä¢ Manage your expense with wallet and budget
‚Ä¢ Write down the records and analyze how good you are in saving money with comprehensive charts
‚Ä¢ Motivate yourself to save up money, maintain your saving habit, remember your savings goal, keep saving and unlock your life goal to enjoy life to the fullest!

Features of Thriv ‚Äì Savings Goal Tracker

‚òÜ Simple and easy savings app with smooth controls
‚òÜ Add up to five savings goal trackers and two wallets in the free app version
‚òÜ Customize savings goal by adding a title, price tag, images, description, and links
‚òÜ Various target type to choose (daily, weekly, biweekly, etc.)
‚òÜ Various progress color to pick
‚òÜ Easy to write down savings records with tag
‚òÜ View and track your savings records on a list or calendar
‚òÜ View summary of your savings target
‚òÜ Analyze your performance in saving money on a line, bar, or pie chart
‚òÜ Manage your expense with wallet and set daily/weekly/monthly budget
‚òÜ Custom reminder to remind you of your savings goal
‚òÜ Set currency and target display
‚òÜ Personal and safe savings app to track savings goal and manage expense
‚òÜ Backup data with Google drive

Are you ready to boost your motivation in saving money by using a savings tracker app and achieve your goal? If yes, this simple yet powerful savings goal app is here to help you save up money for your goal. Start your saving journey with Thriv ‚Äì Savings Goal Tracker!

recentChanges:
‚òÜ Support Night Mode
‚òÜ More progress colors

- bugs fix
comments: I'm a very visual person when it comes to working towards my goals & this app has proven many times over to be my perfect motivator. I love seeing the percentage bar grow, even in the degree of the percent, because it reminds me the impact that even the smallest investment in a savings goal can make. To date, this app has played a substantial role in helping me save almost $11,000 towards various goals and you can bet that this app is going to be my #1 in helping me continue that streak.

I used this app for savings, I put money away safely and separately. This help me keep track with my mutiple savings. I used this app on a daily basis. I thank you for creating one and very fast responses. I recommend it to anyone trying to keep track of their finances. Will be recommending suggestions very soon.

5 stars! I love this all because it keeps all my money in one place (two places, technically). I can keep my savings all together and know when I'm done with my projects, which are moved to a separate place, away from the works-in-progress. Thank you!
This app allows you to use change (cents) for accuracy, instead of rounding up to next dollar. I also like being able to use +/- so I can keep track of paying off debts.

I think it's a great app ! Love how it shows me my money chart and shows me what ive been saving and how much i have left to go download this app if you're serious on saving money and having a chart off it !

title: Tip Yourself - Save Money, Get Motivated
description:
Save money! Finally, a saving money app that's actually fun. Reward yourself and save money for life's little moments of victory. 

How do you save money? The secret is habits and mindset. Get motivated today!

‚àö Male it to the gym?... 
‚àö Skip an impulse purchase?... 
‚àö Make a healthy food choice?... 
‚àö Got that long todo list completed?... 

Heck, for no reason at all? You Earned it!... Tip Yourself!

HOW IT WORKS
******************************************
Tip Yourself allows you to transfer small dollar amounts from your checking account into your own secure savings Tip Jar. 

It's FUN. It's EASY. There are ABSOLUTELY NO FEES
******************************************
Use Tip Yourself as a Vacation Fund, a Rainy-day Savings Fund, or to just to Reward Yourself!!

START TODAY

recentChanges: We made some bug fixes and performance improvements. We're excited to share some more exciting updates with you soon! #TipYourself #YouEarnedit
comments: This app really does help save money! I log in each pay week and just add a little something. With preset options or the ability to customize the amount, it's easy to tap a couple buttons and know you've accomplished a goal! Negatives would be that it does kick you out and will occasionally crash. Otherwise I really enjoy it!

Update 3/03/2020: I had to contact customer service several times to find out why my money from my closer account wasn't transferred. Also my paper check from an earlier withdrawal. After the 3rd time (yesterday) I got it today electronically.

Only been using 2 days, but so far it I love it. Everything seams to work smoothly and I really get the feeling that it is a well run company/organization. For example, their membership is completely reasonable at $9.99/year! Also when signing up, there was given the option to auto-renew annually, but it is turned OFF by default. How many other subscription model companies show such obvious and meaningful care for their customers? This is so helpful for me to save money, I'm happy to pay $9.99.

I deleted all my tip jars over a month ago and money is still being taken out of my account. I deleted my bank information on the app in addition to the tip jars, $5 was still taken out and now I can't log back in to withdraw the money üò† If you want money stolen, download the app.

Nice. Takes awhile for the micro transactions to come through. Had problems logging in for a moment, but that cleared up once my internet connection was restored. Happy this is free. Overall pretty good app. So far; trusted. Edit: still a good app, keeping the 3 stars. But I am having 1 problem. 1 of my tip jars started acting up. I had to cancel the pending transfer for $1; I pressed withdraw, jar tipped upside down, & got stuck. Transfer went through, now idk where my money is. Please fix..

title: Mint: Budget, Bills, & Finance Tracker
description:
Finally, there‚Äôs one place to manage all your finances with ease. Mint is the free money manager and financial tracker app from the makers of TurboTax¬Æ that does it all. We bring together your bank accounts, credit cards, bills and investments so you know where you stand. See what you‚Äôre spending, where you can save money, and track your bills in Mint like never before. You can even keep track of your credit score to help you be smart about it, no credit card required.
 
SEE EVERYTHING IN ONE PLACE	
Get a more complete picture of your financial life. We bring together everything from account balances and spending to your free credit score, net worth and more.
 
MANAGE BILLS & MONEY TOGETHER
Track bills right alongside your account balances. You‚Äôll know what's due, when it‚Äôs due, and the money you have to put toward your balances.
 
SAVE TIME & MONEY 
With one place to keep track of your finances, there‚Äôs no need to log into multiple sites. Plus, we‚Äôll give you savings tips to help with budgeting and debt.
 
BUDGET BETTER     	
Effortlessly create budgets you can stick to. To help you save smarter from day one, we even make a few for you based on your spending.
 
BE SMART ABOUT YOUR CREDIT SCORE
Get your free credit score, no credit card required. You‚Äôll learn how it‚Äôs calculated and get tips.*
 
SAY GOODBYE TO LATE FEES        	
Get bill pay reminders so you pay bills on time and avoid missed payments and credit card fees.
 
STAY SECURE
We‚Äôre serious about security and use measures like multi-factor authentication, designed to help you protect access to your account. Plus, Mint comes from the people who make TurboTax¬Æ, trusted by millions with sensitive data, and we participate in security scanning with VeriSign.

recentChanges:
Hey, there!
In this update, we made some improvements and smashed some bugs to make your Mint experience even more awesome. Also fixed crashes on app initialization and tab navigation for some users.

We‚Äôre always working on new ways to improve your experience with Mint. Let us know what you think by leaving a review!
comments: This is a great app. You can link all of your credit cards, bank accounts, expenses and know how much you have. It takes some times to update after payments because it goes off of the financial institutions and their processing times. Once the payments are withdrawn. It updates your balances. This is how banks work. It's a great app and easy to use. You can set budgets for your expenses. I set budgets for fuel, fast food, coffee, cash, etc. The app recognizes your expenses and categories them.

I'm changing my rating from 2 to 4 stars. The app has come a long way. The only thing that I'd like to see happen is the app being faster to recognize transactions in my checking account. Otherwise, great app with an awesome budget feature. You can really customize the budget and put transactions in whatever category you want or just go with the suggested category.

Takes about two months to figure out the budgeting and how it aligns with your spending but since I've started using it in October I've been able to consistently save money and pay off credit cards. I have really enjoyed the bar charts to show when you are green, yellow, or red in terms of spending habits. I always used an excel sheet for budgeting but it is so nice to have an app auto update all expenses.

I used Mint for a long time then it stopped syncing to my bank account in spite of numerous attempts to fix it. I'm sad that I will be looking for an alternative app if these problems continue much longer. Who has time to devote to figuring out the help system maze via Facebook or Twitter? Not me. I'm obviously not the only one experiencing this either.

I like using the app so I can check my finances in real time. It works pretty well. Here are some things I'd like to be able to do. - rules carry-over from desktop version to app - ability to assign categories to pending transactions (otherwise, the app miscategorizes and we get a notification of over-spending) - modified: adding a new merchant is possible! Up'd my review to 4 stars.

title: Saving Made Simple - Money App
description:
We combined a simple savings calculator with an easy expense tracker to make saving money for anything a breeze! You don't need to know how to budget, just enter a savings plan (such as "Saving for Wedding") and our savings calculator will automatically track your goal and show you exactly how much money you need to save!


**ON SALE** Looking for the Ad-free and Dropbox supported Donate Version? It's on sale for 0.99! Get it now here: http://goo.gl/LPwys

How to Save Money in Just 4 Steps!
1. Create a savings plan, for example "Saving for College Fund".
2. Record payments that add to your savings for your College Fund. 
3. Track expenses which decrease your savings toward your College Fund.
4. Adjust your spending to maximize your money saving and minimize your student debt.

How Does it Make Saving Money Simple?
1. Automatic savings reminders show you exactly how much money you need to save.
2. Savings plans are split into daily, weekly, bi-weekly and monthly required amounts.
3. Automatically record and track expenses and payments by setting scheduled transactions!
4. Create savings plan widgets you put on your homescreen for 1-click access to your goals.
5. Graphs your expenses and shows you exactly where you're spending too much money! Think of it as a personal money manager!

Money Management and Other Features
‚Ä¢ Create savings plans in over 65 currencies to track any savings account.
‚Ä¢ Quick overview of all savings plans shows you exactly how much money you need to save in total.
‚Ä¢ 30 Day expense trend graph shows you how much money you're spending at a glance.
‚Ä¢ Pie charts break down your expense history showing you exactly how you've spent your money.
‚Ä¢ Deadline notifications alert you before a goal's deadline is up.
‚Ä¢ Backup your savings plans to Dropbox and import them to any device!
‚Ä¢ App lock keeps your personal financial information and savings plans safe from prying eyes!

Save Money the Safe Way
Your privacy is safe, Saving Made Simple does not require any personal financial information whatsoever. Our app requires no bank account information nor any connections to your savings account or financial institution.

Rest assured, if your phone is lost or stolen your financial accounts will not be at risk!

Never worry about your personal finances again! Download the #1 personal finance and money saving app on Android now!

comments: It makes it easy to visualize. And it doesnt connect to a bank so I feel safe using it!

This is a great app, it really helps me to track how well I am saving towards my goals. There are two things I would ask, one is to be able to change the goal order as when I choose that option I get a white screen. The other is that I would love it if you could display somewhere the amount left to go.

This is the best app I've found to allocate my money outside of my banking apps. Really useful, sends reminders and calculates how much is needed to be saved per day, week, fortnight or month to meet your goals in the time you set. Wonderful app, would highly recommend!

title: Dobot - Save Money. Reach Your Goals.
description:
Dobot¬Æ is the free, easy-to-use savings app that helps you save for the things that matter most. Create your Dobot account in a few minutes and start saving right away. Finally a simple way to stick to your budget, receive money advice, reach your savings goals, and feel financially confident. Go ahead, start planning for that dream house, new car or the vacation you've always wanted to take!
 
SAVE SMART & REACH YOUR GOALS.
 
Dobot (dough - bot). Powered by Fifth Third Bank. Because some things are worth saving for. 
 
CREATE SAVINGS GOALS
Whether you're saving for a vacation, planning a wedding, building an emergency fund or boosting retirement savings, your Dobot savings goals will keep you focused.
 
CONNECT YOUR BANK
Dobot identifies safe savings amounts, and automatically moves small amounts of money every few days from your checking account to your Dobot savings. You can add or withdraw money whenever you want.
 
REACH YOUR GOALS
Dobot encourages you along the way with savings tips, which make saving fun and motivating! Feel confident knowing that you‚Äôll reach your goals.
 
Get Started Today!

SECURED & INSURED
 
* Dobot is secured with 256-bit encryption, bank-level security. 
* All funds held within Dobot are FDIC insured.
 
DOBOT BELIEVES
 
* that everyone has the right to financial health, not just those with great wealth
* that saving money doesn't have to be difficult
* that a small action is better than no action
* that there are easy steps you can take now to make big improvements in your financial health.
 
FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS
 
Q: Is Dobot really free?
A: Yes, Dobot is a free financial app.
 
Q: Is Dobot safe?
A: Yes, Dobot helps make finances fun, but takes security very seriously. Dobot uses bank-level security to secure your account. All funds in your Dobot account are FDIC insured.
 
Q: Will Dobot ever overdraft my checking account?
A: Dobot's algorithm is designed to avoid savings if your balance is too low.  If our automatic savings ever causes an overdraft, we'll cover the fees, so you can rest easy and watch your savings grow.
 
Q: Can I turn off automatic savings?
A: Yes, you are always in control of your money. Dobot will still give you personalized savings tips to help you save more money and reach your goals.
 
*Dobot is proudly powered by Fifth Third Bank, National Association*

recentChanges: Another step forward for Dobot!  This update improves the activity screen, consolidating transactions by month and displaying withdrawal reasons.  In addition, we‚Äôve updated identity verification, and provided links to @thedobotapp social media accounts.  Come follow us!
comments: I rarely review apps. But Dobot has been so helpful to us in a real and tangible way that I want to thank the developers of the app and those who work in customer service. I recently had a connection issue and it was solved quickly by Alexus. Her communication with me was effective and helpful. I have no recommendations on how to improve the experience of the app as I'm still only a month or so in, but we are saving money, and it's super easy to do, and I'm pleased! Thanks!

I was so excited for this app; however smart save wont work for me, transfers take way too long, and my savings schedule is completely ignored. Guess I'm just going to use my 360 account from capital one. Not only does it work in a timely manner it draws interest. Dobot needs to do better :(
Seems to work good so far, I've only had it a short time. Really wish that it had a "round up my change" savings feature. I love the fact that it's free though, so can't complain!

Easy to use, helpful to visualize my goals! Really like how you can turn on and off the automatic savings, to leave it up to manual savings, or a combination. Easy to move money around and keep track of it.
Very easy to use. I set my Dobot up to automatically withdraw money every paycheck plus Dobot, itself, will automatically transfer little amounts here and there.

Ibotta is a free app that gives you real cash back on every purchase. Earn real cash back every time you shop online or in store, from picnic supplies to summer wardrobe essentials.

Save money with Ibotta: simply check the app before you shop, travel, dine out, or go to the grocery store to seamlessly earn cash back on thousands of leading brands and retailers, including Walmart, Target, and many more. No coupon, rebate, or promo code necessary ‚Äî just shop and earn cash back on groceries, apparel, home improvement, travel, home decor, and more.

Earn cash back instantly with our newest feature: Pay with Ibotta! Shop and use Pay with Ibotta to pay for your purchases right from the app, then earn cash back on your entire purchase, instantly.

Ibotta isn‚Äôt your average coupon app. You can earn real cash just for shopping for the things you buy every day! Unlike most coupon apps, Ibotta lets you grow your savings ‚Äî just shop, redeem offers, and you'll see cash back in your account!

comments: Edited review - At one point I loved this app, then had some issues, but it was rectified. Now, I'm changing my review for the 3rd time. This app is NOT worth the headache and frustration. It's always the same coupon and the same glitches. I'd rather not get any money back then waste my life away trying to earn $1 back here and there.

I initially gave 5 stars, but then I had to change it to 3 solely because it seems like the offered items are items I don't use. There used to be the "For You" selection that recommended items based on what you regularly buy or save, but lately my "For You" selection has been extremely off and the overall selection seems to have diminished. If I do redeem anything, it's for non-brand specific items. Then, when I do not redeem for a certain time, an amount is deducted from my overall savings.

I like the savings with this app and learning about new products. I do geel it could be more user friendly and that at least you should always have credit for wntering a receipt. Also even if you can connect your card you should also be able to submit a receipt. I missed out on 3 deals from a new store because I did not know I needed to connect the card before I went. I spent all that time looking up deals and then did not get them.

The recent update removed the QR code option, and the barcode scanner almost NEVER WORKS. Entering the 20 digit code manually is an unfriendly hassle of a user experience. I'm just about DONE with Ibotta now. It's used to be a good working, friendly, pleasant app. Now it's a hassle, and worst of all, it only finds me a mere FRACTION of the money it used to. Almost worthless now.

Love it, so much it started my whole entire coupon in adventure. I am not very happy with the recent changes, it used to let you scan a receipt more than once for instance if you didn't get credited for an offer that is on your receipt oh, you could just scan it again remove the items you've already been credited for and received credit for the one that was meant unfortunately now it seems as if you can only skin at 1. So if anybody you know that's in charge read this please fix

title: Savings Track
description:
Are you saving money for a new car, holiday or putting money aside for retirement?  Check out the app,  it can help you to setup goal, monitor progress and motivate you to move forward until you archive your goal.

To archive the saving goal, you just do below steps:
1. Set saving goal.  Define why you need to save, how much you want to save, and what is the deadline.
2. Enter the amount of savings on a regular according to your goals.
3. Track progress until archive your goal. 

Install Savings Money, keep track of your savings and save more !

I would like it if you aded choose of weekly or monthly deposit i really like it . It is so easy to use keep it up just right to much is just as bad as not having it at all

Minimal functionality. History should be itemized inputs. If I accidentally type a wrong amount and didn't memorize the total, I wouldn't be able to delete the item without it affecting the entire goal amount.

Perfect for what i need simple and easy having goals writen down that you can add or subtract from seeing your progress helps me stay on track with my goal love it ibe had this app on every phone ive owed

title: Money Saving Tracker - 52 Week Challenge
description:
Having trouble saving money? üí∏üí∏üí∏

This app was designed to help you start saving cash! The app Tracks your progress and includes reminders and notifications to help you along the way. The best part? The app is completely FREE! üò±

üî∏üî∏ How does it work? Well, it‚Äôs simple, you have different ways to start saving üî∏üî∏
üëâ Incremental Savings Challenge: Start saving low and increase over the time your weekly savings. Start with $1 dollar the first week, then $2 dollars the second week, $3 dollars the first week, and by the end of week 52 you will have saved a total of $1,378.00 dollars.
üëâ Reverse Challenge: The second mode is inverse, you start saving more the first weeks and progressively save less and less every week, and by the end of the 52nd week you‚Äôll have saved $1,378.00 dollars.
üëâ Fixed Amount: If you like to save a fixed amount every week, our app will track your progress and help you continue saving every week.
üëâ By goal: Planning on buying something? Create a goal and set the amount you want to raise, then just let our app track and help you reach your target budget!

What makes us different from all other savings apps? We have several reasons, here is our full feature list:

üîπ Several different dynamics and alternatives to make it easy for you to start saving money.
üîπ Graphs are included to help you visualize your progress.
üîπ Our App includes notifications; we will send you notifications to remind you about your savings goals.
üîπ Ability to create multiple Savings Goals.
üîπ The App is Multi-language.
üîπ No internet connection is required to use the app, and it‚Äôs designed to work for every device with any software version.
üîπ We made it so fast and simple to use that you‚Äôll be able to start saving money in a matter of seconds!
üîπ We will constantly update our App to support a wider range of features.


Download Now!  52 Week Money Saving Challenge  for FREE in Google Play & App Store! üëæ

title: SavePal: Savings and goals tracker
description:
Are you planning your next trip? Do you want to buy a bike? Saving money for a special gift?

With SavePal it's easy to manage your savings üè¶, just add your goals üíØ and track every time you save money, it's that simple. Change your savings and spending habits thanks to SavePal.

You can see the history of all your savings with charts, knowing in which categories you are saving more money üí∞. Keep motivated to achieve your goals quickly.

Description:
SavePal can be used as a Piggy Bank, Savings Planner or Budget Planner!  It allows you to easily track your progress in order to purchase the things you want.

Features:
‚úî Unlimited goals.
‚úî Save money easily to reach your goals.
‚úî Add savings to each goal.
‚úî Withdraw money from each goal if needed.
‚úî See the daily/weekly/monthly savings needed to reach your goal
‚úî Track your savings and goal by categories.
‚úî Add reminders to keep you motivated.
‚úî Beautiful charts with your overall savings.
‚úî Multiple currencies.
‚úî Widget.

How to use:
‚úî Add your goals, set the amount, category and the deadline.
‚úî You can add reminders to motivate you.
‚úî Start adding savings to each goal. You can also withdraw money from it.
‚úî Track your progress with dashboards and reminders. You can monitor how much you are saving by category.

Premium features (In-App Purchase):
‚úî Change Theme: Customize your app theme.
‚úî Change Font: Customize the font.
‚úî Manage categories: Add as many categories as you want and select from more than 30 icons.
‚úî Backup and Restore: Save your data in your Google Drive account and restore it on a different device.

Supported languages:
‚úî English
‚úî Spanish

Contact us!

We are happy to chat with you. Are you missing any features? Is something not working as expected?

Send us an email: juliodevel@gmail.com
Follow us on Twitter: @Save_Pal

title: SavingStar - Grocery Rebates
description:
Not your ordinary grocery rebates. Earn cash back on your groceries with BIG SAVINGS on your favorite brands and produce items when you shop at your local grocery store. There's nothing to clip or print. SavingStar is free and easy to use. Start saving money today.

Benefits:
‚Ä¢ Save money without the hassle of clipping or printing grocery coupons. Just tap the rebates you like!
‚Ä¢ Savings bigger than regular grocery coupons. SavingStar offers can be worth $5 or more.
‚Ä¢ Who says grocery rebates are for unhealthy products? Save on fresh produce with our Healthy Offer of the Week (bananas, apples, tomatoes and more).
‚Ä¢ Cash out to your bank or PayPal account, to various gift cards, or to a charity. 
‚Ä¢ Link deals to your supermarket and drugstore loyalty cards at over 100 chains! For select stores, take a picture of your grocery receipt using our app.
‚Ä¢ New deals to save on groceries every week at your favorite supermarkets and drugstores like Walmart, Target, Safeway, Albertsons, Kroger, Stop & Shop, CVS, Meijer, ShopRite, Food Lion, Publix, HEB, Walgreens and 100+ other grocery chains.
 
Featured in Parents, Wall St. Journal, Time, and more. Join 7 million SavingStar members and earn cash back on groceries today!

What's new in version 4.10.5:

comments: I been using savingstar for years and I use to love it. But now, there are barely any new offers to redeem! Ever since beginning of January 2020, there hasn't been any offers. Good luck cashing out because you need at least $20 to cash out but at this rate, it'll take forever. So disappointing! And the last update for this app was on 12/9/19....what the heck? No new offers and no update for months? Strange!!

Doesn't work... after scanning products, then scanning receipt it freezes at the receipt process. I have tried for 4 days at different times throughout day, home wifi/cell Verizon data plan but never works. If my receipt is longer than one click, it freezes and won't let you take any more photos of receipt. So then if you try to get out of receipt photo mode it completely takes you out and you have to start all over again...scan products again, etc. Very frustrating. Stick with Ibotta.

App was great when there wasn't such a high redemption requirement ($5, I think it was), but now at $20 you'd be hard put to earn enough by the end of the decade, by which time SavingStar may be out of business. Offers are just too sparse (18 as of today, for example) to be of much good.

It is a good app not much problem with it, but once you select you stores while you are setting up your acct. It would not let you add the stores again. Even though it gives you the option to add most stores to get your cash refund, you can't scan the receipt if you store wasn't selected at 1st.

I'm so mad at this app. I'll get a notification that there are new offers, I'll try to save an offer, the app doesn't let me save it, so I close and reopen the app. The new offers are now GONE and nowhere to be found anywhere on my account. This app used to work great but this has been happening for the past 3 weeks, essentially making this app now useless.

title: 52 Weeks Money Challenge
description:
Still trying to keep a running tab on your spending, but end up with no money saved?

Saving doesn‚Äôt need to be hard, you just need to find a way that is most suited to you to make saving both easy and fun. The popular 52 Weeks Money Challenge is actually a great way to save!

What is the 52 Weeks Money Challenge?
For the first week, save $10
From the second week, save $10 more than the previous week
In one year, you will have saved $13,780!

There is no trick to it, just save the relevant amount each week, at the end of one year you will end up with a sizeable sum!

Start your new year with a new goal, get your friends on board and participate in the challenge together! Just set your saving goal and you are on your way to impressive savings at the end of the year!

„Äê5 Major Features „Äë
‚ñ∏ Different challenge modes
Add fun and variety to normal saving plans

‚ñ∏ Customized start date
If you have already started your saving plan, you can still transfer without issues

‚ñ∏ Customized your own saving cycle
Make saving free and flexible

‚ñ∏ Define your own currency
For ones that love to travel,  make saving more goal-oriented 

‚ñ∏ Reminder setting
Keeping you on track and on top of your saving goals 

Set yourself a goal and start saving today!


„ÄêFrom the developer„Äë
Staying up countless late nights to develop this app. 
Please support me with ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ if you are enjoying saving money with this app and share this handy tool with your friends and loved ones.
If you have any questions or recommendations for the app, I would love to hear from you. Contact me on: contact.52weeks@gmail.com

If it had the option to have a 1p saving challenge like day 1 - 1p day 2, 2p, day 365 - ¬£3.65 example I would pay the ¬£1.79 a year fee but since it doesn't I'll cancel that in the next day or so during the free trial. title: Oingz - The best way to achieve your savings goals
description:
At Oingz, we believe that everyone has the right to receive personalized financial guidance to achieve their life goals, whatever they may be. That's why we are different from any other savings app. We don‚Äôt just let you create saving goals. Our algorithm is constantly working to organize and optimize the money you save, allocating it among your goals so you can achieve them. Do you want to save money the smart way? Use a smart app. DOWNLOAD IT NOW AND TRY IT FOR FREE!

Our mission: to help you save efficiently. To do so, we take the time to get to know you, we suggest goals that are relevant to your situation and create a tailored plan for you to achieve them on time. In addition, we optimize your savings, we keep track of them 24/7 and help you to get your goals back on track if necessary. 

Forget about those popular budgeting tools and let us help you save in a smart and efficient way.

‚ÄúDo not save what is left after spending; instead spend what is left after saving.‚Äù
‚Äï Warren Buffett

title: Wallet - Money, Budget, Finance & Expense Tracker
description:
Become your own finance manager with Wallet‚Äî  a spending tracker and personal finance planner that helps you save money and plan your budgets.  Wallet is not just an expense tracker or budgeting app.  It‚Äôs about getting things under control now so that you can make wiser decisions and plan for the future‚Å†‚Äî whether that‚Äôs a month, a year, or a decade down the line.

Looking for an app to manage business finance? Check out Board by BudgetBakers! Simply scroll to the bottom of the store listing and you'll find it in More by BudgetBakers.
 
WHY YOU SHOULD USE WALLET
 
Toss your notebooks and spreadsheets, and budget for clear, tangible goals that are easy to track in real-time. Tracking your expenses just got easier. Keep full control with beautifully designed reports on your accounts. 

You can easily control your spending and save more using the finance tracker and planner.
 
Wallet is a money manager and budget planner designed to help you from day one.  With continuous insights, you‚Äôre able to stay in control of your personal finance for the long-term. 
 
WHAT MAKES WALLET UNIQUE:
 
Automatic Bank Updates - Transactions are automatically and securely synced with your bank, then smartly categorized and factored into your budget. With 3,500 participating banks worldwide, you‚Äôll save loads of time not having to track every penny.
 
Imports or Manual Bank Updates - You can now import all your transaction data from sources of your choice so you will get a full report for simple expense tracking. Be it from your bank or your own spreadsheets.
 
Flexible Budgets - Budgets help you plan your spending & save money for the future thanks to the integrated money manager. Whatever it is you need to accomplish, from paying off debt to buying a car or saving for retirement, this budgeting app offers the flexibility to meet your goals and cleverly react to any changing financial circumstances.
 
Insightful reports - Easy-to-understand graphs and financial overviews give you actionable insights about the state of your finances, across bank accounts, credit and debit cards, debts and cash. You can get your income & expense report.
 
Sharing selected accounts - Selected accounts can be shared with family, friends or colleagues who need to cooperate on a budget. Everyone can contribute from any platform, whether it be Android, iPhone or the Web.


Other features: Multiple currency support, Automatic cloud sync, Receipt and warranty tracking, Categories and templates, geo-mapping transactions, hash-tagging, Shopping lists, Exports to CSV/XLS/PDF, debt management, PIN security, Standing orders, notifications, reports and more.

With Wallet, you can expect updates with new features and improvements routinely.
 
 
HOW TO START USING WALLET
1. Download the app
2. Create Account
3. Get going: budget and track expenses like a master!
  
Wallet is certified with eTrust
descriptionHTML:
Become your own finance manager with Wallet‚Äî a spending tracker and personal finance planner that helps you save money and plan your budgets. Wallet is not just an expense tracker or budgeting app. It‚Äôs about getting things under control now so that you can make wiser decisions and plan for the future‚Å†‚Äî whether that‚Äôs a month, a year, or a decade down the line.

Looking for an app to manage business finance? Check out Board by BudgetBakers! Simply scroll to the bottom of the store listing and you'll find it in More by BudgetBakers.

WHY YOU SHOULD USE WALLET

Toss your notebooks and spreadsheets, and budget for clear, tangible goals that are easy to track in real-time. Tracking your expenses just got easier. Keep full control with beautifully designed reports on your accounts.

You can easily control your spending and save more using the finance tracker and planner.

Wallet is a money manager and budget planner designed to help you from day one. With continuous insights, you‚Äôre able to stay in control of your personal finance for the long-term.

WHAT MAKES WALLET UNIQUE:

Automatic Bank Updates - Transactions are automatically and securely synced with your bank, then smartly categorized and factored into your budget. With 3,500 participating banks worldwide, you‚Äôll save loads of time not having to track every penny.

Imports or Manual Bank Updates - You can now import all your transaction data from sources of your choice so you will get a full report for simple expense tracking. Be it from your bank or your own spreadsheets.

Flexible Budgets - Budgets help you plan your spending & save money for the future thanks to the integrated money manager. recentChanges: Improve group sharing (permissions are back)
comments: Updated my rating to 5* because I was able to find all my past records for EACH category under Statistics>Reports. A very useful app. I now know: 1. How much I spent paying debts. 2. How much money I have in Total. 3. My biggest expenses and 4. I don't need to remember when a payment was made because everything is recorded in real time and easily retrievable. I'll buy the paid version. Thanks to the developer.

I was extremely excited that you could connect bank accounts and have them sync on their own when you purchase premium. The reason I'm giving a two star rating is I could only get 4 accounts connected and keep them connected. We bank with Capital One and I was able to get it connected and then it just wouldn't connect. Target, Kohls and a few others just won't connect. Get your syncing fixed and I might come back. Going to request a refund.

Decent enough free version, though there are a few problems. The biggest one for me is that the "balance forecast" appears to be counting my planned payments as positives instead of negatives - i.e. my landlord is paying me rent instead of the other way around. As a result the numbers are so wrong that it's almost comical. I have to use an excel sheet for this instead. There are a couple of things I wish were added too, like being able to separate expenses per day by category in reports.

This is clearly the result of a competent team which cared about user experience. One annoying thing is that I "can't delete record in connected account". I'm tracking a bank account and two credit cards. It calculates all of the expenses from the credit cards twice - once for each purchase on the credit card statement, and then the monthly billing of the bank account as well. There should be a simple way to exclude a transaction from the statistics.

Looked very good structurally and I could see a great future. But you have to keep connecting to the banks. One of my banks it cant connect now. But competative software can. It also doesn't cover all the banks I use. A competative product does a lot more banks. I have reported all this to wallet but wishful promises are never delivered. And I have bought a lifetime subscription. Shame on me. I cannot see why it is the editors choice still.

title: Krazy Coupon Lady: Coupons, Deals & Savings
description:
This coupon app is a must-have for finding the best in-store and online deals for places like Target, Walmart, Kohl‚Äôs, and more. Let us find you the best deals, offers and discounts at your favorite places to shop. Whether you‚Äôre just learning how to coupon or you‚Äôre an avid extreme couponer, this is an essential money-saving app. 

We‚Äôll teach you how to find major savings on everything you buy... Set up deal alert notifications and you‚Äôll know when to jump on a deal on 50+ top brands! We‚Äôre also tracking top retail categories, finding you coupons & deals at:

- Amazon
- Macy‚Äôs
- Costco
- Walgreens
- Best Buy
- Target
- Walmart
- Victoria‚Äôs Secret
- Kohl‚Äôs
- CVS
- Kroger
- Rite Aid
- Publix
- Safeway
- Family Dollar
- Dollar Tree
- And DOZENS more!

See ALL the available free coupons and rebate offers. This includes grocery deals, promo codes, Sunday coupons, online coupons, manufacturer coupons, ebates and more ‚Äî we then send you deal alerts directly to your phone when the best sales happen. From printable coupons to e rebates we will show you how to get the best deal possible. Whether you want to clip the Sunday paper or digital coupons, our Krazy team does all the work for you!

Maybe you want to learn how to use the Walmart grocery, Ibotta, Target app or other apps for groceries? We will show you how step-by-step. In addition, we will coach on finding the best deals with other money saving apps, such as, Paribus, Retail Me Not, Groupon & more.

You want to save money and shop smart, but you need a deal finder. Yep. We get it. 

Other freaking brilliant things about this app:

- 100‚Äôs of deals posted every day with easy-to-follow instructions
- Change which brands you track and never miss a deal in the notifications center
- A constant stream of money-saving tips, tricks and life hacks
- The ability to select your favorite retailers and filter deals by store favorites
- Tutorials and videos to help turn new couponers into money-saving machines
- ‚ÄúBrags‚Äù section where you can share your money-saving successes with our community

Hey, friends don‚Äôt let friends overspend. Shop, save and share. Let‚Äôs get Krazy! Download the Krazy Coupon Lady app today.

comments: Awesome deals...if you can get to them before their gone that is. Helped me with my 1st year baby stuff a ton!! Dont know much about couponing but they make it dummy proof with step my step instructions on every deal and links for everything you need. Love seeing what pops up everyday!! If your not like me and dont like to be bothered as much the notifications are super customizable for your preferences and are always asking to make sure they're set how you like. 5 out of 5 well done ladies

I must say, this app has cleaned up very nicely. This app saves you money on products that people actually use. Unlike other apps that show you circulars to multiple stores. This app cut straight to the Chase and shows you where all the best deals are. I have multiple apps that display coupons but this one is by far the best, I've seen deals that were in other apps that this app displays plus more. In fact this app is so good I have deleted the other apps within this category. Great job

Great layout, hundreds of stores to choose from and easy step by step guide to use paper coupons, digital coupons and sale prices all together to save up to 90% off the original price. This is the best couponing/sale site I've found. KCL helped me build a very large stockpile in less than 4 months. üòä

Love the deals posted on this app, the coupon break down & steps are very easy to follow!! Its a must download app to have on your phone especially if you like to save money on your favorite ptoducts and check out the nonadvertisted hidden savings in all your local favorite stores n get in on the hott savings online!! You will be glad that you did!! Also check out the free items!

I Love it! It Keeps you in the Know, Up to Date, has a Variety of everything. Another Fav of mine unlike other Apps, is when deal Expires, it Lets you know so you Dont Waste Your Time. Only Down Fall, is That I DONT HAVE ENOUGH TIME TO GO AN GET EVERY DEAL!!

title: Moneyhero - Save Money & Personal Finances
description:
The hero of your personal finances! Moneyhero is the app that controls your personal economy in a different way. 

Moneyhero lets you know what you spend each day so as not to miss the savings goal that you have set, in addition, Moneyhero shows you your daily progress according to the limit you have set and tells you if you make ends meet or not. If you are looking for an app to save easily, manage costs and revenues and take control of your personal finances, download Moneyhero.

Moneyhero is an ideal app to manage your money, its operation is very simple, just indicate your main monthly income, your fixed expenses and  mark a saving target, from this, you will know the money you have left to spend (we call it variable), this variable is the one that we will monitor so that you do not pass and meet your saving objective. 

You will be surprised how easy it is to get to save at the end of the month knowing what you can spend at any time.

Free trial for 10 days, then you can continue in the free Lite version or Premium version.
