title: Goal Savings Accomplishment App
description:
GoalApp provide simple approach to helps you start a savings plan quickly. You can keep track your savings, wealth balance and goal progress easily.
 
Use GoalApp to:

‚ú¶ Start a plan by set your goal with specific amount and time frame. One at a time to keep focus. You may reset to restart a new plan anytime.

‚ú¶ Know how much to save. The app calculates your target saving each new month and each time you update your wealth condition. The designed formula will ensure advised monthly target saving is always aligned toward you goal.

‚ú¶ Log your savings. GoalApp will show you how much you've saved from the monthly target and how much remains. You can see your savings progress and track your savings habit on chart. 

‚ú¶ Track your wealth and savings goal progress. The app provide useful statistics and chart, so you can stay in control your finance and stay motivated.

The sooner you start saving, time is on you side, apply power of compounding interest for your advantage. The sooner you stay saving,  the more it becomes more of a habit and the easier it will become. You will learn good financial habits that will help you well into the future.

GoalApp is 100% safe, private and free. Download now! Happy saving üòÄ

title: Stash: Invest. Bank. Save.
description:
Join 4+ million people on Stash, a personal finance and investing app where you can buy stocks and funds with any dollar amount, experience banking with benefits, save and budget smarter, and learn as you go.

We offer three subscription plans: Stash Beginner, Stash Growth, and Stash+. Each plan is designed for a range of needs and goals and offers unique ways to save and invest. You can pick the plan that‚Äôs right for you, with the option to switch as your life changes.

--Transparent Pricing--

Stash Beginner ($1/mo.)**
‚Ä¢ Includes: Personal investment account & bank account access

Stash Growth ($3/mo.)**
‚Ä¢ Includes: Everything in Beginner + a retirement account

Stash+ ($9/mo.)**
‚Ä¢ Includes: Everything in Growth + 2 custodial accounts, metal debit card‚Ä†, 2x Stock-Back‚Ñ¢ rewards#, & monthly market insights.

Get Your Pay Up to 2 Days Early¬ß

All plans include access to the Stash debit card, which comes with our FDIC-insured banking account. You can get paid up to 2 days early with direct deposit. Plus, no overdraft‚Äñ, minimum balance, set-up, or hidden fees.¬∂

Earn Stocks & Funds As You Spend

You can use the Stash debit card to earn stocks and funds through our Stock-Back¬Æ rewards program, building a portfolio that reflects where you shop#.

Investing with any Dollar Amount

Unlike other apps, Stash lets you buy fractional shares of 200+ stocks, bonds, and ETFs‚Äîwith no add-on trading commissions*. We offer personal, retirement, and custodial (for children under 18) investing accounts.

Unlimited Education

Stash Learn can help you become a finance whiz. Read investing learning guides, stay up to date on financial news, and get tips on saving, budgeting, and investing.

Automatic Saving & Investing

Auto-Stash is always included. Save spare change with Round-Ups. Save effortlessly with Smart-Stash. Or try investing regularly with Set Schedule.

*Promotion subject to T&C. Limit one cash reward per user. Promotion can't be combined w/ certain other promotions. Direct Deposit $300 in 30 day period to be eligible. See T&C: http://bit.ly/2Tedjjt 

**You‚Äôll bear fees/expenses reflected in pricing of ETFs you invest in and may incur ancillary fees charged by Stash or its custodian not in monthly subscription price.

¬ß Early access to direct deposit depends on deposit verification & when Green Dot Bank gets notice from employer. May vary between pay periods.

comments: IMPORTANT READ!!! Before you go and sign up make sure this is what you want to do. I created an account on 3/18/20 and during the process when you give your debit/credit they say they will not charge you but they do indeed even if you don't link your bank account to your profile so be forewarned this company's app is very deceptive it will charge you for whatever subscription you choose. I explained this to customer service that the charge was not authorized but they did not care or refund me

If you're a pro looking for a super streamlined investment app with all the bells and whistles, look elsewhere. Stash is a no-nonsense long haul investment tool with educational media for people who want to invest their money without having to invest their lives in chasing market statistics. I love their no-nonsense approach to simple investing, and I plan to stick with them for the long haul

It is true giving it 3 stars for now only because I don't see how you can withdraw the funds from your investments into your bank card if needed especially in these times unlike your competitor app (Acorns) just went to check it out and you could withdraw from your invested funds into your bank account with them. Do you think that is a wise financial option for the app user there's an obvious wall there to get to my funds if need be help me understand what is this overlooked fact please

Awesome app. Great for beginners wanting to learn about investing as well as seasoned vets. Their FB page group is one of the most respectful and helpful bunch of ppl I've met online thus far. The only reason I didn't rate five stars is there are still some small glitches myself and others are experiencing from time to time. So there is a little room for improvement, but these are minor compared to the extensive and expansive options this app offer's, along with a strong support FB group.

DON'T GET STASH!! They locked my already-existing account months ago for no reason. Made me jump through hoops to unlock it (uploading docs). The upload page didn't work. Support is awful; once they hung up on me. I was told to email the docs. I did. Nothing. When I call, they say they need more docs or more time to review them. (Why?) I just sent my ss card and they're saying the res is bad, but higher res won't email. Excuses! I still have no access to my portfolio at all and no recourse.

title: Cowrywise - Save and Invest Securely.
description:
Cowrywise is a free digital personal finance app for savings and investment. Cowrywise helps you save and invest money easily. It allows you to automate your regular savings and investments while earning competitive returns better than your bank's savings account. Welcome to the smart way to save and invest.

The Cowrywise App allows you to:

Save and invest for your future:
We help you automatically save and invest towards achieving your target goals.
‚óè You can save and invest as little as 100 Naira/day, week or month with our Periodic Plan.
‚óè You can use our Life Goals to save towards education, housing, vacation, retirement or your business.
‚óè You can save and invest your spare change by making one-time savings into any of your goals.
‚óè You can Invest in a diversified safe portfolio of financial instruments including government bonds and treasury bills built by experts and recommended for you!

Diversify:
‚óè Invest in mutual funds from top investment firms in Nigeria.

Save on your own terms:
‚óè Setup automatic savings and investment on your schedule or invest whenever you have cash.

Earn daily competitive returns:
‚óè We give you better returns than your bank's savings account. The longer you keep your money locked, the higher your interest rate.

Bring your financial goals to life
‚óè Create life goals for the things you care about; family, education, vacation, home, and retirement. Cowrywise helps you to pursue your financial goals and achieve them easily!

Your savings and investments are secured
‚óè Your savings and investments are held in custody by Meristem Trustees Limited, registered with the Security and Exchange Commission(SEC). This means your money is not only professionally managed but also secured.
‚óè Your data and card information is safe! We do not store your card information as we work with a PCIDSS-compliant payment processor to handle all our customers‚Äô card details.

Flexible withdrawals
‚óè Cowrywise saving plans are locked for a minimum of 3 months. You can lock them for longer to earn better returns. After the maturity of your plan, you can withdraw from your savings or roll the plan over to enjoy compound interest. 


Stay on top of your savings and investments
‚óè Cowrywise transparently gives you full details of your savings and investments up to the last Naira and Kobo. This helps you stay on top of your saving and investment goals every day.

24x7 Support
‚óè Within the App, you can chat with the Cowrywise support team or send us emails via support@cowrywise.com or give us a call or reach us via Facebook, Instagram or Twitter.  We respond very fast.

recentChanges:
New year, fresh features:
- Download investment confirmation letter and plan account statement for those embassy visa appointments.
- Change your phone number in-app
Updated:
- Being a Nigerian comes with a lot of struggles already and withdrawals are no longer one.
- No hidden surprises! Dollar fund exchange rates and processing fees are now more transparent.
- Watch your money grow ‚Äî literally! Check your returns on individual investments and plans.
comments: A lot of changes need to be made, for example, when you're saving a card, the button should be deactivated till the whole process either fails or succeds, also after I saved 10k, I got an error message and then tried later, still got an error message, just to be debited twice even though I only planned to save 10k, I ended up adding 20k. You still need to test your app for different scenarios

I'm really enjoying this app, it really makes me wanna keep saving and saving. I highly recommend it to anyone that struggles with saving. I also love the interest I get just for saving with them on a daily basis, better than keeping it in my bank account that they end up taking unnecessary maintenance fees. I'm saving till the end of 2022, so I haven't tried withdrawing yet, so I'll probably update on this in 2 years time. üòÉ

The app is so easy to use and stress free... The only issue i have is the charges... If u want to buy a mutual fund there is a fee 1.5% charged on the amount u want to purchase and that looks small but it gets big when u are investing big... And also the charge for withdrawal... I really dont see the use in it.

I love how interactive the app feels and the clean interface. Please, can you implement the function of multiple stash. I am sure a lot of people would love that idea. I wanted to save my friend's money in a separate stash but I could not do that. Thanks in advance.

Cool app with a sleek interface and smooth operation. But I think the minimum maturity date for savings should be reduced from 3 months. What if I want to be accessing my savings on a monthly basis? I think having a month as the minimum maturity date for daily savings will be cool...

title: Money Saving Tips
description:
Are you an impulse buyer and always regret your buy after you see the bill? Do you always to save money but end up spending them? 

Are you a youngster just out of school and always find it difficult to handle save it for the right occasion, then you need our app to get all the right savings done.

Our app covers several essential categories which take care of your needs. We provide a pre-defined checklist and also allow you to customize features according to your needs and requirements.

This app also provides you options where you can invest your savings and let it grow
 This app will organize and take into account

1.       Ways to Save Money

3.       Budgeting Tips

12.   Ways to Save Money on Food
13.   Importance of Saving Money

If you enjoy your saving experience and want to share it with your friends and family then we will help you with that.

We let you know the correct way to invest your money and let you grow.
This app is great for children as it helps them build the right habit of saving money and gain profit throughout their lives.

So what are you waiting for, download the app now and get going‚Ä¶

We have EBook Recommendations as well as a place to submit your own tips and get a chance to be featured in this app.

UPDATED REGULARLY
FREE FOR LIMITED PERIOD ONLY

title: Savings Calculator
description:
It doesn't matter how much you make. It matters how much you save. Savings Calculator is designed to enlighten you the power of savings. It is a 2-in-1 calculator, Savings and CD (Certificate of Deposit) Calculator. Set your savings goal with Savings Calculator and find out what it takes to reach your goal. From time to time, it may be better to save in a CD account. Use CD Calculator to estimate how much you can earn in interest.


KEY FEATURES

1. Include 2 calculators: Savings Calculator and CD Calculator

2. Easy to use, allowing quick inputs and calculation. Use Savings Calculator to set savings goal, calculate monthly savings and time it takes to reach your goal. Use CD Calculator to estimate your gain in interest and to compares CD's with different interest rate.

3. Schedule table details interest earned and balance over time

4. Graphs show both balance by month with monthly savings desired and balance by month with monthly savings required to reach your goal within the specified time frame.

5. Support multiple compounding type in CD Calculator, including compound daily, monthly, quarterly, semi-annually and annually.

6. Ability to save your savings accounts for future reference.

7. Many more features, plus elegant design you need to check out to see.

title: 52 Weeks Challenge - Free
description:
This app is based on the well known challenge that aims at saving money. The idea is simple and suitable for those who are not able to plan and save. Certainly, this is a great way to save money through the year.

The challenge consists in saving a small amount of money per week. In the first week you save $1, on the next, $2, always adding the amount of the previous week. At the end of the challenge, after 52 weeks, which means a year, you will have $1,378 to help your Christmas shopping or with that vacation trip or whatever you`d want to do with your money.

Following this simple rule, you can save money in a fun way.

Do you think you can do that?

love this app. I've downloaded on every phone. Great for motivation whole saving money! plus i like the sound it makes when adding money :)

title: Albert: Save and Spend Smarter
description:
YOUR FRIEND IN FINANCE
Combining human guidance with cutting-edge technology, Albert automates your financial life ‚Äî so you can be free to enjoy it. Build savings, meet bills, end the overspending cycle and develop your financial IQ, right from the palm of your hand.

Download now to see why Forbes, Huffington Post, The New York Times and others have recommended Albert.

INVEST FROM ANYWHERE
Take your money to the next level with Albert Investments. Even if you have zero experience, you can put your money to work with commission-free investments.

Let Albert customize an automatic, diversified portfolio for you or mix and match to build your own.

SAVING GOALS IN REACH
Whether you want to pay off debt or book a dream vacation, Albert puts your goals in reach with automatic savings. We identify dollars you won't miss throughout the week, then set them aside for what's important.

GENIUS ADVICE + HUMAN WISDOM
Meet Albert Genius: a revolutionary feature offering guidance from our team of financial experts, or "geniuses."

Our geniuses are real people, not bots, with knowledge that covers most financial areas. They work alongside the app to improve your financial health and provide personalized advice.

Questions about investment plans? Meeting your bills? Paying off credit cards? Send us a text and we'll get to work.

Some topics our geniuses cover: Budgeting ‚Ä¢ Credit cards ‚Ä¢ College savings ‚Ä¢ Insurance ‚Ä¢ Investments ‚Ä¢ Debt ‚Ä¢ Retirement ‚Ä¢ Student loans

ALWAYS WORKING FOR YOU
We work in the background to spot unfamiliar charges, find extra savings and identify bills to lower. We send smart alerts in real-time, putting an end to financial surprises so you can stay on top of your money.

PRAISE FROM THE PRESS
‚ÅÉ ‚ÄúThe Albert app provides a personalized savings account and can look at car insurance policies and credit cards to find better deals. Banks are racing to catch up with such digital advances." ‚Äî NEW YORK TIMES

‚ÅÉ "Dying for an app that takes the math out of budgeting? Albert would be the best choice for you." ‚Äî FORBES

‚ÅÉ "For a clear picture of where my spending is going, access to advice and suggestions for where to improve, I‚Äôll definitely stick with Albert." ‚Äî HUFFINGTON POST

FEATURES
‚Ä¢ A custom financial plan
‚Ä¢ Our on-demand support team of real financial geniuses
‚Ä¢ Albert Savings: the cutting-edge feature created to help reach your goals faster
‚Ä¢ Albert Investments: our commission-free service that helps anyone become an investor
‚Ä¢ Smart alerts for rising bills, bank fees and new subscription charges
‚Ä¢ Automatic account syncing puts all your finances in one clean interface
‚Ä¢ Thousands of supported U.S. financial institutions
‚Ä¢ 24-7 account monitoring for fraud and fees

SECURITY
‚Ä¢ Your peace of mind is our highest priority.
‚Ä¢ Albert uses cutting-edge technology to protect your most sensitive information.

INSURANCE
‚Ä¢ Funds in your Albert Savings account are FDIC-insured. Should anything happen to the member bank or company holding your savings, you'll be insured for up to $250,000 of your money in the account.

‚Ä¢ Funds in your Albert Investments account are SIPC-protected. This is a more limited protection against the loss of securities and cash held at a member firm up to $500,000 in the event the firm fails. This does not protect the securities you own from going down in value if the market changes.

Albert Investments, LLC is a Registered Investment Advisor. Albert can only offer investment services to clients where Albert and its representatives are properly licensed. The content posted is solely to inform. Investments are risky: you could lose money, and past performance is no guarantee of future returns. Albert is only available to U.S. residents who are 18+. For more information, see our Form ADV Part II and our Terms of Use at albert.com.

Your Genius just got a bit smarter: introducing Albert Investments!
‚Ä¢ No matter your budget or experience, put your money to work with our commission-free guided investing service.

comments: So far, so good! I've received my advanced after being asked a bunch of questions including asking your SSN just letting you know. They do ask that you put back at least $1 for what they call a rainy day fund which is withdrawn from your account attached monthly as well. I have not however used the Gold feature of the app, which actually asks that you expend more money to interact with that and I don't need that feature anyway.

I have been using this app for about a year before deciding to rate it, and it definitely deserves a great rating. Using the app you have your own savings account accessible from your phone. You can set up multiple folders and decide which you want your money to go into and how much you want. You can set up an automatic transfer where Albert will pull a small portion of funds from your checking account and put it into your Albert account. Those are just 2 perks to this app, check it out.

It's been almost 2 weeks, and their apps' system has not updated my account to use instant. They keep saying "wait 2-3 business days". Whilst telling me that " our system usually fix this error in the timeframelisted above. But this situation is going to take a week. This happened right after they approved me for $75. The system somehow works when they charged my card the monthly fee ü§îü§î . This app is doing some illegal stuff. And needs to be shut down. Until their system can work properly.

Albert is very straightforward and easy to understand and use. They have a lot of cool features that you can take advantage of, and some that you normally would have to pay for at traditional banks to be able to utilize, but are free with Albert. Very convenient and a great job creating it. On another note: Finally a competitor to Dave. Don't get me wrong, they are both incredibly apps, my thoughts are that competition drives innovation which means more awesome features for the users to enjoy.

I have had this app for a few months and I love it. It doesn't say it will advance me money I am not qualified for, like the other applications. It asks what my longterm goals are, it sets up a rainy day fund for me as requested, but they look at my paychecks and what bills are coming out and what I can spare and puts it in there for me which is nice. By far the best app of this nature I have used. Actually this is the first google app I think I have ever left a review for.

title: Long Game Savings
description:

comments: This game was great at first but then the games stopped loading and now nothing will load including the app it itself. It just goes black... Too risky to put your money into an app that glitches so much!!! Now, I don't know if I'll ever get my money back and that's almost $100!!! Plus you never win anything on their games. They were fun to play at first but after having this app for years and not winning anything but 5 cents, I'm extremely disappointed...

A literal waste of time & space! I will begin by saying that this app takes up 712.1 MB worth of space in my phone (& I clean out my cache regularly!)! If that alone isn't enough, I'll add the fact that you'd have better luck hitting up your local casino! The winnings are peanuts & primarily on the days of deposits. The aim here is to get you hooked on the "gambling" aspect of it hoping you'll deposit one after another. They make it sound SO MUCH better than is really the case!

I was hopeful bc customer service seems to answer quickly but they never actually fix any issues, do NOT use your card to get any instant transfers bc they will take the instant transfer but then they will hold your money for 2-5 days , I cant ever link any bank, their system rejects it , this has also gone ignored along with a request to close my account entirely, huge disappointment

Less than excellent customer service, no clear cut answers to your questions, you will simply be referred to an FAQ article, as though you can't find them yourself, delays to answering even when they just refer you to an FAQ, drawn out transfer periods.

Not good. Have followed all the instructions 3 times and still have no access to the app. 5 days and no response from them. Gave up on the app and have uninstalled it. Never heard from the team regarding the problem

title: Challenge 30 days Money saving. Save by playing
description:
Don't you think you can save money every day? That's because you haven't tried our 30-day money-saving challenge yet.

Take it as a game and you'll see how following the challenge you'll reach the end of the 30 days with an amount of money you can't imagine.

Define how much you want to save the first day and from there each day we will mark how much you have to save.
Each day the savings will increase according to the savings defined on the first day.

It is very simple, consists of saving for example 1 euro the first day of the month, 2 euros the second, 3 euros the third and so on until you save 30 euros. This simple strategy, well executed, will allow us to save 465 euros in a month.

0.5 on the first day ‚Üí You will save 232.5 after 30 days.
1 on the first day ‚Üí You will save 465 in 30 days.
1.5 on the first day ‚Üí You will save after 30 days
2 on the first day ‚Üí You will save 930 to 30 days.

Are you surprised by these numbers?
30 days saving a little money every day allows you to have a good amount of money at the end of the month.

With a very simple operation, just enter each day and we will mark you how much you have to save that day, as easy as that.
Until you save what corresponds to one day you will not be able to spend the next.

If you follow the challenge every day you'll have access to extra content.
Every day you will be able to access extra advice on new ways of saving in your daily life, so you can still get a higher amount of savings proposed in the challenge.

After reading all this you still don't dare to participate in the 30 days saving money challenge?

In the 30 days saving challenge, the strategy and the time limit are closely related: the idea of saving a little today, a little more tomorrow, a little more the day after tomorrow and so on until the last day of the month. Because saving a certain amount on an isolated day is easy, but keeping that savings plan a week is complicated; doing it for a whole month is a real challenge.

Numerous international media have echoed this curious method, which adapts well to the way many savers act because it is flexible, within being quite a challenge, because it only lasts one month, but can be extended other months, and because it allows us to improve savings day by day, or if we decide to repeat the challenge, in later months.

The key decision is to choose correctly how much to save on the 1st day of the month, because it will condition to successfully overcome the challenge. Do not forget that it is not a question of saving one euro a day, but of increasing savings by one euro a day.

What is it for?

The usefulness of the challenge is very clear: to plan our savings in a period of one month to have a certain amount available after that time. But the advantages of the challenge go further:
It adds a greater degree of difficulty each day, and at the same time, it motivates us to know how much we have saved.
It allows us to learn what our daily savings are like and improve every day.
allows us to know which day the challenge becomes too complicated and to readjust the quantity better to start the first day.
It is flexible, as it allows us to choose how much we increase savings each day (D) and how many months we want to repeat the challenge,
As the goal is on the last day of the month, when we get to that day, we can consider whether to continue for another month, or whether we have already reached our savings target and stopped the challenge.


You can consult the privacy policy of the application "30 days saving money challenge" in:
https://30dayschallengesforyou.blogspot.com/2019/06/privacy-policy-30-days-saving-money.html

recentChanges: initial version
comments: So far I love this app. I've been using for 11 days. I just wish there was an option for a higher savings for starting day. Highest is $2. The most you can save in this app is $930 a month. Unless you choose to contribute more on your own. Besides that it really helps you to be knowledgeable on your savings daily.
Looks good.... I been use it to test. I WOULD LIKE THE VERSION NO ADD.. Also this app is very nice job but when you turn off the phone all game you have in desappear ....
Very easy to follow and keep track of e finances in e bank.....
Great app! User friendly, easy to save.
Love this app so much easier and simpler

title: Fundometer - A Fun Savings App
description:
Welcome to Fundometer, your personal fundraising thermometer and saving tool.

It's always better to save up for the things you want than spending money you don't have, and there's no better way to save than with a fundraising thermometer. No matter whether you are saving for a new gadget, a new renovation, an appliance, or even a house, Fundometer will help keep you on track towards your goals, just like your own fundraising thermometer or piggy bank.

Create thermometers for all your goals and then add funds directly from the thermometer display. Add funds when you get paid, when you get money as a present, or whenever you feel like putting some of your hard earned money aside. Share your thermometers online and show your friends what you're saving up for. You can now also keep track of who has contributed to each of your goals. Let's see your piggy bank do that! You can also put use Fundometer to put a fundraising thermometer widget right on your homescreen so you can see your savings progress every time you use your phone.

Fundometer does not handle your money in any way. Instead of giving us your bank information, simply use Fundometer to keep track of portions of your existing savings whether they are in savings accounts, investments, or piggy banks.

For free you can create up to three thermometers using any of the three default thermometers and any of the 6 backgrounds to personalize it. In app upgrades are available unlocking the following features:

(Regular prices)
- Unlimited Thermometers $3.99
- Remove Ads $1.99
- More Thermometer Colors $1.99


Known Bugs:
- Adding item pictures from the gallery/photos doesn't seem to work in Android 5.0 Lollipop, (fixed in V 2.2.1)
- The settings screen sometimes crashes on tablets running Android 4.4 and above, (fix coming in V 2.2.2)
- Problem with recurring contributions.

comments: I found this to use for goal setting. It's a bit clunky and it should allow to adjust font so that numbers fit in the screen versus the page being cut off on my phone. It could be very useful helping me to stay on track with my personal financial goals if the formatting was better.
I've had this app for about three years and I've emailed the developer about 5 times and they never reply to you. That app does not upload background photos!!
Glitchy as hell! I had the app for all of 5 minutes and it crashed 3 times.
Did not live up to my expectations. The graphics are bland and it looks like a 1st year college tech students project
paid for no ads still had ads and I couldn't upload my own photo

title: Self - Build Credit While You Save
description:
The Self credit app (formerly known as Self Lender) is a way to build credit history while you save*. Build credit with Self, even if you have a low credit score (or no credit score!)

Over 500,000 people have used Self‚Äôs Credit Builder Account to build credit and save more than $300 million. With the Self Visa¬Æ Secured Credit Card, you have even more opportunities to build credit after you get started.

How does it work? Think of it as a plan that builds credit while you save, starting at $25** per month.

1. Apply for a Credit Builder Account. Your money is safe and secure in a bank account.***
2. Pay off your Credit Builder Account in 12-24 months.** You can choose the payment term and dollar amount that best fits your budget.
3. Each on-time monthly payment builds credit history and adds to your savings*. Your monthly payments are reported to all three credit bureaus while the principal gets saved in a bank account.***
4. Unlock your savings. Once you‚Äôve paid off your Credit Builder Account, your money unlocks and comes back to you (minus fees and interest).

BUILD CREDIT. SAVE MONEY*
With an active Credit Builder Account, your payments are reported to all three credit bureaus.
 
CREDIT SCORE MONITORING INCLUDED****
With the Self credit app, you can check your credit score at no cost. The mobile credit tracker!
 
NO HARD CREDIT PULL
Self does not do a ‚Äúhard pull‚Äù credit check when you create an account. In fact, no credit score is required at all!
 
SECURE ACCOUNTS
All accounts use two-factor authentication, 256-bit encryption, and fraud detection to protect your money and private information.
 
UNLOCK THE SELF VISA¬Æ SECURED CREDIT CARD
Have an active Credit Builder Account in good standing, make at least 3 credit builder account monthly payments in full and have $100 or more in savings progress and you could unlock access to a secured credit card ‚Äì no extra deposit and no hard credit check needed.
 
WHY PEOPLE LOVE SELF
‚ÄúLove love love this program and this app! In eight months my credit went up a hundred and nine points Super happy and can't wait to renew once the first year is up‚Äù - customer Debbie G. Individual results may vary.
 
Featured on ABC News, USA Today, Newsweek, TechCrunch and NerdWallet
 
TERMS
When you download and use Self, you agree to the Terms of Service at: https://www.self.inc/terms-of-service

PRIVACY POLICY
You may review Self‚Äôs privacy policy at: https://www.self.inc/privacy-policy
 
*Savings are minus fees and interest. Results are not guaranteed. Improvement in your credit score is dependent on your specific situation and financial behavior. Failure to make monthly minimum payments by the payment due date each month may result in delinquent payment reporting to credit bureaus which may negatively impact your credit score. This product will not remove negative credit history from your credit report.
 
**Sample products are $25 monthly loan payment at a $520 loan amount with a $9 administration fee, 24 month term and 15.92% Annual Percentage Rate; $150 monthly loan payment at a $1663 loan amount with a $9 administration fee, 12 month term and 15.91% Annual Percentage Rate. Please check the pricing page in the Self mobile app or www.self.inc for current pricing.
 
***Credit Builder Account ‚Äî proceeds are held in a deposit account until maturity
 
****Credit scores will only be available to customers who our third-party vendor is able to validate.

All Credit Builder Accounts are issued by Lead Bank, Member FDIC, Equal Housing Lender, Sunrise Banks, N.A. Member FDIC, Equal Housing Lender or Atlantic Capital Bank, N.A. Member FDIC, Equal Housing Lender. Subject to ID Verification. Individual borrowers must be a U.S. Citizen or permanent resident and at least 18 years old. Valid bank account and Social Security Number are required. All loans are subject to ID verification. All loans subject to approval.

The Self Visa¬Æ Credit Card is issued by Lead Bank, Member FDIC, Equal Housing Lender.

Thank you for using Self! This app update includes:

comments: Awesome app. Definitely helps that stupid loophole of " to have good credit, you have to have credit already in order to build credit". This app and many others alike help young people like me get started on building credit out of nothing. Very happy with it. The credit card though, is there anyway to increase the credit without paying off the balance just yet? The whole point is keep paying over the year or two to build said credit, but a higher credit limit would be nice.

My score has gone up 90 points in the last 3-4 months with this. I love how simple it is and I've told so many people about it. I recommend this if you're looking for a low-cost payment to increase your credit. It's not so much about how much you pay, it's the history of on time payments that help. I chose to pay the lowest amount for 2 years, by the end I'll have 2 years of on time payments.

This is the most amazing app ever for anyone who needs to build/rebuild their credit. I had filled ch. 7 bankruptcy and been discharged about a year ago now. Needless to say, my credit was looking rough. Now, after 2 months of payments, credit is up 136 points! I don't know how it works, but it works and that's all I care about. Amazing service being provided here with equal opportunities for all.

Since I was already working on my credit prior to getting the CD (Dec 19) and CC (Feb 20) thru them, I can't say for sure which did what or anything at all but my credit has gone up at the minimum 50 points already! But the app is very useful and user friendly. Has an answer for pretty much everything I had a question regarding. I have the $150 12 month loan!

My credit went up a couple points after opening account. The thing that i do not like is the daily withdrawls that come out if my account. It is only pennies daily but after a year this will add up. I am sure it is some kind of interest or fees. I will finish off the term of the loan and will most likely be done with it but anything can happen. I have only had this account for two months. So a little early to tell

title: Checkout 51: Gas Rewards & Grocery Cash Back
description:
Checkout 51 is a Cash Back app where you can get gas rewards and cash back that saves you tons of money on your favorite brands, groceries, and necessities. New fuel rewards where smart drivers can get their gas cash back and grocery offers on everything you buy.

Find grocery offers and fuel rewards and start saving money with coupons and Cash Back! New deals are available on everyday items from all your favorite stores. Grocery offers and cash rewards are updated every Thursday!

Gas cash back? Now, members will be able to earn up to 25¬¢/gallon on gas purchases. Earn Cash Back at gas stations like Shell, Chevron, BP, Exxon, Mobile and more. Earn Cash Back on Gas every time you fuel up, every week!

Grocery offers and cash back rewards are right at your fingertips. Get grocery promo savings, cash back offers and more right from your phone. Grocery offers are easy to redeem, just snap a photo of your receipt and earn cash back rewards.

Save money with these simple steps:
1. Browse grocery offers that are updated every Thursday
2. Buy groceries and other products from any store
3. Take a photo of your receipt to redeem your offer
4. Earn cash rewards!

Get the savings app that gives cash back on everyday items today with Checkout 51!

Savings apps mean no more:
- Couponing books that waste paper
- Grocery offer apps that don‚Äôt have the brands you love
- Clipping in store coupons before shopping
- Arguing with the cashier and holding up the rest of the line

Checkout 51 Features:

Store Coupon App:
- Grocery offers are updated every Thursday to find the coupons you need!
- Save money at your favorite stores like Target, Walmart, and CVS!
- We have coupons in every category for money saving opportunities

Earn Cash Back Instantly from Your Receipt:
- Save your receipt, take a picture of it and earn Cash Back
- Send your receipt for money back and you can cash out once you reach $20 in savings
- View your savings balance any time!

Gas Rewards
- Earn cash back rewards when you fill up your tank
- Fuel rewards at the gas stations you frequent
- Gas rebates to save at the pump
- Gas prices comparison to help you find the best deal on gasoline
- You have 4 hours from the time you add the offer to fill up your tank, so try to only add offers when you‚Äôre ready to head to the gas station. Note: all gas offers must be purchased with a debit or credit card.
- Upload your receipt within 24 hours.
- Wait and watch the savings roll in!

Grocery Offers at Your Favorite Stores:
- Rewards and money back from your favorite stores
- Cash Back savings! Earn from: Walmart, Target, CVS, Kroger, Safeway, Walgreens, HEB,
Publix, Costco, Whole Foods, Sam‚Äôs Club, Babies R Us and more!
- Sort grocery offers by store and category to make shopping easy

Savings on Your Favorite Products:
- Shop and save on grocery items like: Mountain Dew, Coca Cola, Gatorade, milk, cheese, bread and more
- Savings on household items like: Huggies, Pampers, Charmin, Bounty, Tide, Glade and more
- Save the offers that interest you to help quickly find them later

Search for Deals:
- Search items you‚Äôll need this week and save money!
- Checkout 51‚Äôs new Search Bar lets you instantly find deals without scrolling

Stop coupon hunting and earn Cash Back on everything from grocery to household items. Save money and time with Checkout 51 to put more savings in your wallet!

Checkout 51 uses your location minimally while in the background to deliver in-store offers to you at the right time. Note that continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.

If you need any support, please contact us at: https://www.checkout51.com/contact

For California Residents - Please follow this link to exercise your right to opt out of the sale of your personal information under the California Consumer Privacy Act - "Do Not Sell My Personal Information" [www.checkout51.com/CCPA-do-not-sell.]

recentChanges: Bug fixes and other minor improvements.
comments: So far the worst of the cash back apps I've used. Selected rebates/cash back options disappear shortly after adding them to your list, half the time they don't honor the rebates. Actually filed a rebuttal on one claim they denied where the product was clearly on the receipt, even circled the item on the receipt, which showed up clear as day and was within their requirements for redemption, and they declined it a second time. Don't waste your time on this app. Would've given a 0 star if I could.

Can't earn money on this app anymore. It used to be easier but now there seems to be less diversity on what rebates are offered. It's always the same products, which are things I've never heard of or things I don't buy. The stuff I use has been taken off the app. Wish they would add different product offers

Had the app for 3 years and never earned a check because the items are always the same. I give up wasting memory for this app & checking in for savings on any item I may use. Have other apps with more variety suited to my needs.

Not much choice on the app for about 1-2 years. When it just came out was way better. I barely can found some deals to use. Whenever I found something immidiematly gone. 0 remaining so I can't use it again. I hope they can pull in more products and quantities for users to really get this app useful.

This app is very limited and does not have much to offer when you go to the store or to get gas it only makes you go to certain gas stations which is the worst wish they would update the app to get more items available out there that people buy this why I use Ibotta it has a lot to over when I go shopping

title: Tally Save: Automated Savings
description:
Tally Save is the only app that makes saving money effortless and rewarding ‚Äî all for free. Set aside as little as $5 a week and earn points for saving instead of spending. Start saving for your future in less than 1 minute!

ALWAYS 100% FREE
You deserve to keep your savings. That‚Äôs why Tally Save is 100% free. No membership trials or premium access fees. Just you and your rewards in a free, easy-to-use app.

START WITH A SAVINGS GOAL
Need a rainy day fund? Want to pay down credit card debt? Choose what you want to save for, and Tally Save will automatically help make it happen. Plus, if you connect a credit card, Tally Save will automatically make an extra payment to your card at the end of each month with the money you‚Äôve saved.

AUTOMATICALLY SET ASIDE MONEY
Select how much money you‚Äôd like to set aside every week. You pick the day and the amount, and Tally Save transfers it from your checking account to an FDIC-insured account. Get started by setting aside as little as $5 a week and watch your savings grow.

GET REWARDS
With Tally Save, there are lots of ways to earn points. Set aside money? Points. Reach your monthly goal? Points. Refer a friend to Tally Save? Lots of points!

Redeem your points for gift cards or donate to a cause. Get gift cards to more than 50 big-name retailers, including Amazon, Chipotle, Starbucks, Target, Uber, Walmart and Whole Foods.

WITHDRAW AT ANY TIME
Your money is secured in an FDIC-insured account with Tally Save. Withdraw your money at any time ‚Äî no strings attached.

SEE WHAT OTHERS SAY
Cheddar: ‚ÄúTally Save is designed to motivate users to save by letting them earn points they can redeem for gift cards to 50 of the largest U.S. retailers.‚Äù (1)

VentureBeat: ‚ÄúTally Save members can connect credit cards and make extra payments to these cards at the beginning of each month, using the money they‚Äôve predesignated for savings.‚Äù (2)

Fortune: Fintech Startup Tally Debuts the World‚Äôs ‚ÄòOnly Free Automated Savings Service‚Äô (3)

1. http://cheddar.com/media/tally-launches-app-that-rewards-saving-not-spending-6
2. http://venturebeat.com/2019/05/30/tally-save-rewards-you-for-saving-money-with-points-and-gift-cards/
3. http://fortune.com/2019/03/14/fintech-startup-tally-no-fee-savings-account/

comments: This app is awesome! I'm the kind of person where I know that it's responsible to put away money but it's extremely hard for me for a bunch of reasons. The automation of this app is really helpful for me, I can look at my bank account and know that the money I need to save is gone. I like the weekly feature as well because it does keep me generally responsible - I know I need to keep some money in my account and it helps me rethink purchases.

title: PiggyBank: Savings Goal Tracker, Save Money
description:
Save money in you piggy bank, or you take money out from it, record it using this app, where you can visualize your savings progress and in addition challenge yourself to meet all the deadlines and goal that you have set to full fill.

**You can save money by different modes :
üí∞I know how much I want to save (with planning) :
- Create a goal and set the specific amount you want to save in such format like daily, weekly, bi-weekly, or monthly basis. Meanwhile you can withdraw too from savings.

üí∞I just want to save (without planning) :
- Deposit or withdraw money from your saving (piggy bank) any time and keep a history of all your transactions (you can also edit history).

**Why to use PiggyBank: Savings Goal Tracker, Save Money app
- Visualize your progress with graphs
- Deposit or withdraw money from your piggy bank as per your need
- No limit for creating goals, create as many goals as you need
- Easy to use and simple UI design
- Statistics shows how much you saved, total transaction, last 7 days savings, average saving per day etc.
- The challenge encourages weekly savings of a certain amount for a certain times
- Keep track of your savings and get motivated to achieve your desire goals 
- Best for Money Saving, savings goal tracker and set your piggy goals

title: Wizely-Save More Spend Less, Powered by ICICI Bank
description:
Say hello to Wizely - One of India‚Äôs fastest growing financial apps to help you save more & spend better. We‚Äôve helped over half a million Indians make smart financial decisions and go after their life goals, checking them off, step by step, one by one.


Features:
Link your ICICI Bank Account in seconds and begin creating Saving Plans immediately


Balance By Month End uses your past spending behavior to predict your account balance by the end of the month. Spend smarter and never run out of cash


Create flexible Saving Plans and save any amount any time


Smart personalised AI alerts tell you what to save and when: gain access to a holistic view of your financial journey. More savings per month and more visibility into your finances


Earn interest & get rewarded for saving & meeting your financial goals 


Choose Auto Saving rules and watch your savings grow without even realizing


Have an emergency? Withdraw your money anytime 


Transfer securely and safely with Bank level security
With Wizely, you can manage your cash effectively with smart alerts & projections, so that you never run out of money at the end of the month. You can plan your savings & finances by setting up auto-saving while also earning interest. And what‚Äôs more - our AI-powered personalized guidance is custom-made for you & your spending behavior, meaning you‚Äôll get the right kind of friendly reminders to keep you on track to meet your goals. Wizely is powered by ICICI Bank and runs on 128-bit encryption, making every transaction safe and secure.

Wizely is the financial assistant you never knew you needed! Download today & get started on the path to your financial happiness.


NOTE: Wizely is currently available for ICICI Savings Account holders only. 
Coming soon: Create a new savings bank account from within the app in minutes!

title: Saving Challenges (FREE)
description:
Heard of the 52 Week Saving Challenge?

Even if you haven't, this app will get you started! Simple and easy to use you'll be turning those pounds into lots of pounds before you know it!

Had a go at the challenges before? Found them a little inflexible? - That's not a problem here; I found the same thing and found that many others did too. 
So decided to create my own version and add some flexibility so you too can choose from many different methods to achieve the same goal!

For Example:
-Keep track of what you‚Äôre saving for by entering your own titles and descriptions.
-Track payments in reverse (make the larger payments first then work down) Very handy as we can find by the end of the year money gets a bit more difficult to put away!
-Make Savings Weekly, Fortnightly or Every 4 Weeks (handy for those that can't save till pay day) just choose your pay date to start; select the frequency and the app will work the dates out for you.
-You can add optional reminders to make those savings.
-Think of something you want? Let us know! We will try our best to get the feature added for you.

New Feature by popular demand:-
You now have an option to save a set amount that you define over any of the payment frequencies.  I.e. Save $10 every week for 52 weeks.

We are constantly looking to improve this App for you! Please give us any constructive feedback and we will see what we can do :)
Enjoy your savings!

--------------------------------------------------------

PLEASE NOTE: This app is designed to make tracking your savings easier and DOES NOT have or request access to your banking/savings information.

title: Clarity Money - Manage Your Budget
description:
Clarity Money is your AI-powered financial champion. 

Our free app uses machine learning to analyze your personal finances and help you make smart decisions about your money. Take control of your budget and expenses and discover ways to save more with help from Clarity Money.

Clarity Money can help you...
- Save time: Organize your bills with automated expense tracking
- Save money: Cancel subscriptions & automate your savings with a Marcus Online Savings Account
- Stay organized: Track your budget, spending, savings, debt and investment accounts in one place

How our AI powered financial management app works:
- Quickly link your financial accounts to Clarity Money. Thousands of financial institutions are supported, including Chase, Bank of America, Capital One, Wells Fargo, Citi, and American Express.
- The app uses data to give you a clear view into your financial choices and tools to help take control of your financial life.
- Your information and data is protected by multi-level safeguards.

Clarity Money User Testimonials:
-"I feel that it really helps keep me accountable for my spending‚Ä¶it's rewarding to see the progress that I make in changing my spending habits."
-"Love being able to save money without thinking about it.‚Äù
-"You all are a much better alternative to my actual banking app....this greatly impacts my spending habits as I now have more of an idea where my money has been going..."

Clarity Money‚Äôs Press Accolades:
-"Clarity Money is an accurate name for this handy app that provides a literal sense of clarity as it helps you save money, plan budgets, track all of your expenses, monitor your credit score, and more." ‚Äì Buzzfeed
-‚ÄúClarity Money is [a] nicely designed budgeting app that makes routine financial tasks easy to execute.‚Äù Time.com
-"Clarity Money is a budgeting app that not only helps you put aside money into a savings account, but will also help you cancel any subscriptions you're not using..." -Mashable
-Featured as Apple‚Äôs ‚ÄúApp of the Day‚Äù on 7/10/18

Download Clarity Money today!

By downloading and using Clarity Money, you agree to our current Terms of Use (claritymoney.com/terms) and Privacy Policy (claritymoney.com/privacy).

title: HOW TO SAVE MONEY
description:
No matter where you are on your financial journey, you need to know that it‚Äôs possible for anyone to turn their financial life around. Sometimes all it takes is that first step in the right direction to get things moving in your favor. But, as with most things, sometimes that very first step is the hardest part.

That‚Äôs why we created this guide to start saving money today. None of these tactics will be life-changing on their own, but they can make quite a difference over time if you‚Äôre able to implement more than one. Some of these suggestions take just a few minutes, while others require a bit of regular effort. Still, they‚Äôre all incredibly simple ‚Äì anyone can do them.

Obviously, not all of these tips will apply to everyone. Just go through the list and find 10 or 15 that do apply to you and use them in your life. When you do, you may quickly find that you‚Äôre saving more money than you ever thought possible.

Included In This App:

- The Psychology of Money & Spending
- Save Money : Daily, Monthly, and Long Term
- 7 Ways To Get You Into The Psychology Of Saving Money
- 12 Unique Ways To Save Money
- 13 Ways To Save Money On A Low Income
- 100 Other Ways to Save Money
- Ways to Save Money Examples
---And More.

Sometimes the hardest thing about saving money is just getting started. It can be difficult to figure out simple ways to save money and how to use your savings to pursue your financial goals. This step-by-step guide to money-saving habits can help you develop a realistic savings plan.

App Features :

- In-Depth Guide & Explanations
- Easy To Read
- Simple Navigation
- Sharable Content

title: Fetch Rewards: Scan Receipts, Earn Gift Cards
description:
Fetch Rewards is shopping made more rewarding and waaay easier. That‚Äôs it. That‚Äôs what we do. Any questions?

Ok, ok, a little more about us: Fetch Rewards is a mobile savings and gift cards earning app that rewards you for the purchases you already make. Just snap pictures of your receipts to win gift cards and watch the rewards roll in. Life is complicated enough, so we do the legwork and bring the savings to you. summary: The easiest way to get free gift cards for shopping!
recentChanges: Shopping from home these days? We've got good news: Now you can earn points on eReceipts when you connect your email and/or Amazon accounts in the app.
comments: It takes a long time to earn rewards because maybe 40% of the receipts it has a problem reading and when you try to edit, there's no way to do so, so you lose those points. Good concept, just needs more work to make it easier and smoother to use . However, I did earn $5 from Amazon after just a couple mths of scanning receipts, so it's worth keeping, for now.

I love this app. Have been using it for over a year. The only thing is the bug needs to be fixed that has occurred in the last month or so where it doesn't recognize the store, time, date & total on most of the receipts I submit regardless of where they are from and I have to manually enter this info. Gets aggrevating. Fix this issue and it's perfect !

I see people complaining about how long it takes to earn points, but I haven't really noticed that. It's free money, so I'm really not going to complain about that. The problems I do have are related to the app itself. It crashes constantly. I have to restart at least twice per receipt. My second complaint is about ereceipts. I didn't really miss this feature until I got the email that it was available. I got super excited and tried to use it,only to read the fine print and see it was iOS only.

Fix your system. Still not scanning receipts properly and giving you points for certain items you buy. Scanned 2 tickets on 1 March and each stated that it was missing store name, date, and amount. Each of these tickets had this information. I manually put in this information on one ticket and it gave me 25 points and not the extra points on certain items. This is an ongoing problem. Getting ready to pull the plug on this unreliable rewards system. Fix it.

Pretty good app. I do notice some of my receipts need review that's ok. It needs to be clearly scanned so they can see the whole receipt. Store name, date and time are most import. You have 14 days to upload them. I hope to see myself actually get some free items or money off. Will come back when I get more points and give it a 5 star.(my receipts honestly were very clear once submitted you cant re-take or upload or fix maybe you can change that, I think that's a good idea to fix or change )

title: Best Ways to Save Money
description:
These days everything except our salaries are increase. The cost of food, gas, living expenses, etc, etc. Fortunately, there are strategies that we can implement to help cut our expenses and save money now. 

You would be amazed at how much you are actually spending if you add up your weekly credit card expenses. Maybe its that daily coffee at your local coffee joint or that breakfast bagle that you have to have? Simple soloutions such as bringing your own travel coffee mug or packing your lunch can help reduse those frivalous dollars spent. 

There are many budget planning templates available for free online that can help you to keep better track of how much money you are spending. Financial management is the key to getting debt free quicker and faster.  

Included in our Best Ways to Save Money
* Daily Spending
* Your Car
* Saving Money at Home and how to make a budget
* Miscellaneous Ways to Save
* and much much more

If you are looking to keep a little extra money in your pocket then our Best Ways to Save Money Guide is for you. Download your free copy today and start learning some fantastic ways to start saving money right away.

title: Savings Goals Tracker
description:
Savings Goals Tracker will help you stay motivated on saving money for your goals. The idea behind the app is very simple: have some financial goals, some items you want to buy. Record your goals in the app and start saving money. When you have collected enough money in your piggy bank to buy any of the goal you have specified the goals that you can afford are highlighted. Once you have bought the item you can mark the goal as completed.
The app will keep a log of all you goals and transactions and it is a very simple and fun way to keep track of your savings and goals!

title: Coupons.com ‚Äì Grocery Coupons & Cash Back Savings
description:
Save $100s with free grocery coupons and deals at your favorite stores like Walmart, Target, Kroger and Dollar General. You‚Äôll have access to hundreds of coupons on the brands you love, making saving money effortless. Best of all, you can manage all your grocery shopping and coupons right from your phone, in one single app, without ever relying on a printer or shuffling between multiple store apps.

Join the millions of shoppers who use the Coupons.com app to shop and save easily at your favorite grocery stores. Enjoy two ways to save: One, simply link your store loyalty cards to your Coupons.com account, then add coupons with a tap to save seamlessly at the register. The dollars fall off at purchase.

Two, if your store doesn‚Äôt have a loyalty card, get cash back after purchase. Just choose the coupons you like and add them to the stores you want to redeem them at‚Äìall in the app‚Äì then submit a picture of your receipt after purchase. After your purchase is verified, you‚Äôll get cash back in your PapPal account. So easy! 

No printing, no paper, no hassle‚Äîit‚Äôs a cinch now to save on food, baby and toddler items, pet food, medicine and personal care. We have coupons from all your favorite brands like Tide, Bounty, Cheerios, Kraft, Kellogg‚Äôs, General Mills, Campbell‚Äôs, Dole, Betty Crocker, M&M‚Äôs, Perdue, Crest, Pantene and more.

Here‚Äôs how it works:

1) After you download the free app, sign in to your Coupons.com account (or sign up if you‚Äôre new‚Äîit‚Äôs quick and easy).

2) Link your store loyalty cards to your Coupons.com account.  If your store doesn‚Äôt have a loyalty card, you can still save by using cash back grocery coupons‚Äîwe‚Äôll tell you how in a second.

3) Next, browse through 100s of free grocery coupons by store and add them with just a tap.

4) Load up your cart at the store and follow your shopping list in the app to make sure you‚Äôre using all the grocery coupons you‚Äôve chosen. 

5) Then save one of two ways: Instantly at checkout or after your purchase. Stores with loyalty cards give you instant savings, while other stores require a quick picture of your receipt. Simply send us the photo, we‚Äôll verify your purchase, then put cash into your PayPal account as soon as possible. The best part: You won‚Äôt have to wait to reach a minimum amount in order to get your money.

What you‚Äôll love:

‚Ä¢ Easily save $100s on your favorite brands with offers that are added daily. Plus, watch for Coupons.com-exclusive offers that you can redeem for free items, like bananas, coffee, or potatoes.

‚Ä¢ Tap-and-save simplicity with 100s of verified digital grocery, drug and discount store coupons from your favorite brands that you can use on your mobile device.

‚Ä¢ Add all your store loyalty cards to just one app! No need to juggle several cards or accounts. Once you link them to your Coupons.com app, all your grocery coupons will be in one spot, making grocery planning, shopping, and saving easier than ever.

‚Ä¢ No loyalty card at your store? No problem. Get cash back after purchase by simply adding coupons, making your purchase, then sending us a photo of your receipt after checkout. The best part: There‚Äôs no minimum purchase required to get cash back! 

‚Ä¢ Put away your scissors and never worry about forgetting your coupons. All your grocery savings will be digital, making the shopping and saving process easier and more organized for you.  However, don‚Äôt fret: If you still prefer to print your coupons, you can do so directly from the app.

If you‚Äôre looking for grocery savings at stores like Target, Walmart, Albertsons, Safeway, Winn-Dixe, Meijer, Food Lion and more, the Coupons.com app is the one-stop shop for all your grocery coupons, deals and savings.

Awards Won:
Appy, May 2017
Best Mobile App Awards, April 2017

We love our customers.
Having trouble with the app?
Contact our friendly support team and we'll get you back to saving in a snap: 
androidapp-support@coupons.com. 

Coupons.com is a Quotient brand.

recentChanges:
We improved our Receipt Upload process to make it even easier to get your cash back quickly.
And, as always, new coupons added to your favorite stores!
comments: Like the app but it gives me the blues when I was FORCED to set up my loyalty cards whether I wanted to or not. It didn't allow me to and it asked me for the phone number I used to sign up for my loyalty cards! I don't remember because that was so many years ago and I've switched phone numbers anyway

The Camera is blurry in the app via my samsung galaxy s9+. It did the same when the phone belonged to my son. It has since been reset and reinstalled, but the blurriness persists. I have to upload copies of the receipt from the my phones image gallery, which seems to rotate the receipt sideways no matter how I orient the image in gallery. Please fix. Oh, the camera isn't blurry when I use in other apps or with the phones camera app.

Printing from mobile is hit or miss. Sometimes the app recognizes my printer, most of the time not. It has become so incredibly frustrating that I'll likely delete the app. Customer service hasn't been a help, except in misunderstanding the issue or sending links to articles I've already read.

Worst app ever. I've made shopping trips just to use their coupons - I properly submitted all 3 receipts and every time I get a rejected "action needed" notice, telling me to rescan my receipt. If I use the camera software that comes in the app, it's garbled and fuzzy. If I retake it, it gets rejected. I've purposely bought several things ONLY becauee they were on this app but never get the savings. I reached out to customer service 2 weeks ago but no one responds to help. Terrible app!
Cool app. Works wonders if you actually remember to scan the receipt. Lol

title: How to Save Money
description:
You really can and should seriously begin saving a portion of your income no matter how much you are earning each month and even you don‚Äôt know how to save money. This is the only way to begin the journey out of debts and build a more secure financial future for yourself and those you care about.

Unlike many other personal finance books you see all around, this no-fluff application presents painless ways to enable you to save money and pay off debts starting almost immediately. 

Your journal towards having peace of mind without the constant worries about the lack of money and meeting deadlines for payment of bills can soon be over; much sooner and easier than you had thought possible. All you need is basic discipline and making a few financially smart moves on how to save money.

This application will show you cost-effective ways to shop for groceries or buy food.
Every little bit of money that you save here and there builds up pretty quickly.

When it comes to grocery shopping we hardly have a choice, we do need to eat regardless, so if there are ways we can save while we spend, why not?

Fortunately, there are ways that we can possibly save while shopping!

Not all of the money saving tips will be possible for you to do. Some of them are effortless, while others will take will-power and some sacrifice. But there enough of them, crammed into this little gem of a book, that you are bound to find something which will lead to savings somewhere in your daily life.

The concept of saving is easy. The act of doing it, on the other hand, is hard. 

In this application, let's talk about how to save money for your future financial goals so that you can enjoy the life of the rich in the future. You are a few pages away to reaching financial freedom and to enjoying your life without spending more.

Here Is A Preview Of What You'll Learn:

‚Ä¢	Saving Money Responsibly
‚Ä¢	Cutting Expenses
‚Ä¢	Spending Money Intelligently
‚Ä¢	Ways To Get You Into The Psychology Of Saving Money
‚Ä¢	How to Save Money: Daily, Monthly, and Long Term
‚Ä¢	2 Unique Ways To Save Money That You‚Äôve Probably Never Tried
‚Ä¢	Much, much more...

Download This How to Save Money App now!

But there enough of them, crammed into this little gem of a book, that you are bound to find something which will lead to savings somewhere in your daily life.

The concept of saving is easy. The act of doing it, on the other hand, is hard.

In this application, let's talk about how to save money for your future financial goals so that you can enjoy the life of the rich in the future. You are a few pages away to reaching financial freedom and to enjoying your life without spending more.

Here Is A Preview Of What You'll Learn:

‚Ä¢ Saving Money Responsibly
‚Ä¢ Cutting Expenses
‚Ä¢ Spending Money Intelligently
‚Ä¢ Ways To Get You Into The Psychology Of Saving Money
‚Ä¢ How to Save Money: Daily, Monthly, and Long Term
‚Ä¢ 2 Unique Ways To Save Money That You‚Äôve Probably Never Tried
‚Ä¢ Much, much more...

Download This How to Save Money App now!

title: Coupons.com ‚Äì Grocery Coupons & Cash Back Savings
description:
Save $100s with free grocery coupons and deals at your favorite stores like Walmart, Target, Kroger and Dollar General. You‚Äôll have access to hundreds of coupons on the brands you love, making saving money effortless. Best of all, you can manage all your grocery shopping and coupons right from your phone, in one single app, without ever relying on a printer or shuffling between multiple store apps.

Join the millions of shoppers who use the Coupons.com app to shop and save easily at your favorite grocery stores. Enjoy two ways to save: One, simply link your store loyalty cards to your Coupons.com account, then add coupons with a tap to save seamlessly at the register. The dollars fall off at purchase.

Two, if your store doesn‚Äôt have a loyalty card, get cash back after purchase. Just choose the coupons you like and add them to the stores you want to redeem them at‚Äìall in the app‚Äì then submit a picture of your receipt after purchase. After your purchase is verified, you‚Äôll get cash back in your PapPal account. So easy! 

No printing, no paper, no hassle‚Äîit‚Äôs a cinch now to save on food, baby and toddler items, pet food, medicine and personal care. We have coupons from all your favorite brands like Tide, Bounty, Cheerios, Kraft, Kellogg‚Äôs, General Mills, Campbell‚Äôs, Dole, Betty Crocker, M&M‚Äôs, Perdue, Crest, Pantene and more.

Here‚Äôs how it works:

1) After you download the free app, sign in to your Coupons.com account (or sign up if you‚Äôre new‚Äîit‚Äôs quick and easy).

2) Link your store loyalty cards to your Coupons.com account.  If your store doesn‚Äôt have a loyalty card, you can still save by using cash back grocery coupons‚Äîwe‚Äôll tell you how in a second.

3) Next, browse through 100s of free grocery coupons by store and add them with just a tap.

4) Load up your cart at the store and follow your shopping list in the app to make sure you‚Äôre using all the grocery coupons you‚Äôve chosen. 

5) Then save one of two ways: Instantly at checkout or after your purchase. Stores with loyalty cards give you instant savings, while other stores require a quick picture of your receipt. Simply send us the photo, we‚Äôll verify your purchase, then put cash into your PayPal account as soon as possible. The best part: You won‚Äôt have to wait to reach a minimum amount in order to get your money.

What you‚Äôll love:

‚Ä¢ Easily save $100s on your favorite brands with offers that are added daily. Plus, watch for Coupons.com-exclusive offers that you can redeem for free items, like bananas, coffee, or potatoes.

‚Ä¢ Tap-and-save simplicity with 100s of verified digital grocery, drug and discount store coupons from your favorite brands that you can use on your mobile device.

‚Ä¢ Add all your store loyalty cards to just one app! No need to juggle several cards or accounts. Once you link them to your Coupons.com app, all your grocery coupons will be in one spot, making grocery planning, shopping, and saving easier than ever.

‚Ä¢ No loyalty card at your store? No problem. Get cash back after purchase by simply adding coupons, making your purchase, then sending us a photo of your receipt after checkout. The best part: There‚Äôs no minimum purchase required to get cash back! 

‚Ä¢ Put away your scissors and never worry about forgetting your coupons. All your grocery savings will be digital, making the shopping and saving process easier and more organized for you.  However, don‚Äôt fret: If you still prefer to print your coupons, you can do so directly from the app.

If you‚Äôre looking for grocery savings at stores like Target, Walmart, Albertsons, Safeway, Winn-Dixe, Meijer, Food Lion and more, the Coupons.com app is the one-stop shop for all your grocery coupons, deals and savings.

Awards Won:
Appy, May 2017
Best Mobile App Awards, April 2017

We love our customers.
Having trouble with the app?
Contact our friendly support team and we'll get you back to saving in a snap: 
androidapp-support@coupons.com. 

Coupons.com is a Quotient brand.

comments: Like the app but it gives me the blues when I was FORCED to set up my loyalty cards whether I wanted to or not. It didn't allow me to and it asked me for the phone number I used to sign up for my loyalty cards! I don't remember because that was so many years ago and I've switched phone numbers anyway

The Camera is blurry in the app via my samsung galaxy s9+. It did the same when the phone belonged to my son. It has since been reset and reinstalled, but the blurriness persists. I have to upload copies of the receipt from the my phones image gallery, which seems to rotate the receipt sideways no matter how I orient the image in gallery. Please fix. Oh, the camera isn't blurry when I use in other apps or with the phones camera app.

Printing from mobile is hit or miss. Sometimes the app recognizes my printer, most of the time not. It has become so incredibly frustrating that I'll likely delete the app. Customer service hasn't been a help, except in misunderstanding the issue or sending links to articles I've already read.

Worst app ever. I've made shopping trips just to use their coupons - I properly submitted all 3 receipts and every time I get a rejected "action needed" notice, telling me to rescan my receipt. If I use the camera software that comes in the app, it's garbled and fuzzy. If I retake it, it gets rejected. I've purposely bought several things ONLY becauee they were on this app but never get the savings. I reached out to customer service 2 weeks ago but no one responds to help. Terrible app!
Cool app. Works wonders if you actually remember to scan the receipt. Lol

comments: Waste of time. It takes weeks for cash back to be added to your account...if you are credited at all. Have been using this app for a while (when it was ebates). Love that you get cash back on purchases, however for EVERY Amazon purchase, you have to manually add your purchases.. It's ALWAYS been like this. The missing cash back is quickly added to my account when submitted,, but it's just annoying because I do almost half of my online shopping on Amazon.

title: Money Lover: Money Manager, Budget Expense Tracker
description:
‚òÖ Best of 2017 Android App
‚òÖ Google Top Developer
‚òÖ Editors' Choice App since 2016

Money Lover was developed by a group of millennials to first solve their personal finance issues. After earning and spending almost all of our first salaries, we realized that there needed to be a convenient tool to see where our money was going and how we can spend it better.

Thus Money Lover was born - made by young professionals and for young professionals.

KEY FEATURES

‚úî Money Manager: Track expenses and incomes by categories (food, fuel, etc.).
‚úî Budget Planner: Set a limit on how much to spend in a category; get alerted when close to limit. 
‚úî Goal Wallet: Set a saving goal; automatically update your balances as you progress towards your goal
‚úî Reporting: Financial reports give you overview of your spending, income by date or group. 
‚úî Linked Wallet: Connect with bank accounts and get automatic bank feed. Security: Data encrypted by RSA-1024 bit; support PIN code & Fingerprint to unlock. 
‚úî Credit Wallet: Manage credit cards and get reminded when repayments are due

Note: We support 17 countries. Please go to Connect to bank and check the availability.


With Premium account, you have:

‚úî Unlimited number of budgets, savings, wallets, events. 
‚úî Export to CSV, Excel 
‚úî Picture attachment
‚úî Ad-free

--
Clarification for Access Permissions:
- Network Communication (Internet Access) is for syncing data and getting money exchange rate. 
- Social Information (Read Contact) is for suggesting ‚ÄúWith Who‚Äù to tag your people in your contact list.
- Your Location is for identifying your location of the transaction.
- Storage (modify or delete contents on your USB storage) is for creating and storing backup data to the USB storage.
