‚úî Linked Wallet: Connect with bank accounts and get automatic bank feed. Security: Data encrypted by RSA-1024 bit; support PIN code & Fingerprint to unlock.
‚úî Credit Wallet: Manage credit cards and get reminded when repayments are due

Note: We support 17 countries. Please go to Connect to bank and check the availability.


With Premium account, you have:

‚úî Unlimited number of budgets, savings, wallets, events.
‚úî Export to CSV, Excel
‚úî Picture attachment
‚úî Ad-free

--
Clarification for Access Permissions:
- Network Communication (Internet Access) is for syncing data and getting money exchange rate.
- Social Information (Read Contact) is for suggesting ‚ÄúWith Who‚Äù to tag your people in your contact list.
- Your Location is for identifying your location of the transaction.
- Storage (modify or delete contents on your USB storage) is for creating and storing backup data to the USB storage.
summary: The simplest finance app to keep track of expense/ income & plan budget ahead üëç
recentChanges:
In this version, we fixed bugs that result from software acting up.
If you need any support, please email to contact@moneylover.me, we're always ready to support!
comments: It's great app that has all of functions that I want. I'm happy with it and have been using it for a couple of years. But there're some bugs along the way of usage. Eg. App delayed synchronizing with my bank account and eventually stopped synchronzing, sometimes when I tried to edit my wallets the app pulled me back to the previous menu. And there's one time weired incident which is the most frustrating one is all of my records had gone away which I'm not sure whether I did something wrong.

I don't know what the issue is, I can sign in but the first sync always failed. 'unfortunately, we are unable to fully download your data. please try again later.' Need to several trial of sign in to success. Then after minutes using it suddenly I signed out and need to sign in again. And the issue repeat. I plan to try this app because there's interesting feature such as web sync. But I think I'll stick with my app that I havd been using for now because of this issue

Better than others.... Debt manager is one unique feature.... But, one DRAWBACK is when I add transaction as transfer from x acc y acc, tha transfered amount is considered as EXPENSE in x acc... And due to which it shows monthly expense higher by including all transfer amount... In case this will be fixed, then this is the best app to track daily, monthly expenses.... Because of that one drawback I left this app.

I paid for a premium user. Now I have problem with App synchronisation. Most data recorded was mixed up and all of the sudden it it was all gone. Okay, I decide to adjust the balance again to start over again but.....again the App start synchronizing again. Can you please fix this problem. It's so annoying! I have paid for this.

From a premium users view: For the amount you pay the app looks outdated, No materialistic design, Not enough icons to choose from, No dark mode, Looks dull. Important features that's missing: * When expenses is added to 'A' wallet & later u want to move it to 'B' wallet that not possible. * Credit cards are considered completely separate from the main wallet. This should not be it because at the end of the day. Credit card bill is payed from the main wallet. With correction it's a 5* app

title: How To Save Money
description:
Want to start saving money? It's never been easier!

In today's era, people tend to spend more & more, and sometimes, we just need to stop for a second and think responsibly. 
No matter if you're a student, teenager, or anyone, you must start managing your savings smartly and understand how much you can spend every day.

That's why we're here for
 
All you need to do is to face your monthly budget. 
Choose a month for saving, add your monthly incomes and expenses, and this App will calculate for you how much you can spend daily, weekly, and monthly to reach your saving goals! It's the most effective and fast way to save money. 

Your financial future is in your hands, you just need to act right! 
Can you save your money? It's up to you.

Start using "How To Save Money", and see how your life becomes more organized. 

*Get "Daily tips" from experts around the world on how to save your money.
*New tips every day!



We're always happy to hear some feedback. Please feel free to reach out and tell us what you think!



We're working on new updates & features, stay tuned!

title: CashBoxNG- Save money securely.
description:
CashBox is a secure savings platform that helps you save money seamlessly all from the comfort of your mobile phone, tablet or computer. CashBox is basically an online "savings box". It is FREE, secure and any amount can be saved anytime you want, while you earn high interest on your savings.

From any location, you can securely save on Cashbox and do the following:

‚óè  With our "Regular Saver" plan, you can easily automate your savings while earning high interest on it. All you have to do is add your ATM/Bank card, set how much you want to save, and select the frequency you want to save (daily/weekly/monthly). This is our most popular plan.

‚óè  "Instant Savings" plan allows you save any amount any time. This allows you to easily top up your savings while also earning high interest. This is not an automated saving like the "regular saver", user has to always login to use this feature. For users without an ATM card, saving is possible via bank transfer.

‚óè "Locked Savings" plan is a mix of the traditional bank fixed deposit and treasury bills. Savers can lock funds for a period of 90 days or more, and collect interest upfront immediately, just like Treasury Bills. Lock away your savings and earn interest upfront same day. The longer the locked duration, the higher the interest earned.

Security guaranteed- We use bank grade security and the highest levels of Internet Security, secured by 256 bits SSL security encryption. All personal and bank details are secure on CashBox.

We are a customer-centric company and always put our users first. We provide 24-7 customer support and also provide transparency in all transactions. Customers are able to easily monitor their savings and earned interest all from the app.

*Free to signup, No monthly or deposit fees, Secured platform, High interest guaranteed!

title: 52 Weeks Money Challenge
description:
Have you ever wanted to save this year? Then you may have heard of the 52 weeks money challenge. Which works by incrementing your base money weekly. 

I wanted to start saving this year, so I made this app so I can just check is on my phone rather than having the template printed. One more thing I can change the base money that works for me.  

This app is just a template and does not result any real or digital money. 

With this app you can:
- Choose any currency you want.
- Setup your base money.
- See the total money you can save by the end of the year.
- Tick on the week you already done saving.
- Save your progress so you know which week is done.

title: Robinhood: Invest. Save. Earn.
description:
Invest in stocks, options and ETFs (funds), all commission-free, for as little as $1- with the Robinhood app.

Our trading tools give everyone access to the financial market - whether you're a beginner in investing or a seasoned trading pro.

Save, invest in the stock market, and earn money: Here‚Äôs what you get when you join Robinhood:

Finance explained - We‚Äôll help you understand financial markets so you can invest in the stock market and buy funds, shares and options, all commission-free. 

Trading tools - Before you buy funds, Bitcoin, or any other investment option, you can access real-time market data, read relevant finance news articles, and get notified about important events. And manage your portfolio on the go.

Stock market trends - Set up customized finance news and notifications to stay on top of your assets as casually or as relentlessly as you like. Controlling the flow of info is up to you.

Cash Management - Earn money with your uninvested cash and earn competitive APY with your brokerage account.

The Robinhood app gives you the trading tools, finance news and cash management products to make your money work harder. Whether you want to invest in the stock market, buy funds, save money or earn money, we‚Äôve got the information to help you make smart decisions.


INVESTING MADE EASY
New to investing? Fear not. We have the trading tools and services to empower you to participate in the financial market. Learn how to invest and trade smartly, and get in-depth financial info in lingo that makes sense. 

STOCKS, FUNDS, OPTIONS AND CRYPTO
With Robinhood Financial, you can invest in stocks, funds, and options. You can also buy and sell cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), and Dogecoin (DOGE) with Robinhood Crypto.

EARN MONEY WITH CASH MANAGEMENT
Did you know that your uninvested cash can still work for you? Earn money with competitive interest* and get more flexibility with your brokerage account.

-----
*Cash Management is an added feature to your Robinhood Financial LLC brokerage account. The Annual Percentage Yield (APY) paid by program banks may  change at any time at the program banks‚Äô discretion. Interest is earned on uninvested cash swept from the brokerage account to the program banks. Neither Robinhood Financial LLC nor any of its affiliates are banks. The debit card is issued by Sutton Bank, member FDIC, pursuant to license by Mastercard¬Æ International, Incorporated.

Securities trading offered through Robinhood Financial LLC, member SIPC and FINRA.

Cryptocurrency trading offered through Robinhood Crypto, LLC. Robinhood Crypto is licensed to engage in virtual currency business activity by the New York State Department of Financial Services and is not a member of FINRA or SIPC. Cryptocurrencies are not stocks and your cryptocurrency investments are not products protected by either the FDIC or SIPC.

The free stock offer valid only for selected individuals, subject to the terms and conditions at rbnhd.co/freestock- terms. Free stock randomly chosen as detailed on the website. Individuals must sign up through a promotional page to be eligible. Neither receipt of a share of stock through this program nor identification of a particular security in communications related to this program constitutes a solicitation of the security or a recommendation to buy, sell, or hold the security. Robinhood Financial does not provide investment advice and does not hereby recommend any security or transaction.

All investments involve risk and the past performance of a security, other financial product or cryptocurrency does not guarantee future results or returns. You can always lose money when you invest in securities, cryptocurrencies, or other financial products. Investors should consider their investment objectives and risks carefully before investing.

Robinhood Financial LLC and Robinhood Crypto, LLC are wholly-owned subsidiaries of Robinhood Markets, Inc.

comments: Like everyone else, losing money due to app issues. I went as far as to remove the app, download again, shut down, restart, and still having the same issue at this point. I can access any page on the app except the trade page, in till after 11:30 am. I attempt to go to the page and all that comes up is the green header bar and a blank white page.

It was great! Until it crashes. And then it crashes every morning. And then it crashes on the busiest, most volatile day of the market and doesnt open for the rest of the day, and refuses to let people view anything in the app thanks to a hot patch. Seems everyday is getting worse on this app and they seem to offer no statement. Many people thinking about a class action lawsuit for gross negligence

Takes forever for your transfer to come through; about 7 business days before your account sees the charge. Way too long! Then when it was supposed to complete, they say there was a problem with the transfer, that it was cancelled and I was charged a $9 fee. I checked my account in the day they sent that notification and had enough funds to complete the transfer. Opened a case and Eduardo said to get back to them in a month when my bank statement is generated so they can review. Ridiculous!

So I figured I would give this app a try. Not looking good. It kept telling me it's losing connection, and then its having a server issue. Right after I put ALL my information in. Wont let you look at stocks. Just sends you to a blank page. So far this has been a horrible experience. Not sure I would invest money into this if you cant even navigate the app properly.

Superb interface - Garbage Stability: This app is by far the most intuitive and beginner friendly option I've encountered. Unfortunately, the stability of the trading system is straight up garbage. Users were locked out of their account for the entire day of March 2nd, 2020; and the first half of March 3rd, 2020; during which the S&P 500 bounced up 8% from it's previous weeklong plummet. Do not trust this company with critical day to day trades, they have no qualms about shutting down the system

comments: I used this app on my S9+ and it worked flawlessly. I switched to a Galaxy S20 Ultra and now I get the message that it was built for a different version of Android OS. Now I have to switch from IG after clicking "Copy Link" to Fast Save app and turn off FastSave Service and turn it back on for the picture/video to download. Please fix for One UI 2.1 / Android 10 and I will gladly give this 5 stars again. This app is by far the best IG downloader when it works correctly.

Huhu. I gave you 5 stars because this app is the best for me, so far. You don't necessarily have to go back to the app to download the posts. It automatically saves them just by copying the URL. But lately, I am unable to use it as my phone requires updating the app's version. I'm seriously hoping you'd hear me out and be able to make this work on a Samsung Galaxy Note 9. I'll definitely re-install this app.

It was great at first. I'd even go as far as to say it was/is amazing. The only problem is that you have to to open this app then go straight to instagram through this app otherwise the downloaded pictures/videos wont show up in your gallery. Now my biggest problem is that, once I turn it on and use it to go to IG, my IG freezes instantly...like my IG will be fine until I decide that I want to start downloading things and as soon as i turn it on and go to IG with it then thats it for my IG.,

Edit - since the latest Android update, FastSave advises it may not work on this latest version and to contact the developer. I've noticed that I have to repeatedly go out of FsstSave, end the app, close out of Instagram as when you select copy link, nothing appears in FsstSave unless you do the above, each time! Will there be an update to this app to accommodate the latest Android update?

At the beginning when I downloaded the app, my downloads saved in my gallery immediately and so easy. Now nothing I choose saves in my gallery, not even under the app in saved video or pics. I even uninstalled the app and downloaded it again but still the same. When I copy and share it send a link via social media but nothing saves so I am disappointed with regards to that, not sure what changed!

Recommended by top personal money management expert Dave Ramsey, EveryDollar uses the zero-based budget approach that millions are already using to win with money.

All new users receive a FREE trial of EveryDollar Plus, the premium version of EveryDollar! Access your trial and upgrade to EveryDollar Plus from the main menu.

Whether you‚Äôre new to budgeting or a personal finance expert, you‚Äôll love the simplicity and the power behind this personal budget app!

EveryDollar Free Features

Create Your Personal Budget:


‚úîCreate the best budget and fully customize it in minutes.

‚úî Access your budget through the mobile app or desktop browser.

‚úî Budget lines, spending, debt payments, notes, and more can be adjusted throughout the month.


Monthly Expense Tracker:


‚úîManage money and track spending on the go.

‚úîEveryDollar lets you split transactions across multiple budget lines.

‚úîThe spending tracker shows what you‚Äôve spent and what‚Äôs remaining for the month.


Connect with Money Management Experts:


‚úîGet financial planning with access to our HUGE Endorsed Local Providers program.

‚úîThis personal budget app can connect you with real estate, insurance, and tax professionals.

‚úîNo third-party advertisements that get in the way of your learning.


Exclusive EveryDollar Plus Features:


‚úîConnect app to your bank to import transactions to quickly track spending.

‚úîManage money and check account balances for connected financial accounts.

‚úîGain priority support with our amazing customer success team.

‚úî Set up notifications when you have new transactions ready to track.

‚úî Score access to Financial Peace University‚Äîthe class that starts you on your journey to never worry about money again and includes Debt Snowball Tool, Emergency Fund Tracker, Mortgage Calculator, Investment Calculator, and more (annual plan only).


Upgrade to EveryDollar Plus from the main menu with In-App Purchases.

Create a personal budget to stay on top of your finances. Start tracking expenses, paying off debt, and putting more into your savings each month with EveryDollar.

Budgeting just got easy. Download now and manage money better with your personal monthly budget app.

Terms of Use: https://everydollar.com/terms
summary: Budget planner and expense tracker that helps you win with personal finances.
recentChanges: - Minor background improvements.
comments: It's a good app. A little hard to navigate and could benefit from some kind of AI to walk you through the initial set up and maybe stick with you a few months to get you completely lined out. Then maybe greet you again periodically to let you know about updates and give you some tips. Also the plus version is too expensive in my opinion just to link bank accounts and drag and drop feature mostly. Anyway it's what I am using at the moment to supplement my pen and paper budget.

Waste of money. It worked seamlessly for the first month and now it does not sync with my bank unless i sign out, uninstall the app, sign back in, and put in a new security code every time. And now this week, even that doesnt work. The app freezes and stops working. Ive emailed the Ramsey solutions people and they flat out refuse to refund me my money. Update: Still a waste of money! Now my transactions sync again but 3x per one! So I get to manually delete 2/3 of the transactions! Yay me!

I really like most things about this app. I recommend it because it is a useful tool for planning and tracking spending. However, I do not like the way the line items called "funds" are accounted for. I love seeing that I have an "everydollar budget," but when I have a fund, it will still say EveryDollar Budget even if I went over in every category. There should be a popup that says "You just overspent your budget. Please adjust."

A great app! It would be greater if we could take a pic of receipt within the app. It's difficult for the user to confirm the budget category of each item if the user looses the receipt. Another idea: user scans the receipt and then app provides a recommended category for items, once the user confirms, the info gets placed into the current budget. It also needs percentage for each category. Budget categories based on percentage is at the core of the plan. Doesn't make sense to not have them.

I've been using this off and on to track my budget which helped, but I've never really followed it and didn't enjoy manually entering expenses. I recently upgraded to the plus version which links your bank account. This has been magical! I'm now staying on budget and can look at what is remaining in each category wherever I am. Thankful for this app since it has kept me on track for paying off debt!

title: Savings Tracker: Savings Goal
description:
Download this easy to use Savings Tracker to keep track of how much you are saving each month for your Savings Goal. Know when you will be able to afford the new smartphone or TV you want to buy. 

KEEP TRACK OF YOUR BUDGET
You can add payments towards your savings goal so you can stay within your monthly budget without any worry. No need to keep an excel document or any spreadsheet to stay on top of your savings. Just enter any savings goal for anything you want like an upcoming vacation or a new smartphone you want to buy. You can set a due date so you will always know how many days you have left to reach your saving goal.                

REACH YOUR SAVINGS GOAL
This app will help you reach your savings goal as you can see daily how much progress you have made. If you are saving for retirement then you can see the due date accordingly and keep track of your progress. By only adding a small amount every day for your goal you can see your savings compound so you may even be able to have an early retirement.  

TRACK YOUR MONTHLY SAVINGS AND WEEKLY SAVINGS

title: YNAB ‚Äî Budget, Personal Finance
description:
YNAB will help you break the paycheck to paycheck cycle, get out of debt, and save more money. On average, new users save $600 in the first two months, and more than $6,000 in the first year. Try it free for 34 days. 

KEY FEATURES:
Bank Syncing
Easily connect all your accounts in one place and import your transactions, so you always have up-to-date information.
Transaction Matching
Prefer to enter transactions yourself? You can! YNAB will match up imported transactions with those you enter yourself so your account balances are always accurate.
On the Go
Real-time access to all your budget data across multiple devices means you can budget with a partner and always have the info you need to make good spending decisions.
Goal Tracking
Go beyond an expense tracker. Set goals and immediately see when you'll be able to reach them.
Reporting Bliss 
Detailed, visual spending and trend reports help you measure progress and improve.
Personal Support
Our friendly support team is available around the clock via email, live chat, and offer 100+ free, live budgeting workshops every week.

You‚Äôve Never Budgeted Like This Before‚Ä¶
YNAB is unlike any personal finance app, expense tracker, or money management system you‚Äôve tried before, because it is based on our proven method‚ÄîYNAB‚Äôs Four Rules. The powerful combination of award-winning budget apps and our life-changing budgeting method means it actually works. Using YNAB, hundreds of thousands of people have learned how to get control of their finances, stop stressing, and live the life they want to live. You can be one of them!

A Proven Method‚ÄîYNAB‚Äôs Four Rules 
Rule One: Give Every Dollar A Job | Be intentional about what you want your money to do before you spend it. By tracking your expenses you will make better decisions.Rule Two: Embrace Your True Expenses | More than just an expense tracker, YNAB can help you prepare for the future. Break up larger, less frequent expenses into smaller, more manageable amounts. By budgeting monthly for insurance premiums, holidays, or car repairs, when the time comes, your money is ready and waiting to do its job.Rule Three: Roll With The Punches | When life changes, so must your budget. Make adjustments and move along. Flexible budgets succeed because they‚Äôre guilt-free, realistic, and sustainable. Good money management habits are ones you can stick with.Rule Four: Age Your Money | As you repeat the first three rules, you‚Äôll increase the time between the moment you earn a dollar and the moment you need to spend it. When your money is at least a month old, you‚Äôll have finally broken the paycheck to paycheck cycle for good. Your personal finances will never feel the same again. In a good way.Free for 34 Days
We don‚Äôt want your money unless you feel like YNAB is helping you gain control of yours. In fact, we offer a No-Risk, 100% Money-Back Guarantee. At any point, if you don‚Äôt feel like you have more control of your money with YNAB, we‚Äôll give you a full refund. No questions asked.

The powerful combination of award-winning budget apps and our life-changing budgeting method means it actually works. Using YNAB, hundreds of thousands of people have learned how to get control of their finances, stop stressing, and live the life they want to live. You can be one of them!

A Proven Method‚ÄîYNAB‚Äôs Four Rules
Rule One: Give Every Dollar A Job | Be intentional about what you want your money to do before you spend it. By tracking your expenses you will make better decisions.
Rule Two: Embrace Your True Expenses | More than just an expense tracker, YNAB can help you prepare for the future. Break up larger, less frequent expenses into smaller, more manageable amounts. By budgeting monthly for insurance premiums, holidays, or car repairs, when the time comes, your money is ready and waiting to do its job.
Rule Three: Roll With The Punches | When life changes, so must your budget. Make adjustments and move along. Flexible budgets succeed because they‚Äôre guilt-free, realistic, and sustainable. Good money management habits are ones you can stick with.
Rule Four: Age Your Money | As you repeat the first three rules, you‚Äôll increase the time between the moment you earn a dollar and the moment you need to spend it. When your money is at least a month old, you‚Äôll have finally broken the paycheck to paycheck cycle for good. Your personal finances will never feel the same again. In a good way.
Free for 34 Days

summary: Reach goals, easily track every expense, and gain total control of your money.
recentChanges:
You can now use Sign in with Apple to login to YNAB on your [looks at phone] Android phone. Hmm...we realize you're not the target demo here, but at least now you have the option! Also, we made a ton of solid bug fixes, such as:
‚Ä¢ Now overzealous spell checkers won't try and correct non-user editable content
‚Ä¢ Prevented category switching when a keypad is active
‚Ä¢ Added a much scarier category deletion warning message
‚Ä¢ And more!
comments: I've been using YNAB for a couple years now and it's taken my control of finances to a new level. For years I was using a spreadsheet focused on ensuring I had enough cash in the bank to pay bills. It resulted in me spending most of my paycheck paying for things I bought last month on a credit card. It took a couple years, but using YNAB, I was able to get this under control and am now setting aside my current paycheck to pay for next months bills as well as building an emergency fund.

Very useful and have been using it for about 10 months. Though I was (or so I thought) good with my money, this app brought it to another level. I would however like to see some better metrics and data on categories and places spent. I'm not sure if it's available on the web version, but it would be nice to get more of the web features over to the app

I fought my wife's drive to embrace this software/app and their method... I'm just gonna be honest, it's amazing. This time last year I had saved up a couple hundred bucks of my 'allowance' and I was pretty proud. I wasn't using YNAB or anything to manage my spending monies. After spending everything on a trip last year and wanting to plan ahead to go again, I started using YNAB and I've not only saved for the trip, I have savings above the measly couple hundred bucks + money for whatever.

The only budgeting software that I regularly look at and use. Nothing else has worked for me. The app is fun, and the development team and staff are genuinely invested in the success of their customers. I have saved more money with the help of YNAB than I ever have been before. I still overspend, but at least YNAB actually makes me feel bad about it, while being incredibly feature-rich, pleasing to the eye, and - dare I say it - fun to use! I'm a dedicated fan now.

Love, love, love this app! An accountant friend turned me on to it and while it was a shift in thinking and took a bit to get used to I wouldn't do it any other way. Finally able to save money this year. I watched a great youtube tutorial that made it all make sense. Kinda just think of it as envelopes for your $ but in app form. Also, the dev team is super responsive to issues, great product, great company.

title: SAFE 2 SAVE
description:
Drive SAFE 2 SAVE Lives & Money.

Earn points as you drive undistracted and redeem them at local businesses you love. Texting and driving makes us all 23 times more likely to be in an accident. Is that text so important it cannot wait? Your loved ones are worth it! Download a picture of them on the app to remind you just how important they are.

Earn Rewards Towards Local Businesses.

These incredible businesses care about our community and want to reward you for driving safely. Redeem your points easily at these participating businesses and show your support by telling your friends!

recentChanges:
- Fixing bugs related to some businesses not loading properly
- Updating UI descriptions of online redemptions
- Other various fixes and improvements
comments: I've had this app for over a year and haven't turned my points in for a damn thing because the rewards all really freaking suck.... Most of the "rewards" are just deals from restaurants and stores that you'd receive just by walking through the door anyways..... Total rip off....
It really helps remind you not to look at your phone while driving and you rack up rewards quickly. This is a great idea.
Everything is just as described and the warnings it gives you while in a vehicle are not only valid, they're helpful reminders.
It seems like a great app but it would be better if you could get gift cards.

Seems to be an on going issue. Randomly the app will open. Even when I'm not driving or opened the app. It even starts when I've restarted my phone. I was under the impression that the app only starts if I open it myself. At least that's how it use to work. Now there are time it shows when I'm sitting on the couch binge watching the office. If this continues I'm deleting the app because it uses battery when I don't even know it's open.

This is the donate (ad-free and even more awesome) version of Saving Made Simple, the free personal finance & money app that shows you exactly how to save money for any goal!

Looking for the Free Version of Saving Made Simple? Click here: http://goo.gl/xuiTR

WHY DONATE?

‚Ä¢ Enjoy a clean & beautiful user interface!

HOW'S THIS MONEY MANAGER WORK?
Our latest personal finance app - Saving Made Simple - creates a robust yet user-friendly savings and expense manager in the palm of your hand. Effortlessly budget money for upcoming bills, debt payments and savings goals with only a few clicks! Our intuitive personal finance app prioritizes your goals and breaks them down into manageable and timely payments. Convenient widgets and notifications remind you of your saving progress, while also keeping you informed of upcoming due dates for bill payments.

MONEY MANAGEMENT FEATURES
‚Ä¢ Expense tracking with beautiful graphs of your expense breakdowns
‚Ä¢ Know exactly how much to save: our app breaks down your savings goals into routine payments.
‚Ä¢ Savings goals, bills and budgets are automatically prioritized by their due dates.
‚Ä¢ Budget for upcoming bills and savings goals in 65+ currencies!
‚Ä¢ Set up notifications to remind you of your savings progress and due dates for upcoming bills and savings goals.
‚Ä¢ Track automatic payments from your bank account with simple recurring payments!
‚Ä¢ Use widgets to quickly glance at your home-screen and see the status of your savings goals!

VARIOUS WAYS TO SAVE MONEY
‚Ä¢ Save money for vacations, budget for your upcoming car insurance, save for textbooks, etc.
‚Ä¢ Set up goals to regularly pay off your mortgage and credit cards saving you interest expense!
‚Ä¢ Avoid penalties by setting up savings goals with due dates for bill payments and expenses.

BUDGET AND SAVE MONEY SAFELY
Your privacy is safe as our app does not require any personal information whatsoever. No bank account information nor any connections to your financial institutions are necessary to save money with Saving Made Simple.
If your phone is lost or stolen you can rest assured that our app has no connections to your bank or other financial institutions!

THE NEW WAY TO SAVE MONEY
Never before has an app been designed exclusively to help you reach your money savings goals with a minimum amount of effort and stress.

Saving money and budgeting for the future doesn't have to be complicated. This app isn't a replacement for Mint, EasyMoney, or Money Lover, instead, it's a simplification of the main goal: to save money conveniently.

Download Saving Made Simple today and start accomplishing the savings goals you've always dreamed of!

recentChanges:
- Fix Errors
- Can now edit Goal Denomination by input value
comments: App takes a bit too long to open. Adjusting the desired goal for each denomination is tiring. I would suggest that instead of tapping and tapping the + or minus button, we could just type the exact amount we want. Also the app exits easily just by tapping the back on my phone which I end up opening it again. Please hear these out for the improvement of your app. :)

The new update is very tedious. Editing the amounts in a specific goal does not have an option to just type the amount, you have to press the + or - to do this. Just imagine if you want to do a million in one denomination.

The new interface is not user friendly. You have to scroll down on each denomination and press the buttons beside to add money. It takes so much time to scroll down. The old interface was simple yet was easy to navigate around. The settings seems to be gone and I don't get the purpose of using a share button on something that involves money.

The new update SUCKS!! I have been using this app for a long time now and this update is NOT USER FRIENDLY. I tried to reset my goal because I completed my last goal. I can't input the number goal for each denomination, I have to tap the - and + button for it to reach the number I prefer, which is very difficult as the default after you reset is 217!!! BRING BACK THE OLD INTERFACE.

What a huge drawback you did with your update! I used it for years now but only got disappointed after the update. The app now has become an ad app not anymore the ipon app we knew. Such a waste. You call this solution but the way? Tskk. But thanks for the creating the previous ones. It was good until the update.

title: Pocket: Save. Read. Grow.
description:
THE PLACE TO ABSORB GREAT CONTENT.
Use Pocket to capture the content that comes at you all day long, and curate your own space filled with only the topics you care about. Save the latest stories, articles, news, sports and videos from any device, and any publisher or app. Then fuel your mind with a reading, watching, and listening experience designed for calm eyes, free hands, and fresh focus.

SAVE FROM ANYWHERE.
Save the latest news, magazine articles, stories, videos, recipes, web pages, how-to information ‚Äì anything you discover online or subscribe to, from any publisher. User favorites include: New York Times, The Guardian, Washington Post, Flipboard, The Atlantic, New Yorker, Lifehacker, Business Insider, The Verge, BBC News, Google News, Buzzfeed, Vox, engadget, Medium, Newsweek, Twitter, Youtube. 

REST YOUR EYES. FIND YOUR FOCUS.
Pocket‚Äôs clean layout and customizable display make for a relaxing reading experience that clears out the visual clutter, gives your eyes a rest, and lets your mind focus on the information at hand. Love long reads? Pocket‚Äôs typography and layout keep reading comfortable for longer stretches. Love to read before bed? Try our new dark and sepia themes to reduce visual stimulation before you sleep.

LISTEN TO ARTICLES.
Pocket‚Äôs listen feature turns any news story, article, or blog post into a hands-free, eyes-free learning experience. Now you can turn content into knowledge while you cook, commute, work out, walk, or just relax and listen. 

READ EVERYWHERE.
If it‚Äôs in your Pocket, it‚Äôs on your phone, tablet and computer ‚Äì even when you‚Äôre offline. Whether you‚Äôre taking a news break, reading from bed, or breezing through articles on your commute, Pocket makes the most of your time by getting you straight to the news feeds, magazine articles, stories, information, news, and sports that are compelling to you. And estimated reading times help you turn any time into quality time.

DISCOVER MORE OF WHAT YOU LOVE.
Find more of what you love but might otherwise have missed. Pocket surfaces ‚Äòbest of web‚Äô content discovered by our users, verified by our curators, and approved by our editors. Find all kinds of topics from all kinds of publishers, including quality magazines and news sources like Fast Company, The Verge, Medium, Quartz, Harvard Business Review and more.

MAKE IT PREMIUM. AND PERMANENT.
Power users can upgrade anytime to Pocket Premium for features like advanced search, unlimited highlights and automatic article backups.

You can also save to Pocket with our browser extensions for Chrome, Firefox, or Safari
Learn more at https://getpocket.com/.

developerAddress:
233 Sansome St. Suite 1200
San Francisco CA 94104
recentChanges: Minor fixes and improvements
comments: I've found out that the listening function is not available for Vietnamese as it always says "No internet connection". However, when I turn off Stream Best-quality voices, the Text-to-speech engine works fine. For English articles, turning on Stream Best-quality works, but it's kind of interrupted at the first 3-4s of the articles. I hope you could improve the Listening function, such as it can auto turn off Stream Best-quality voices for non-English articles so we don't have to do that manually

These people are really pissing me off. The app is filled with upgrade nags that show up on just about every screen. I didn't mind it when there was just the one, on the main reading list screen, but now it's on every article, in the add tags dialog, and it follows along every time you touch a link. I've used Pocket since it was called Read it Later, but now I'm about done with them. I'm looking for an alternative that doesn't intrude on EVERYTHING I try to read!

Pocket provides a wide range of articles from a plethora of genres. I particularly like that the length of the articles is described in terms of how long it'll take to read. The design is user-friendly and functional. I also like the option to flip pages rather than scrolling as I read.

Bookmarks articles from everywhere, syncs seamlessly, and allows me to dive back in where I left off at any time. Pocket makes it so much easier for me to spend my commute time learning. My only wish is that I could mark a new article as archived from my browser's "share" feature, the way the desktop browser plugin does.

ALMOST PERFECT FREE READER. MY READER OF CHOICE. Web clipper is almost instantaneous -- gets ALMOST everything. Very readable typeface -- allows choice of 1 serif & 1 non-serif font, option to buy others. Mode light or dark. Links within app to Web pages WHEN LINKS ARE CLIPPED. That's about the only rub -- not all links are clipped, and it doesn't let you know when they aren't. But a GREAT READER.

title: Expenses tracker: spending manager & saving expert
description:
Expense tracker is a free app which will help you to track expenses easily, and make savings for your home budget. It is not easy to manage personal finance, but with this helpful expense report, it becomes much easier to plan your budget! Put the money in your piggy bank - Every dollar counts!

Did you ask yourself how to save money? Use our savings app to plan your budget.

Do you get that feeling that your money somehow magically disappears, but you don't spend so much at all? How does this happen? With our budget planner, you can finally find out where your money goes. This savings tracker will help you to discover what absorbs your money. What expenses cause the most damage to your home budget and which costs you should limit to make savings for the things you really need. 

What's more, this spending tracker is almost completely free! There is no need to register or login anywhere to use it. Expense report and all user data are saved in the device. 

Track expenses and manage your wallet! Track spending, cash, bills, fees, and payment EASILY!

‚è©Main features of this savings app:‚è™
üí∏ Keep track of all your expenses. Spending tracker is important if you want to improve your personal finance and wallet condition. 
üí∏ Quickly review your recent costs. Fast access to all of your spending.
üí∏ Manage money easily by categorizing expenses. Create your own categories as you need - rename, choose color and icon for your budget planner. Put the money in your piggy bank - Every dollar counts!
üí∏ Filter expenses by types: cash, card, transfer
üí∏ Browse daily costs, weekly expenses, and monthly expenses, and check your expense report.
üí∏ Assign spending to often used categories and filter by them
üí∏ Find the highest costs sources, manage them and save money for your home budget.
üí∏ Comfortable money manager - easy to use!
üí∏ Convenient, beautiful and customizable user interface. 
üí∏ Import/export expense report and other documents from Google Drive or Dropbox (premium). 
üí∏ Export files to CSV documents (premium)
üí∏ More than 120 currencies available (USD, EUR, GBP, BTC, JPY, AUD, CAD, INR, TRY, RUB, PLN...)

‚è©This budget planner is supported in 19 languages:‚è™

+ Choose an expense type in the add expense page using a simple click (cash, card, transfer)

comments: I love the simplicity of not needing to put in my income coz tbh I find that too stressful considering that I'm the type who would randomly find some money in an old bag. But this app is quite complicated. I wish it was easier to add subcategories and name them. I also wish that the icons were presented in a matter that makes it seem less overwhelming. Maybe emoji type rid style would be nice.

Absolutely patheticüò°. Every time i tried to add just one of my own catatories i was presented with a silly full screen nag to purchase or free trial. What is this app for if im unable to test it for adding catatories?, how do i know the paid version will work. Thanks but no thanks. There's better apps to be had that allow a for better try out.
A simple and fabulous smooth app to track basic expenses. I have not tried the export feature so cannot comment on that, but this is a great app.
easy to use. like it
All curencies are not icluded like TSH.

title: Goodbudget: Budget & Finance
description:
Goodbudget (formerly EEBA, the Easy Envelope Budget Aid) is a money manager and expense tracker that‚Äôs great for home budget planning. This personal finance manager is a virtual update on your grandma‚Äôs envelope system--a proactive budget planner that helps you stay on top of your bills and finances. Built for easy, real-time tracking. And, sync across Android, iPhone, and the web to share your budget with your budgeting partners. Keep everyone on the same page with household finances!


The best income and expense tracking tool. Ever. Yup.

Not yet convinced?

‚Ä¢ Recommended by Experts. Google. The New York Times. Forbes. LifetimeTV. Boston Globe. About.com, Lifehacker, the Register, Verizon Wireless, Leave Debt Behind, yada yada yada.
‚Ä¢ Top quality. Ranked #3 in App Quality across ALL finance apps in both major app stores. [1]
‚Ä¢ Downloaded over 3,000,000 times

And loved by users everywhere
...which, after all, is what matters most‚Ä¶

CHOCK FULL OF FEATURES

SYNC ACROSS MULTIPLE DEVICES (AND WEB)
‚Ä¢ Automagically syncs across Android, iPhone, and the web
‚Ä¢ Stay on the same page about finances with loved ones
‚Ä¢ Data is automatically and securely backed up to Goodbudget‚Äôs website

PERSONAL FINANCIAL MANAGER FOR LIFE ON-THE-GO
‚Ä¢ Expense tracking optimized for speed!
‚Ä¢ Check Envelope & Account balances
‚Ä¢ Save for the future with Goal and Annual Envelopes
‚Ä¢ Scheduled transactions and Envelope fills
‚Ä¢ Split expense transactions
‚Ä¢ Save time with smart payee and category suggestions
‚Ä¢ Easily transfer funds between Envelopes and Accounts
‚Ä¢ Search for transactions
‚Ä¢ Add income
‚Ä¢ Choose budget period to match real-life
‚Ä¢ Add and edit Accounts
‚Ä¢ Location-based widget! Enter common transactions in exactly 3 touches. Control in Settings. (Note: widget will not be available if you move app to SD due to Android limitation)
‚Ä¢ Edit budget as needed!

INSIGHTFUL REPORTS
‚Ä¢ Analyze spending with Spending by Envelope Report
‚Ä¢ Monitor cashflow with Income vs. Spending Report

ALSO ON THE WEB
‚Ä¢ Download transactions to CSV
‚Ä¢ Bank account statement import in QFX (Quicken) and OFX (Microsoft Money) formats with auto-matching to manually entered transactions
‚Ä¢ Clear/reconcile transactions
‚Ä¢ Even more reports!

BASED ON PROVEN ENVELOPE SYSTEM
‚Ä¢ No physical envelopes...only virtual ones!
‚Ä¢ Roll unused funds over to the new month to reward your amazing self-control!
‚Ä¢ Plan finances ahead of time to keep budget on track
‚Ä¢ Live within your means
‚Ä¢ A darn cute envelope mascot

Ad-free, Free Forever version includes 10 regular envelopes & 10 annual envelopes. Use envelope budgeting to plan your spending, not just track it!

SUBSCRIBERS GET MORE FEATURES!

‚Ä¢ Unlimited Envelopes AND Accounts
‚Ä¢ Sync up to 5 devices
‚Ä¢ 7 years of transaction history
‚Ä¢ Personal and friendly email support

Looking for a finance manager, money tracker, checkbook ledger, or household budget planner? Try us out!

Goodbudget: Budget well. Live life. Do good.

Features, bugs? Please email us at support@goodbudget.com! We're happy to help!

[1] https://goodbudget.com/2018/04/goodbudget-top-finance-app/

summary: Budget with a purpose. Plan for what's important. Be stress free!
developerAddress:
1224 Fairfax Avenue
San Francisco, CA 94124
USA
recentChanges: Bug fixes
comments: I really want to use this app with my partner, its exactly what we've been looking for - the problem is that while my partner, who uses an iphone, can set her envelopes' budget periods to be every two weeks, I dont have the same option on the android version of the app, only monthly and yearly! Its very annoying, and preventing me from using it effectively as my income is fortnightly - are there plans for this option to be added to the android version of the app too?

Best budgeting app I've used by far. Very quick to load data. Doesn't ask for all of my personal information. Doesn't allow all transaction types from the app (income, debt payments, envelope filling) which is a bummer, but I use them infrequently enough that I can use the desktop version. Much better experience than Mint overall.

Love the browser version but this App is seriously lacking. Can't see envelope balances when filling, splitting charges is a nightmare. The list goes on. It's like no one who developed the app ever actually tried to use it. It would be 1 star if I didn't like the browser version so much but seriously considering switching due to the app.

The desktop website is great. However, the Android app is sorely lacking in features. The app completely ignores envelope groups, unlike the website which groups the envelopes in both the reports and in the envelopes list and allows you to collapse groups you don't want to see temporarily. I wish I could filter the envelopes on groups and filter transactions on accounts in the app. If I click on an envelope in the reports, I wish to see the corresponding transactions in that time range.

Great app but I would like to know how to use it more effectively . I can't seem to tick off what I have paid in monthly expenses . So my income balance always shows a plus amount. It's not a realistic reflection of my money.

title: 52 Weeks Money Challenge : Ipon Challenge
description:
Who doesn't want more money saved up in their piggy banks?

If you want to start increasing your savings, then it's time that you do the popular 52 weeks money challenge!

Easily get started on the challenge with the help of this app. So what are you waiting for? Download the app today!

Experience these money-saving benefits when you use the app:

‚úì A simple yet effective savings challenge. Save $5 in the first week, then $10 in the next, then $15, and so on. In 52 weeks (1 year), you'll have a total of $6,890 saved!

‚úì Create multiple challenges. Create one challenge for your travel destination, plus another one for that cool new gadget!

‚úì Stay motivated. Add photos and videos in the "Motivation" section that will inspire you to complete your challenges.

‚úì Different types of 52 week challenges.  3 types of 52 week savings plans. See what helps you save the most money.

‚úì Savings tracker. View the ‚ÄúStatistics‚Äù section to get detailed reports and info about your challenge, a feature that your normal piggy bank doesn't have.


Additional features:
- Daily, weekly, and monthly reminders to remind you when you forgot to update a money saving challenge.
- Lock the app to prevent others from seeing how much you‚Äôve earned
-  Also functions as an ipon challenge app for my fellow Filipinos. Do a 52 weeks ipon challenge!
- A money saving app that has a good and user-friendly UI design.

Hoping that you'll have much financial success by completing the 52 weeks challenge.

For problems and concerns with this savings app, please contact the developer at magonapps@gmail.com

Download now and start crushing your financial goals!

App Icon Creators:
- Alfredo Hernandez : https://www.flaticon.com/authors/alfredo-hernandez
- Freepik : https://www.flaticon.com/authors/freepik
- Good Ware : https://www.flaticon.com/authors/good-ware
- Smashicons : https://www.flaticon.com/authors/smashicons
*Note: Some icons were not given attribution since they were provided by https://www.fiverr.com/basuridesign

comments: Good could be better. 52 weeks to 10,000. Maybe have different plans, high dollar amount is divided up. Week1 125.00, wk2 150.00, wk3 175.00, wk4 300.00 then start over. title: 52 Weeks Money Challenge ‚Äì Goal Tracker
description:
52 Week Money Challenge is a best way to saving money and now it spread all of the world.

With its goal feature, you can now keep your saving goals list in this app and get inspired every time you save money in your piggy bank.There is no age limit to start this challenge from today. This money saving app is designed for kids, toddlers, or adults who want to achieve savings goals.

It not only make saving more funny, but also doesn‚Äôt need any trick. Saving some little money every week, it will grow to a large amount after one year (52 weeks)!

What‚Äòs the 52 Weeks Money Challenge - Goal Tracker? 
1. Save $10 at first week
2. After first week, save more than $10 than previous week
3. In the 52nd week, you can save $520
4. For those who are able to and want to save even more, there is also the possibility to start the challenge with $ 50 $ 100, $ 150, $ 200, or up to $ 50 (highest suggested amount to start the challenge) and save up to $ 68,900.00 in only one year!

App Feature
- Different challenge modes to make the savings planning‚Äôs easier.
- You get used to saving so that it becomes a habit for saving every year
- Provide desire starting date setting and saving amount, easier to transfer to this app from papers.
- Customize your savings period, 52 weeks/365 days.
- Set money goal easily and save money Challenge
- Add different currency, you can save travel funds in different countries.
- Through the every week reminder function, you'll never forget to save your money.
- Money saver goal and my saving goal tracker

Why not invite your friend to join this challenge together in the beginning of this year. To make the saving become a game. Just choose a goal, and you can start your saving plan.

title: Savings Organiser
description:
Keep track of your savings with this easy-to-use app.

‚Ä¢ Create a goal for each savings target or budget amount.
‚Ä¢ Add, remove or transfer money between goals.
‚Ä¢ Bored with progress bars? Then add an attractive camera or gallery photo to your goal and watch it gradually reveal itself as you deposit money in your goal. Use this to encourage you to save! Or keep the photos fully revealed all the time if you prefer.
‚Ä¢ View all your goals and your savings progress at a glance on the Home screen.

SPECIAL FEATURES
‚Ä¢ Use 'Unallocated' savings to represent all the savings you haven't assigned to any goal yet.
‚Ä¢ Average savings rates and expected goal completion dates are calculated for each goal.
‚Ä¢ Auto-sort goals on the Home screen by goal name, target amount, or percentage complete.
‚Ä¢ Swipe left or right on the Goal Details screen to move quickly between goals.
‚Ä¢ Transfer money between savings goals as you re-prioritise your plans.
‚Ä¢ Add notes to goals up to 100 characters in length.
‚Ä¢ Set a password to hide your savings from prying eyes!

The app automatically picks a currency from your device's language and country settings. But you can choose a different currency under Settings.

PREMIUM EXTRAS
‚Ä¢ 'Unlimited goals' - buy this to allow more than five goals at a time. Also unlocks drag-and-drop sorting of goals on the Home screen.
‚Ä¢ 'Disable ads' - get rid of those annoying ads forever!

PRIVACY
Your financial data is stored privately on your device so that no other app can access it. The data may also be periodically backed up to Google's servers in case you lose your device and then install this app elsewhere. Backups will only occur if your device is configured to back up its data. Goal photos are excluded from the backup because of space restrictions. No financial data is sent to the app developer.

Google Analytics is used to collect feature usage data to help improve the app. No personal data that would identify you is captured. To opt out of the use of Google Analytics you can uncheck 'Share usage data' on the app's Settings screen.

PERMISSIONS
- Network communication - to serve ads when a network connection is available.
- In-app purchases - speaks for itself!
- Write to external storage (Android Jelly Bean and earlier) - so the camera can save its pictures.

QUESTIONS OR COMMENTS?
‚Ä¢ This app does not link to a bank account or your real savings.

‚Ä¢ The app assumes all your savings are in one currency. This makes it easy to transfer money between your goals.

‚Ä¢ Some buttons only become visible when certain actions are available. For example, you can't withdraw or transfer money from a goal that has no money.

‚Ä¢ Can't launch the app? If you installed it on an external SD card then please ensure the card is in your device and not mounted as USB mass storage media on a PC.

‚Ä¢ If you like this app please rate it 5 stars and tell your friends. Feel free to email redula.dev@gmail.com with questions or suggestions for improvement.

comments: i bought this app a really long time ago and I find it really useful, however the fact that I'm now getting ads again all of a sudden and theyre trying to make me pay to get rid of them is a bit annoying
Im glad, after reading the reviews of this app i can really tell that this is the best by far. thumbs up.. keep up the good work!

I like the idea of this app. For me, personally, need breakdown of "deposits" (+ possible "withdrawals) right on same screen, not just a running total for each item. Will keep looking and uninstalling for now but will keep an eye on new versions for updates in features to raise this from a very basic start. Thx.

Excellent app it has helped me to save for the future. The most I love about this app it has progress bar and it also gives you a % on the tasks it has broken down to each task you have. This is brilliant as while you watch it grow it give you that sense of achievement of the goals you set. Why I didn't look for this before I have no idea. Keep up the good work

title: Dead Spreading:Saving
description:
Biohazard is coming, how can you survive and saving others?

Rescue other companions, get the team of like-minded people and clean the streets of filth!

Unlock soldiers with more unique skills, upgrade weapons, and survive in the last days!

Finish the mission, challenge new levels and search for resources in the ruins!

Arm your soldiers, eliminate all zombies, clean the city!

We believe that you are the hope after the apocalypse, enter the game to save the world now!

summary: Most thrilling action game!Destroy the zombies with your soldiers!
recentChanges: Fix a few bugs.
comments: Thou not the graphics you would love, but still it's an amazing game with cool concept where you not control one but more units as a squad while trying to roam and stay alive. Keep up the good work and kudos developers

This is a very fun and engaging game. If you want to get the best out of it without paying, watch the ads. It's annoying, but it pays dividends. There is a point when the game ceases to be enjoyable, however. Right around level 170, the first few zombies are ridiculously difficult to kill, and are basically invincible for the first few seconds. This isn't a death sentence. However the boss in these levels is so overpowered that it becomes impossible to kill them without using all your powerups

Everything is great about the game however the only thing is that I have hundreds of gems and no cash to upgrade my soldiers ......it would be nice if you could turn gems into game cash but apart from that it's a fantastic game üëç
It doesn't work properly.. Zombies appear pink and the remaining number is not correct and the game glitch so I can't pass any level.. I don't understand what's happening
Really like the game. Not as hard as everyone says, its a free game you have to grind, get over it. I don't like that I can't transfer to my new phone thought. Not starting over so just done.

title: Budgetly: Best budget app ( Save money )
description:
Budgetly is an utility App that helps to save money and track expenses. There are a lot of features that will help to manage your budget. All the working process will be described below. The main function of this app is being simple, clear, easy and pleasant for all users.

‚ñ∫ INCOMES & CURRENCY
For start to save money and track your expenses you will need to start providing your recurring income and the currency of your earnings. So when you enter first time in the app, it will request that params.

‚ñ∫ SAVINGS
You will have to set the amount that you want to save each month. Only then the App will be able to start setting everything for you. When provided that you can start to save money checking main dashboard.

‚ñ∫ OVERVIEW - HOME SCREEN
So, you provided necessary information and now you can start using all App functionalities to save money and track expenses. In the home screen you will be able to see a lot of things that might help you. Some of them are: 
- Current money available.
- Percentage of savings at this moment
- Colors that will inform you about current situation ( Blue - over saving goal; Yellow - approaching to your goal; Red - you wasted more that you have set in savings )
- Some useful data about you savings and expenses at the bottom.

As well in that page you can go again to previous screen of setting your data or to the menu and select any option offered there.

‚ñ∫ EXPENSES OR INCOMES
That part is destined to log your incomes and expenses. You can choose one of offered typical things or you can write your own description about the movement. As well there is an option to choose between income and expense and make them simple or recurring. If you select recurring it will automatically add in the next month, so you won‚Äôt have to log it again.

‚ñ∫ RECORDS
This page offers an overview about logged movements. So, when you add your incomes or expenses you will be able to see a list of all of them. You can filter by all, expenses or incomes. There is an option to delete or edit an operation. Just drag it and options will appear. That useful functions will save your time.

‚ñ∫ CHARTS
The charts part is basically an overview of your progress. By provided information you can see how you save money or see how your expenses are divided. There are 2 types: 
- The first one shows savings by month. So you can see amounts that you have been saving during the year and below you can see the total of all months.
- The second one is pie chart. It shows percentage of each expense of current month. By clicking on a part it will show the amount expended below.

‚ñ∫ NEW PRO VERSION
Below you can find features that PRO version offers to you:
- Remove ads permanently.
- Adds an option to log savings for previous months of current year. So you can update total saved amount and charts data.
- An option to reset months data and current logged operations. 

Save money, track expenses, control your movements. Budgetly is best budget app to do this. Try it and enjoy!

title: How to Save Money Fast
description:
How To Save Money Fast Tips, Here are four proven methods for saving. But let me warn you ahead of time. These only work for those who apply them. There are no secrets involved in how to save money fast, just a few simple steps that can make all difference in the world.

Features of the app:

Can Use For Offline App
Updated regularly
You can ask questions to us for more idea about content.
Simple app book Knowledge like pocket on your phone
You can also send us your suggestions and we will add them inside the app For more updates.

Little knowledge about how to save money fast here:

Budget your money! I know, you've heard that a million times, but have you ever really gotten serious enough to make a budget and stick to it? As long as we spend, spend, spend, we are never going to save, save, save. Take some time, sit down and write out your expenses, set aside a reasonable amount for emergencies. Give yourself a little spending money during the week. And then put the rest away in a safe place, savings account or whatever and leave it alone. The only way you can save it is if you don't spend it. So remember, the number one way on how to save money fast is a GOOD BUDGET!

Spend Wisely! Don't buy on impulse. Don't go grocery shopping when you haven't eaten all day. If you want to know how to save money fast, don't go walking up and down the aisles in Walmart, right after you cashed your check on Friday. Don't buy something just because it's on sale. Ask yourself, do I really need this or do I just want it. You can save a great deal of money by using the good sense God has given you. If you don't need it, don't buy it. SPEND WISELY!

Use Available resources! Coupons, sales ads, online sales are just a few available resources that can really help you save. It takes a little time to look through and clip the coupons you want and check all the sales adds for good deals, but if you are wanting to know an excellent method of how to save money fast, this is it. You can save hundreds of dollars a month on your grocery bill and buy good quality merchandise for bargain basement prices, if you will do your homework. USE AVAILABLE RESOURCES!

Change your habits! If you go out to eat twice or three times a week, stop it! Start making it once a week or maybe twice in a month. If you leave from work and have lunch at a restaurant every day, stop it! Start "brown bagging it." Take a sandwich and a yogurt to work with you. If you are really interested in how to save money fast, this little change in your lifestyle will make a huge difference, trust me. CHANGE YOUR HABITS!

These are just a few tips on how to save money fast. I can't say honestly that I always apply them, but when I do, they work without fail. Happy Saving!

Hope this has been helpful, and Download how to save money fast for get more tips about saving money tips.

title: Simple Money Saving Tips
description:
How well do you manage your finances? Do you always intend to save money to only end up spending them a few days later?
 
Not knowing how to properly handle and manage your money is a bad habit and we should all learn to make smarter decisions when it comes to our finances.

Simple Money Saving Tips provides users with useful tips and simple ways to save money.  It provides many creative money saving ideas, tips to stay on a budget and make the best of what we have.

Learn just how easy it is to make the small changes that can result in saving you your money. Learning the importance of saving money, money saving ideas, how to save money, insurance tips and budgeting tips are just among the few things you'll learn when you download Simple Money Saving Tips.

Application Highlights:

+   100% Free Download
+   Compatible with 99% of mobile phones worldwide
+   Requires only small space on device
+   Useful and simple ideas 
+   Language and graphics suited for all ages
+   Very user friendly as it is very easy to select, scroll and navigate

Read through these useful financial info and tips and you will see just how easy it is to save money the proper way without going through too many changes in life. Also, learn the important points to pay extra attention to so that you get the best lessons in life and make smart choices.

The categories in our app include:

+   General Saving Tips
+   Food Saving Tips
+   Transportation Saving tips
+   Health and Medical Saving Tips

Some of these tips and ideas may be very common acts yet very helpful. These ideas may inspire you to better handle money.
Start saving up today for that car, house or anything you've been wanting to have.

Our simple yet humble Simple Money Saving Tips provides many useful tips and ideas on saving money. 

Whether if you're a high school student or just started work life, these tips are suitable for all ages. 
Users can learn to practice the right habits of saving money and make smarter choices in life.

Learn how to differentiate between the good and the best and how to make the right decisions for yourself and the people you love.

Read through these Simple Ways To Save Money and get many simple ideas on how to stay on your budget.
All you will require is your mobile phone because this application is of simplicity. This application is available for any Android users.

You'll be surprised how many seemingly obvious these tips can help save you money and help you be more frugal in your spending.
Get inspired and share Simple Money Saving Tips with the ones you love so they too may learn these valuable lessons in life and make smarter life choices.

Enjoy and we wish you only the best!


DISCLAIMER

The developers make no representation or warranties with respect to the accuracy, applicability, fitness, and completeness of the content of this app.
The information contained in this app is strictly meant to be used for educational purposes. if you wish to apply the ideas contained in this app, you are taking full responsibility of your actions.

The information contained in this app is strictly meant to be used for educational purposes. if you wish to apply the ideas contained in this app, you are taking full responsibility of your actions.

description:
A smart way to save time and money on your weekly shopping! Discover great products and quickly create your shopping list from the best advertised deals in town. Add your loyalty cards to the app to help declutter your wallet and never forget to collect your points at checkout. Take advantage of coupons and cash-back offers to save even more!

View flyers and mobile-only coupons to get the best offers from your favourite local retailers. Price match, earn cash back, create custom shopping lists and plan your shopping trips. Carry all your loyalty cards with you in one convenient place and earn points even faster. With your smart shopping app you‚Äôll be saving in no time.
                                            
Shop Smart, Save Easy & Reward Yourself

recentChanges: Save.ca updated to correct PayPal related defects including previous restrictions and to enable users to cash out any existing cash back balance.
comments: The app needs improvement. When the display results are displayed the font is over taking the pictures and it's too cluttered. The flyers are ok it's the search feature and how it is displayed which needs work. Flipp is so much user friendly. Perhaps you should form a partnership with them? Thx

Absolute garbage app, don't waste your time. Doesn't provide a way to use coupons in app, have to print or have them mailed. Integration with FB fails in the app even though Facebook notifies me of the request. Your developers need to go back to school!
This app is a MUST use if you buy groceries like milk, oat meal, tuna, cleansers/shampoos/conditioners. I hat having to print but very good app.

Slow working app. Screen goes blank when I add something to the shopping list for example. App does not rotate to landscape mode which I could actually live without. The worst part about this app is the limited search functionality of it, I know three stores have an item on sale but your app couldn't find that item at all.

Love the features of this app - the ability to print my list, export my list to a text file, save favourites. I've tried lots of shopping apps and this one has by far the best features, but I could only give it three stars because it crashes frequently.

title: Simple piggy bank - save money easy
description:
With this application you can set a goal and go to it.

A simple, user-friendly interface allows you to create a goal and fill the piggy bank with one touch.

Of course, this is not real money. But when the goal is achieved, you will not be sorry for real money, buying what you want. You will know, that behind virtual coins there are real money saved.

title: Dosh: Save money & get cash back when you shop
description:
Earn cash rewards when you shop with Dosh and get cash back by shopping on items you already buy. Plus you can get money for shopping, eating and booking hotels. 

Get money back when you shop and dine at the places you visit every week including Wendy‚Äôs, Uber, Old Navy, Gap, Grubhub, Home Depot, Walgreens, Forever 21, Sephora, and more! From your favorite restaurant to retail store, earning cash back with Dosh couldn‚Äôt be easier. You can even get cash back when you make a hotel booking with your debit or credit card.

Dosh automatically gets you cash back whenever you shop at your favorite retail stores, restaurants and book hotels. Enjoy cash rewards, exclusive shopping deals and watch your cash savings increase every time you use your linked card on everyday items.

Whether you want to eat out at your favorite restaurant, search for some shopping deals or build on your cash savings, Dosh helps you put money back in your pocket. Shopping deals, cash savings, deals and more!

Five reasons you‚Äôll love using Dosh to earn cash back:

1. Pay with your credit card and get cash back - Securely link your credit and debit cards and whenever you pay with your linked cards, Dosh gets you cash back.

2. Cash rewards and money back whenever you shop, and dine out - Pay with your linked debit or credit card at thousands of stores, and restaurants, and get cash back automatically in your Dosh Wallet.

3. Cash back when you book a hotel globally - Pay with your linked card at thousands of hotels worldwide and get up to 40% cash back in your Dosh Wallet.

4. Mobile offers are here - Open the Dosh app, find your favorite brands, tap Shop from the app to launch the brand website (or app) and do your shopping. When you‚Äôre done check out and get your cash back!



5. Use your cash rewards however you want - Transfer your cash to bank accounts, Venmo, PayPal, or even donate to charity from the app! With Dosh, you get cold, hard cash to spend anyway you like.

FEATURES:

- Get cash back automatically - Unlike other cash back apps, there‚Äôs no need to cut out retail coupons, scan receipts, or remember restaurant discount codes. Through secure debit and credit card connection, Dosh automatically finds existing offers or shopping deals, redeems them, then puts the cash savings into your Dosh Wallet. From a hotel booking to a deal at your favorite restaurant let Dosh help you earn cash back the easy way!

- Choose from thousands of brands & merchants - Dosh is available at thousands of retail stores, restaurants, and hotels with new offers added every day like Wendy‚Äôs, Uber, Old Navy, Gap, Grubhub, Home Depot, Walgreens, Forever 21, Sephora, and more! You can even earn cash back on a hotel booking - so what are you waiting for? 

- Refer friends & family - Get paid for each friend who signs up with your referral code. When you share Dosh with people you love, it‚Äôs like putting cash right into their pockets.

LOVE DOSH?

Please take a moment to review our app! Your feedback is our greatest asset‚Äîespecially when that means helping more people get cash back.

Download Dosh now and get paid to do the things you already do!

title: üí∞ Save Money and Control Your Expenses | ExpCon¬Æ
description:
ExpCon¬Æ - The application that will allow you to save more money while controlling your expenses and income and learn how to save more money. Without lite, premium or pro versions, everything is included here :) So you can prepare and manage your budgets in a more comfortable way.

Hello, and welcome, to our accompanying document. Here you will find how to use the app for  expense control  and to save money for free and without the need for useless notes and papers. 

¬°The app works offline!

You will learn how to make use of the application to be able to keep a better financial control and manage the assets and liabilities that generate finances in your checking accounts, and best of all, it is also for children and students!

On the other hand, if you are a business, whether small, medium or large, you can also keep track of expenses and income in a very useful way and for free with our spending tracker. For example, save by checking the gas bills spent by official cars.

Forget about the old account record books and start using ExpCon ‚Äã‚Äãnow! And keep a more satisfactory monthly management of earnings with this app.

An example of use would be, the elaboration of a monthly or annual life budget, how you prefer. You can know the monthly entries and exits you have if you use it for a month or two to make that budget later.

Set your money saving goals, draw up a plan and start generating more cash!

 Categories of income / expenses 

In the main navigation menu you will be able to access the basic categories of income and expenses that the application has.

These categories are designed by the system to control such expenses and income. But you can add more if necessary. To do this, click on the button in the lower right of this particular window.

With this functionality you can generate reports and graphical reporting to see your finances more in perspective.

 Check statistics monthly 

The statistics panel is prepared to follow the progress of the income / expenses that you generate over time in your personal finances and allows us to save money weekly.

With this system you can pose very cool challenges to save money!

The use is simple, it is enough that you choose the start day and the end day and a graph will be generated that will contain all the income and expenses manager that you have made in the corresponding days to see them in a more visual way.

Start using it and feel like a real administrator of your pocket and your accounting.

On the main screen it will show us the information of the daily income / expenses that we have had in an area that can slide from top to bottom.

This list will include data such as: the category where it was made, the amount and the grade.

By doing Swipe from left to right we can see the expenses / income depending on the type of gesture so that we can differentiate them.

To add a  expenditure  or an  income  just tap on the lower right button and a window will appear that we have to fill in. Only the quantity and category where it is to be placed is mandatory.

 Countries and regions for use and paid 

This app is designed to work in all countries of the world which allows us to save money in Chile, Spain, India, Africa, etc ... with our money manager.

The system has currency selection. Most of the most important in the world are included.

We could use: Indian rupees, US dollars, European euros, Pakistani rupees, etc... for you note/s.

Download it now and feel like the daily cat planner does the hard work for you and gives you tips to save money daily with its Premium features and reports! 

We have been nominated twice for the best savings app in a startup contest in Spain. Being 3rd and 2nd.
