title: 52 Weeks Money Challenge: New Year Resolution
description:
Challenge yourself and take the 52 weeks money challenge app. 

Tired of using your Excel sheet templates just to record your savings for today? Now you can record your savings in the palm of your hand.

The app is flexible, you can define how much you need to save each week and the saving amount increases. You can make a deposit in your piggy bank saving container as small as you can and reward yourself an ice cream after you completed the whole 52 weeks money challenge!üòé

Did I also mention that you can try the challenge in reverse? With this new feature, start with the biggest amount on your first week then gradually decreases for later weeks. That is, if you really want to be a hardcore piggy bank master ;)

This app is created to help people like you to focus on your goal to save money, track savings, and keep from spending to achieve your money goals. Want something new? Then start your saving journey now!
And its really easy to use. It has intuitive and clean design, optimized and reliable system.

There is no age limit to start this challenge. This money saving app is designed for kids, toddlers, or adults who want to achieve savings goals.

With its goal feature, you can now keep your saving goals list in this app and get inspired every time you save money in your piggy bank.

Feature of the 52 Weeks Money Challenge app:
‚úÖ‚úÖ‚úÖ Reverse mode challenge - Most 52 weeks money saving challenge apps do not this feature, the idea is you start your week with the biggest amount and gradually decreases it as time goes by. 
‚úÖ‚úÖ‚úÖ Option for Zero-Increase - With this recent feature added, you can now able to finish the week's deposit w/o an increase. This is convenient if you ran out of money for that week but do not want to ruin the record ;)
‚úÖ Preferred Date - Start the challenge any date you want, want next month? No problem. 
‚úÖ ‚úÖFlexible Weekly Increase - If you are tight on budget, you might want to lower the weekly increase. 
‚úÖ‚úÖ Initial Amount - You have an initial savings you want to cover that in the challenge, the app got you.
‚úÖ‚úÖ Track Goals - Declare all your savings goals with desired amount in the app. That way, another reason for money saving motivation.
‚úÖ Currencies - The app supports more than 50+ currencies including peso, us dollar and more!üíµ
‚úÖ Track Savings - Armed with simple and clean statistics screen, never lose track with your savings goals progress again.

The app will continue to be free. 

Many features to come =)

title: HOW TO SAVE MONEY
description:
How to Save Money - You can save money in all sorts of ways. You can put cash in a safe. You can simply mentally categorize a certain amount of money in your checking account as ‚Äúsavings.‚Äù But it‚Äôs crucial to put savings in an account created specifically for that purpose. It‚Äôs safest there, it‚Äôs a good place for an emergency fund and provides you with the ability to buy something expensive. Plus it‚Äôs earning a little interest.

You can open a traditional savings account at your bank. Or you can open a savings investment account online ‚Äî and probably end up earning much more interest compared to your regular run of the mill savings account.

That all sounds kind of‚Ä¶boring, right? And, you know what, it is kind of boring. But in personal finance, the boring stuff allows you to do exciting stuff. What saving a little money and keeping it handy allows you to do in the long term ‚Äî like have more fun and, you know, provide for your family‚Äî isn‚Äôt boring at all. Now that you know where to start, here‚Äôs how to get some money from your pocket into that savings account.

Install How to Save Money app and start now.

What saving a little money and keeping it handy allows you to do in the long term ‚Äî like have more fun and, you know, provide for your family‚Äî isn‚Äôt boring at all. Now that you know where to start, here‚Äôs how to get some money from your pocket into that savings account.

Install How to Save Money app and start now.
summary: Great Ways on How to Save Money | Even When You're Broke.
recentChanges: First release of How to Save Money, How to Save Money Fast, How to Save Money Every Month.

title: Money Saving Tips 101
description:
Saving money is not easy and many people don't know where to start. Although many do acknowledge the importance of saving money and how useful it could be, many still take it for granted. Here are simple ways on how to start saving up.

Money Saving Tips 101 app provides users with the creative ways on how to save money ideas. Your savings are income not spent or in other words, deferred consumption. There are many methods of saving and we aspire to provides users with many interesting and relatable ways so users can be inspired to cultivate this good habit.

Why is saving money important?

The habit of saving is itself an education that fosters many virtues where it cultivates the sense of order, reaches self-denial, trains to forethought and so broadens the mind to think ahead. 

Saving money isn‚Äôt about being able to buy bigger and better things. It‚Äôs about being prepared to take care of yourself and your family when anything unfortunate happens.

Saving up some money can help a person become financially secure and provide a safety net in case of an emergency.

Application key features:

‚Ä¢  100% FREE application for all
‚Ä¢  Lightweight and very easy to use
‚Ä¢  Simply scroll to navigate 
‚Ä¢  Simple and practical ways to save money
‚Ä¢  Simple language and grammar for all
‚Ä¢  Easily one of the best apps to download!

Money Saving Tips 101 includes simple ways to save many in many aspects of life, which includes useful and easy every day saving tips, food and lifestyle saving tips and learning to stay on budget when it comes to transportation and medical expenses.

Whether you are already using a spending tracker and are saving savvy or well on your way reaching your saving goal, you might still learn a new thing or two when you read through these tips on how to save money ideas.

Get inspired and share these simple ways to save money with the ones you love so they too may learn these valuable lessons in life and make smarter life choices. Please leave some feedback if you like our app so we will keep on improving developing quality apps exclusively for our users.

title: Money Manager: Expense Tracker, Free Budgeting App
description:
Money Manager helps you track your financial activity efficiently. Its simple design makes it lightweight, straightforward and very easy to use.  It‚Äôs done in one click, because you don‚Äôt need to fill anything except the amount. You need just a few SECONDS daily to save the amount and each spending purpose. No matter where you are just a couple of taps will save your expense. 

Key features:

Easy to Use, Clean and Intuitive Expense & Income Tracker
‚Ä¢ Intuitive and easy to use user interface. No redundancy Add new records extremely fast. 

Tracking Expenses and Incomes
‚Ä¢ Easily record the transaction to track where your money comes and goes.

The Whole Picture in One Place
‚Ä¢ Clear view on your financial life. Better understand where your money comes and goes with visualized reports about income, expense by time and category. 


Spending / Income Pie Chart
‚Ä¢ See your spending distribution on the nice and informative chart or get, view your transactions grouped by categories.

Budget and Bill Organizing
‚Ä¢ Organizing bills by week, month and year as well as by categories.Record all items in a single transaction with different category and amount.

Reminder
‚Ä¢ Set reminders to remain you to record transactions every day.

No Advertising, Without limitation Features, Free
‚Ä¢ Money Manager can be used for Free, without ads and no features restriction.

Languages

‚Ä¢ English
‚Ä¢ Chinese (Traditional)
‚Ä¢ Japanese
‚Ä¢ Korean
‚Ä¢ Russian
‚Ä¢ Spanish
‚Ä¢ Portuguese
‚Ä¢ Hindi
‚Ä¢ Indonesian
‚Ä¢ German
‚Ä¢ French

Money management is always complicated and most of the time you get to wonder where did all your money go, luckily, our simple personal finance app can helps you easily manage your money and keep track of your expense. You can stay on top of your money anytime, anywhere.

recentChanges:
1. Performance Enhancement
2. Improve User Experience
2. Bug Fix
comments: Disappointed with the feature of not being able to restore your data from an older device. I was consistently maintaining a tab of all my expenses on a daily basis for the last 7 months. However, my phone was stolen a couple of days back. Now, after installing the app on my new phone, I'm not able to login and view all my expenses. The whole purpose of using this app is defeated if I cannot login to another device and view my expenses. Very disappointed.

I rarely leave comments but I love the app. It's smooth and easy to use. I've been using this app for like two weeks already and it really helped me track my expenses which also helped me save up. My only problem is that I can't sign in or connect the app to my facebook or gmail. I hope you can do something about it!

Great, easy to use app to just track where your money goes. What does annoy me: you cannot set date range. We don't all get paid on the first or last of the month. If my month runs 15th - 14th, I am unable to properly track monthly expenses. Wish this would be fixed. Then 5 stars from me!

Such a great UI. The best interface and convenient to use. Had fallen in love with the whole operation. But despite may negative reviews the developers are ignorant of the login issue. Please atleast respond so we know you're working on a fix. Don't ruin your whole product just because of such a simple issue. Please fix it. I myself am a developer and know how important a product is to a developer. Please care about it. And care about the what your consumers think.

Love this app. I am only just getting to really use it now I have moved out. It has an easy pie chart to work out where all your money is going. It will also have the amount you spent and a percentage. I learnt 46% is a bit high for my household bills. Bit have paid a one off insurance for a car. So this will vary monthly. I'm not the best with money and find It hard to save. It would be a good idea to be able to add 2 savers accounts. As I don't mix my main account with the savings ones.

title: Challenge Savings - Money, saving, goal, 52 weeks
description:
Based on the week challenge for saving money. 52 weeks challenge 2020

The money challenge is to put each week the amount of money equivalent to the number of week in which we are.

Example, week 1 --> 1$, week 2 --> 2$ and so on.

You can also have a personalized challenge, create your own money challenge by defining the goal, the amount you want to save (change the base money) and in how many weeks you want to achieve it.

For the 52 weeks challenge goal is to get 1378$

Features:
‚úÖ Custom challenge
‚úÖ Custom Goal Picture
‚úÖ Custom Amount
‚úÖ Predefined amount
‚úÖ 52 weeks challenge button
‚úÖ Goals tracker money
‚úÖ Goals planner
‚úÖ Weeks money saving

With this saving money app you could achieve your goals. You could get the goal you wanted easily by saving the custom amount every week. Free goals money tracker that works.

This is the 52 week money saving challenge 2019. Try it and in 52 week savings challenge you could get 1378$ or more it depends on how much you want to save by defining the base money. You could even get it in less time!!

How to achieve your goals? Simple start by defining an achievable amount and just work on it. You‚Äôll see that this is the way to achieve your dreams, in the beginning you should aim to an easy target and then aims at higher dreams.

It is well known that with discipline and perseverance you will get the amount of money that you want. After every goal achieved you‚Äôll see it in the main screen to boost your desire to keep finishing other goals.

Can you do it?

title: RoosterMoney: Piggy Bank, Allowance and Chore App
description:
RoosterMoney is a pocket money allowance manager, chore chart, savings tracker and piggy bank all within a single app.  Available in any currency and designed to help parents teach their kids about money, the app also acts as a chore tracker & reward chart.  Simple for parents and fun for kids, parents remain the Bank of Mum & Dad and no deposits are required.
With RoosterPLUS, parents have the option to use additional features like the  family chore manager, set interest rates or add multiple family members.  

Key Features for Parents üë®‚Äçüë©‚Äçüëß
üëâ Sign up to take advantage of the RoosterMoney piggy bank and savings tracker to record pocket money comings and goings
üëâ Create to-do lists with a household chore chart to enable kids to earn their allowance 
üëâ Create savings goals and select what your kids can save for
üëâ Introduce your kids to the idea of giving with our Give pot, powered by JustGiving
üëâ Set up a pocket money routine; issue allowances automatically each week or on an ad hoc basis in your preferred currency ($, ¬£, ‚Ç¨ and more).
üëâ Alternatively, you can select stars as your currency, so that the app becomes a kids chore chart with star money!
üëâ View current balances and statements, so you can track their money.
üëâ Boost pocket money or add gifts for completed chores, achievements or good behavior.
üëâ Set regular or one-off chores with our 'jobs' feature (available within RoosterPLUS).
üëâ Withdraw money and hand it to your kids so they can spend it in shops.
üëâ Take pictures of things at the shops and set these as savings goals for your kids to save towards.
üëâ Lock / unlock their allowance with ease.
üëâ A great way to teach your children about money.

Key Features for Kids üëß üë¶
üëâ Take control of your allowance and pocket money.
üëâ View how much money you have saved or spent by checking your statement.
üëâ Create savings goals!
üëâ Save money to add to a Savings Account.
üëâ Customise your dashboard and make your account your very own.
üëâ Get a head-start towards learning the true value of money!

What is RoosterMoney?
Our mission is a simple one: to transform the way the world talks about money with their kids. We provide an easy-to-use pocket money allowance manager, chore chart, reward tracker piggy bank app that empowers parents to raise money-wise kids.

We set out to fix a specific problem:  Allowances are a great idea in principle, however finding a system that works for your family is hard, particularly when you‚Äôre juggling the weekly shop, work emails and soccer practice!

We believe in the power of allowances to transform your child‚Äôs  understanding of money ‚Äì whether you give them 20¬¢ a week or $20.  And most importantly, we think these lessons are best learned by keeping things simple for parents and fun for kids.  

PLUS PRICING & TERMS
RoosterMoney offers 2 auto-renewing subscription options for Extra PLUS Features:
$2.49 per month
$18.99 per year
Listed prices are for United States customers. Pricing in other countries may vary and actual charges may be converted to your local currency depending on the country of residence.
Your PLUS subscription will automatically renew at the end of each term and your credit card will be charged.
Terms & Conditions: https://www.roostermoney.com/terms
Privacy Policy: https://www.roostermoney.com/privacy

We have also made some stability improvements on Chores
comments: Can't find a way to stop notifications. I hate getting daily notifications about stuff will not use for another several years. My daughter is 4, she won't be logging in by herself anytime soon. App seems pretty cool other than the annoying notifications.

Honestly such a brilliant app. I paid the extra ¬£24 for the year premium and it's worth every penny in terms of the amount of motivation it's given my son to be more conscious of helping around the house. It's really great for him to be able to physically see what he needs to do and be able to tick it off. Then with the pocket money he gets, he can set his own goals and manage his own money into it. Which allows him a certain amount of independence, whilst also leaving me able to control it too.

This is an amazing app, well worth paying the subscription for the debit card. You can set chores for your child and extra jobs which they then complete on the phone, even send photos to prove. This then adds a percentages to their monthly allowance or you manage that yourself. You then add tje allowance from your card to your child's, you manage where they can spend (online, stores, ATM withdrawal). Their pin and CVC is ONLY stored in the app and have the power to freeze the card from the app.

We downloaded this app with the hope that it would encourage our sons to help with chores. It was great at first, but then we ran into an issue with it not being able to save any changes we wanted to make to the allowance amount and frequency. I reached out to the support team and over a period of a week, they kept in touch with me until the bug was corrected. The app is great, but their customer service is amazing! Thanks to Alice and the rest of the team for working to make this app great!

Requires additional subscription to track 'jobs'/chores to earn allowance. Uses their own payment screen rather then Google, and wouldn't successfully process with either of two known good card numbers. At this point I'm concerned I made a mistake in giving my card information to an unknown app and will need to cancel them for possible fraud.

title: NerdWallet: Credit Score, Budgeting & Finance
description:
See the bigger picture of your money, stay in the know whenever your credit score or finances change, and get personalized recommendations to help you grow your money and reach your financial goals. 

Download this personal finance app today and join the millions of people who are already using NerdWallet to make smart money moves. 

Easily see the bigger picture of your money
Get a clear and complete view of your finances. With easy-to-read summaries and insights, you can easily check your credit score report, account balances, spending and more ‚Äì all on one screen.  

Stay close to your money with notifications and alerts
We'll keep you up to speed when anything major changes to your finances ‚Äì whether it's a large purchase, deposit or major change to your credit score.

Get personalized recommendations
See how you can build your credit score, avoid paying late fees, earn more interest and more ‚Äì all with insights that are personal to you. 

Grow your money with rewards
Maximize your points and miles, earn more cash back and easily find the best products for you. 

CREDIT REPORT TRACKING AND MONITORING

See the important details on your credit report
Easily check your score, learn how to build your credit score and know where you stand on all the most important credit report factors.

SPENDING AND SAVING FEATURES

Track your total money
Know your grand total and easily see how you're doing across your checking, savings, investment, and retirement accounts ‚Äì¬†all on one screen.

See the ins and outs of your money every month
We factor in your income, expenses and upcoming bills so you know how much you have left to save or spend ‚Äì making it easy to check how you're doing. 

Know where your money is going
After linking your accounts, you can easily see your spending broken down by category to help you spot trends.

Get insights about your spending
See tailored insights and financial savings tips that are personal to you, and can help you build your bottom line. 

Take action on our money-growing recommendations
Make free transfers between your accounts at different banks without leaving NerdWallet. All you have to do is link your accounts. 

See the best products for you
Your situation is unique; your money moves should be, too. Get money-saving product recommendations based on your credit score and spending.

TIPS TO HELP YOU EARN MORE REWARDS

Take advantage of your most rewarding cards
See the rewards rates on each of your cards so you know what to swipe where. You don't even have to link your accounts to see these tips. 

Extra cash in your pocket
You don't need a rewards card to earn rewards. Just link any qualifying card and start earning an additional 2-10% cash back at participating stores, both online and nearby.

DEBT-TRACKING TOOLS

See the comprehensive view of what you owe
From loans to credit card debt, you can get a personal view of everything you owe.

Stay on top of upcoming payments
Never miss a credit card bill with helpful reminders when bills are due. 

Download this personal finance app today and see why NerdWallet gets mentioned by NBC, CNN, Fox, the New York Times, the Wall Street Journal and many, many more publications.

comments: Works well when it links accounts. It booted one of my major accounts off and now my information is incorrect and incomplete (for 6 Months). I have not been able to successfully contact support and resolve this issue. App is ideal otherwise. I'm looking, and no updates available. I dont know what to do. No phone support. When I did the chat support, no resolution.

Post install setup flow is a bad experience. There is a screen where you can select the types of use cases you plan on leveraging the app for. I was planning on clicking a few but when I clicked the first one (credit score) it automatically navigated into the credit score setup flow. Upon completion it didn't take me back to select another one. So I then I linked my bank account and the account balances were incorrect. The app allowed me to unlink my bank account but not my credit score account.

Love this app! I already knew about the website years ago and loved using them to choose credit cards. But this app really is a step up. It helps me keep track of my credit score, see my accounts, how I'm spending money, home valuation details and it give me information about how to improve my credit.

Illuminating, finally an app that hasn't tried to sell me something in the first 10 minutes and let me just organize my finances onto one app. The Robo Advisors send you to pointed articles, and they're sized to answer thoughtful questions without information overload. Highly recommend.

Constantly disconnecting from my accounts. It is getting pretty bad to the point where every time I check something is needing reverification. Please fix your app so I can go back to giving it five stars.

title: Samsung Max - Data Savings & Privacy Protection
description:
An easy-to-use data manager, and privacy assistant, exclusively for Samsung.  
‚óè Save data in your favorite apps
‚óè Scan for app privacy risks and shield your privacy
‚óè Manage your apps

Save mobile data . Protect your Privacy. Get updates, alerts, stats, and tips on everything your apps are doing, and how to manage them.

Watch MORE, listen MORE, and browse MORE without concern for your data plan or your personal privacy - Samsung Max has you covered with both savings and privacy protection.

The most efficient way to stretch your data plan and save the money you spend on data. Track and control your apps‚Äô data consumption on mobile and Wi-Fi, or easily block background data, and data access for any app. Samsung Max advises you when apps consume aggressive amounts of background data, and gives you control to allow or block access. 

FEATURES
‚Ä¢ Samsung Max offers foreground data savings / data compression service and background data management to EXTEND YOUR TIME in all of your apps without your mobile data plan running out as quickly - perfect for everyday data savings, maximum savings when travelling, or when you encounter poor network conditions. 
‚Ä¢ SAVINGS REPORTS - See the data your apps are using and reduce it by turning on data savings - to save your data and money.
‚Ä¢ MANAGE APPS by limiting or restricting their mobile and Wi-Fi data consumption to save money. It's easy,  Samsung Max will give you alerts for apps using too much background data.
‚Ä¢ WI-FI SECURITY - Use Samsung Max‚Äôs super-secure and encrypted connections when on public Wi-Fi to ensure your personal information is protected.
‚Ä¢ INCOGNITO - Go incognito in all your apps to avoid targeted ads and data snoopers from tracking you. Throw those tracking companies off your trail. 
‚Ä¢ Get PRIVACY REPORTS to better manage both your privacy within apps and network connections.
‚Ä¢ ULTRA APPS will save data, protect your privacy , and give you more powerful control over the experience of your favorite social networks and destinations without wasting your mobile data plan or putting your privacy at risk. Ultra apps are advanced web apps that load mobile website versions of your favorite services, but they are optimized by Samsung Max‚Äôs cloud technology. 
‚Ä¢ BOOST WI-FI connectivity in crowded Wi-Fi hotspots or weak signal areas. 

HOW IT WORKS
With data saving modes or privacy modes activated, all your network traffic from your apps is compressed and encrypted by Samsung Max‚Äôs servers before it reaches your Android device. A bank-grade, secure network connection means even when you are on public Wi-Fi your personal information is protected, and Max‚Äôs data savings cloud means the data usage is as efficient as possible. 

PREMIUM MODE
To support the most advanced and FREE data savings service, and the powerful Secure Wi-Fi and Privacy protection service, Samsung Max shows ads to keep the services free. 

There is an option to control your ad experience. You can choose to view ads inside the app or enable premium mode, which grants you access to powerful app management features and unlimited usage of savings and privacy services. In exchange, it shows you ads in the Samsung lock screen ONLY while your device is plugged in charging. Choose how you want to experience ads, and enjoy the powerful and free data savings and privacy protection services from Samsung. 

Have questions or need help? Visit: http://www.samsungmax.com/

End User Terms:
By downloading and/or using this product, you acknowledge and agree to the end user license agreement at http://max.apps.samsung.com/eula and Privacy Statement at http://max.apps.samsung.com/pp.

comments: The developer email does 't work when I tried to make contact over a mistake I made in paying 2 times for the app. But the app itself is a 4 star only on the basis that deluxe premium paid customers should have the option of 3 locations. But I do love the app but it would do well with some more tweaking to benefit those who are willing to pay for it. Even to give a few more ultra apps. VPN is all over the place, and Datally is free. So I'd welcome a little more. But thanks Samsung!

Makes you think it is an official Samsung app. When it is indeed made by a 3rd party developer. The so called "premium" mode puts ads on your lockscreen when charging. Thought I liked it when I first installed then slowly grew to dislike. Just uninstalled. Find a better VPN app and hopefully Samsung will actually make an official vpn app.

i have to admit this is an amazing app, and for some reason i get premium for free wich means everything unlocked no monthly payments and no in app ads only when you are charging you get a different lockscreen with a small add on the bottom. that's my only negative √°nd that you have to get used to the layout and what settings are located on wich tab but considering i got used to it realtively quick. i'd say this is the best vpn/datasaver.. out there i took a star off because ofc ads are a thing

Not a bad app in general, puts a bunch of existing feature in one interface BUT the reason for 2 stars and uninstalling after I do review is, built in VPN block me from connecting with addresses i go to on a frequent basis. Legitimate sites with no questionable content. Have to minimize app, disconnect VPN , the go back and proceed. NONSENCE

Installed it, seems good. The app drains a lot of battery very quickly. The connection with the app activated is slow. Please fix it. Also if you uninstall the app and install it again, it doesn't have a history log.

title: Saving Your Relationship
description:
Even the happiest relationships go through troubled periods. Life is so full of change
and uncertainties and these can certainly put relationships to the test.

This guide aims to help people who are facing difficulties within their relationship
and need help with how to get things back on track. You may be considering if you
even want to stay in the relationship at all. This Saving Your Relationship app will help you consider your options and think everything through before walking away. Some of the ideas and techniques may even help you with other relationships in your life that you may have difficulties with ‚Äì perhaps with a friend, parent, sibling or other relative.

Included in this awesome Saving Your Relationship app is: 
* How to save your relationship
* Unrealistic Expectations 
* Putting the past to rest
* What you need to do next
* Communication
* Invest time and effort
* When it's time to let go
* and much much more...

If you are having trouble in your relationship with your friends, family or loved ones, now is the time to download this app and start learning ways on how to improve your relationship with those people. 

Download your free Saving Your Relationship app today and start improving the relationships in your life.

comments: This app has compiled advice that is easy to follow without fail. (As long as you don't believe everything will work out positively in your favor by following it step-by-step. These are guidelines. Keys to help you open the locked door of the proverbial, "Forbidden and Taboo Box of Pandora", that is your relationship problems. Bottom Line: -When you want to make it work but don't know where to start or who to turn to,... This app is a very good start.

Awful!! I get notifications but they are incomplete! Then I click on it and when it goes to the sight there is just a table of contents with no indication as to where the rest of the remark is!! Very frustrating!

App put MALWARE on my Galaxy S9 Right after installing several apps my phone got several notifications of explicit nature. Then my phone started dropping calls & sucking battery. I took it in to my Carrier. I was told my phone had Malware installed. How? This app put Malware on my phone. They found it, deleted it & uninstalled this app. Be careful, now I know not every app in Google play store is safe! Just look at developer's email address, says it all
Really good information if you are having trouble in your relationship! I like how its broken down into simple, realistic goals or steps so it seems doable!

It's very good information, I applied it to what I thought was a 17 year lost relationship and I'm happy to say things are improving very well. Thanks so much for creating such a wonderful app, if folks do the work, it will work.

title: Ipon: 52 Weeks Money Challenge
description:
If you ever wanted to save money. Then you may already heard about 52 weeks money challenge. The idea is simple and suitable for those who are not able to plan and save through out the year. The nature of the challenge is to stick to a schedule. It consist of saving a small amount of money that increases every week. Following this simple rule, you can save money in a fun way.

Sounds complicated? Nah, it really isn't. This app is created to keep track of your savings by showing your progress using your phone rather than having the template printed version. The goal is to keep your motivation high every time you open the app. "Ipon" is a Filipino word which means "Save".

Remember that this app is just a digital template and does not result to any real world money. It's up to you where to put up your savings, through your own local bank, piggy bank, jars and etc.

Feature of the Ipon app.
 - Pick your desired starting week
 - Set your money goal
 - Choose your own currency. It defaults to PHP(Philippine peso) at the moment.
 - Track your savings record by showing charts and list of progress
 - Setup a notifier that notifies about your week goal
 - Custom features like reverse order challenge or zero increase per week
 - Create an account to easily sync your records online
 - You can be just a Free user really
 - Elegant, simple and eye candy design

comments: i like it :) but i hope you can do shade-type just like the recent peso challenge, so we can have the option to shade how much denomination we want. I think it's less pressuring than having to be reminded to save 2k/week. But overall, good app! Thank you ;)

I changed my Monday reminder to Friday as I do our weekly shopping every Friday so I can take some money out from the cash machine too . So far so good. This app is really helpful , if you really intend of saving some money .
Good app and we'll designed, but notifications do not work.
it's easy to use but my alarm is not working. Hope you can fix it thanks
A great guide to save some money easily throughout the year.

title: Spending Tracker
description:
Spending Tracker is the easiest and most user friendly expense manager app in the store. The simple fact is, by tracking your spending you will be able to stick to a budget and therefore SAVE MONEY. So download it for free, enter your expenses and income, and have instant control over your spending!

‚òÖ Features ‚òÖ 
---------------
‚úî Simple and intuitive user interface 
- helps you to easily manage your spending
- super fast expense entry

‚úî Flexible Time Periods 
- choose to track Weekly, Monthly or Yearly 

‚úî Budget Mode 
- optionally set a fixed budget amount to help you meet your spending targets 
- carry over any remaining budget to the next month or week 

‚úî Summary View 
- overview of your current balance along with expense and income totals
- see your main areas of spending

‚úî Log Expense and Income 
- repeat transactions daily, weekly or monthly
- export to CSV for use in a spreadsheet
- export to PDF for viewing and printing (Pro Upgrade required)

‚úî Multiple Accounts
- create separate personal, business and savings accounts for example

‚úî Reports 
- beautiful and interactive charts allow easy visualisation of where your money goes
- view spending grouped by category 
- see your history so you can track your progress

‚úî Categories 
- editable expense and income categories 
- choose a quality icon for each category

‚úî Syncing (Pro Upgrade required)
- automatically sync your data to other Android devices
- you can also sync to iOS and Windows versions of Spending Tracker, which will require a separate upgrade on these platforms

‚úî Backups
- keep your data safe by backing up to Dropbox
- the auto backups feature will take care of it for you

‚úî Widget
- put the widget on your home screen for easy access
- quick add buttons

‚úî Local Tips
- optionally receive tips when you enter participating local venues (requires location and bluetooth permissions)
- this could include money saving offers

‚úî Special design layout for tablets
- optimal use of larger screen size makes it even better for managing your money

comments: great way of tracking what you spend!!

LOVE this app, I paid for the full version within 24 hours as it's so useful, I love the way you can configure icons and categories exactly to what you use small things like cute little icons for each category keep me interested! I enjoy roll over budgets and detail each spend, it's helped me so much to arrest over spending as I put everything in instantly.

Easy to use and gets the job done. Which is good. However i don't like the idea of everything that happened in 2019 and before to become irrelevant because of their yearly/monthly filters. Would be nice if we can view "last 6 months" or last year. To include data from previous months. Also we can only filter one category at a time, which seems an easy fix. Would be nice if we can filter 2 or more categories for a comparison. Etc

Awesome so far. I'm finally getting all my finances in order. While it's amazing what you spend If you keep track it. So far very few ads and the app is running perfectly not a single hitch. So after one month I am deeply impressed. I never a take the time to read an app.. This time I am making an exception. Good job.

It does what it says - it helps me track my spending. Easy to use. Functionally useful. MS Money it is not but for day to day tracking and cash flow monitoring it fits my bill. Had a couple of queries early on but received prompt responses which sorted me out. Would recommend it.

title: Corpreneur - Savings, Investment, Entrepreneurship
description:
Corpreneur is a savings, investments and entrepreneurship platform that helps you discipline your savings, allows investments and empowers entrepreneur. Simply register a free account at www.corpreneur.com.ng or download our app from play store to start saving as low as ‚Ç¶100 or up to ‚Ç¶10,000,000 daily, weekly or monthly. You can also choose to save automatically or manually.

Our platform also allows entrepreneurs to create their business page to increase the visibility of their business online as the page will be search engine optimized to rank high on online searches.

WHO SHOULD USE CORPRENEUR?
Corpreneur is available to anyone to wants to cut down on their expenses and start saving but he/she doesn't have the discipline to do so and also to people who would like to save towards a goal. No sign-up fee and earn up to 10% interest per annum.

HOW MUCH CAN I SAVE?
You can start saving as low as N100 up to N10,000, 000 either daily, weekly or monthly.


WHAT IS PERIODIC SAVINGS?
Our periodic savings plan allows you to conveniently save any amount between ‚Ç¶100 - ‚Ç¶10, 000, 000, either daily, weekly or monthly for as long as you want while earning up to 10% interest per annum on your savings.

WHAT IS FIXED SAVINGS?
With a fixed savings plan, you can put funds away for a longer period of time and earn a fixed interest between 10% - 12.5% on your savings. You can fix between ‚Ç¶25, 000 - ‚Ç¶10, 000, 000 for 6 months or more.

WHAT IS TARGET SAVINGS?
Our target savings plan allows you to save towards a targeted amount while earning up to 10% interest per annum. There is no fixed withdrawal date, once the targeted amount is reached and it is above our minimum withdrawal period, your savings are available for withdrawal.

Learn more on our website https://corpreneur.com.ng

comments: It has been great so far but recently it's opening through opera mini and I've the app, I don't know what is wrong. I can't see how much I've saved and all.
Very consistent platform and also really helpful towards savings. Kudos to the team!
I recommend this app to anyone who previously lacked financial discipline. This app app will definitely help.
An awesome app, easy savings plus easy withdrawal, üòé cool interest on my savings too....
Very beautiful app. It was easy for me to navigate and it does not lag too. The user experience alone will make you want to save more. Thumbs up to Corpreneur

title: DataEye | Save Mobile Data
description:
DataEye saves you mobile data and battery by letting you manage your mobile data traffic and helping you discover the latest Offers. App based data usage control means there is no more hidden fees or data-heavy background traffic. You enjoy the best mobile applications and websites with a peace-of-mind.

1) ACCESS AMAZING OFFERS ‚Äì We save you mobile data and money by bringing you great offers on the most popular apps.

2) KNOW WHERE YOUR DATA GOES ‚Äì You deserve to know how your data is used, so we let you control it on an app-by-app basis. This way you keep more of your mobile data and money.

3) EXTEND YOUR BATTERY LIFE ‚Äì Unwanted background data drains your phone's battery. By putting you in charge of your data usage we significantly increase your phone‚Äôs battery life.

4) GO GLOBAL ‚Äì Data doesn‚Äôt stay local, so we make it easy to manage your mobile data, even while roaming. 

With DataEye, you discover an amazing world of data free Apps and finally take charge of your mobile data usage!

*We are working hard to bring more mobile operators onboard with Offers. Your mobile operator may not provide any currently but you can enjoy DataEye to save mobile data and extend your battery life.

recentChanges: Support for Android 10
comments: Blocks apps even when on strong wifi connection. It's only supposed to block mobile data. I've also never seen the claimed feature that alerts you that you're trying to use a blocked app and asks if you want to unblock it temporarily. Laatly, every time I open the app, data saver has been turned off. I toggle it back on, but everytime I open it back up it's been turned off again. Ultimately unusable.

Useless. This app uses data and collects your information for the purpose of advertising. It claims it can block Google from using data, nonsense. I had this on full block when i noticed Google app store has gobbled 200 megabyte of data in just a few minutes. I was using Glasseswire to monitor. You're best bet is to manually block apps from using data in the background and use Glasswire to monitor what's wasting your data in the background. By the way, there's no app that can fully block Google.

Excellent, thanks to developer. Ever since I bought Samsung J4, my data just kept on "vanishing " even with their so called "data saver " on and background disabled .Need I say more, Data eye really protect our data, through its whatcful eye. The only minor issue ot seems as if when o switch off Mobil data on phone ,data eye also sleeps and those background apps start to be active, I might be wrong pls correct me if I'm mistake. Today I edit , I still hasn't got feed back, despite this review em

Not too bad, but does not start automatically even when the option is set on. So it's mostly useless for many people. And an option to block separately the app in WiFi and data would be nicer. Your app needs improvement, I will give it a try again in a couple of years if you are still around.

Pretty much does what it says and does it well. It can even block system connections, which really gives the user full control. If there would be anything I'd like improved, it would be the ability to have separate wifi and data settings for individual apps. As it is you can only block both our neither. Still great app.

title: Easy Savings
description:
Easy Savings is an easy to use money planning app for everyday use. Make saving your money a regular priority and with our easy to use goal orientated finance planning app you can make saving your money a very simple task.

Make Saving Money Simple with the Free Easy Savings - Money Planning App

This easy to use savings app makes life simple for those everyday tasks that are coming ahead. Planning your personal savings from the start will make budgeting your finances a lot easier.

Planning your savings has never been this easy using our Free Easy Savings - Money Planning App

With the financial situation in almost every part of the world unstable, we need to plan our finances ahead. Handling our money matters is more important than ever and so is saving money.

Use our free easy savings app to help you plan for those important things which may just be out of reach of your budget or invest in long term planning each time putting you one step closer to your savings goals.
